Fulfulde_DC: Laamiiɗo Sedekiya wi'i Yeremiya: “Mi ɗon hula Yahuudu'en hawtanɓe Kaldiya'en. Teema Kaldiya'en ndokkatam haa juuɗe maɓɓe, ɓe pijirammi.”
KALATA_KO_SC_Gbaya: Wannu Sedesias kifa nú ha̧ Jeremii: «Mɔ nɛ̀ pi̧ kíì tɛ‘m nɛ́ o be Juda nɛ̀ yaka sitɛ o be Kaldee; ŋmafara mi tɛ tik er wa, ɓɛɛ wa tɛ usi bɔnɛ ha̧‘m pi̧ nɛ̀‘m nɛ̀ er ŋmaa.»
KALATA_KO_DC_Gbaya: Wannu Sedesias kifa nú ha̧ Jeremii: «Mɔ nɛ̀ pi̧ kíì tɛ‘m nɛ́ o be Juda nɛ̀ yaka sitɛ o be Kaldee; ŋmafara mi tɛ tik er wa, ɓɛɛ wa tɛ usi bɔnɛ ha̧‘m pi̧ nɛ̀‘m nɛ̀ er ŋmaa.»
Kapsiki_DC: Ma ke meghe Sɛdɛsiyas sha Zhɛrɛmi: «Ka Zhəwda nyi kelənji sha ka Babilone yaghazlənə ɗa 'ya ve. Wərə kamenete geva kavame geva 'ya mbe dzeve ta nci kezha sahwe ɗa yaka hɛ.»
Tupurri: Wañ Sedesiyas kal riñ Jermi gana: Heçeçne joñ ndi do jar Jwif maga kol wo go wer jar Kalde wo mono, ndi joñ heçeçne ga aè haç ndi go ne hara äi coo do day saara las ndi ge mono.

Francais: Jérémie répondit: "On ne te livrera pas. Ecoute donc la voix de Yahweh dans ce que je te dis; tu t'en trouveras bien, et tu auras la vie sauve.
Anglais: But Jeremiah said, They shall not deliver thee. Obey, I beseech thee, the voice of the  Lord , which I speak unto thee: so it shall be well unto thee, and thy soul shall live.
BIBALDA_TA_PELDETTA: Yeremiyas hot dita: Nisi as vulaŋ goy hay ɓisiɗi, humaŋ della vi Ma-Vatɗina hay va ma nan daŋu; nala naŋ ma fi ŋaata, naŋ ma suɗ goyo kaw.
Bulu: Yérémi a nga yalane na: Wo ye bo te kuaban. Vôʼôlôʼô tyiñe Nti e jam ma jô wo été: wo ye tabe mvoʼé a wo ye nyii ényiñe jôé.
Guiziga: Zeremi a mbiɗaŋ di: «Anta sa vulukuw asi haŋ taŋ ta. Cina mi ngi Bumbulvuŋ kaɓa ya maɓuw di na, gwat gar a sa gi tir mezle avu ka, kisa laha hutuŋ ɗike.
Fulfulde_Adamaoua: Yeremiya jaabi: “A hokkataake haa juuɗe maɓɓe. Useni ɗowtana bolle Jawmiraawo ɗe mbi'maami. Nden kam a heɓan hayru, yoŋki ma boo hisan.
Fulfulde_DC: Yeremiya jaabi: “A hokkataake haa juuɗe maɓɓe. Useni ɗowtana bolle Jawmiraawo ɗe mbi'maami. Nden kam a heɓan hayru, yoŋki ma boo hisan.
KALATA_KO_SC_Gbaya: Jeremii tɔ̧a: «Ɛnɛ beka tik er wa na. Ɛ̀nɛ̀ zíí nɛ́ wen ko GASA WAN tɛ wen n'am tɔ̧'ɛ, ɓɛɛ mɔ tɛ yak zu'nɛ́ nɛ̀ de-a, ɓɛɛ ɛnɛ tɛ kpasi.
KALATA_KO_DC_Gbaya: Jeremii tɔ̧a: «Ɛnɛ beka tik er wa na. Ɛ̀nɛ̀ zíí nɛ́ wen ko GASA WAN tɛ wen n'am tɔ̧'ɛ, ɓɛɛ mɔ tɛ yak zu'nɛ́ nɛ̀ de-a, ɓɛɛ ɛnɛ tɛ kpasi.
Kapsiki_DC: Ama ma ke Zhɛrɛmi zhɛnete nda: «Ewə, kateve nda ŋa mbeli ke hɛ we. Fate ghena ta Mahwətə nya geze ŋa 'ya, wəsə shɛ katemene ŋa geva we, teghweme tenza na.
Tupurri: Jermi raw ferge gano: AÈ haç ge ndo go gaè. Laa jag Manwur ti fen maga ndi waçaçn ne ndo mono, ndo da' ge see äo yañ day ndo yaçaç ge maysee äo yañ go.

Francais: Mais si tu refuses de sortir, voici ce que Yahweh m’a révélé:
Anglais: But if thou refuse to go forth, this is the word that the  Lord  hath shewed me:
BIBALDA_TA_PELDETTA: May la naŋ min kal goyɗi, kayni mi va ma Ma-Vatɗina di tanu:
Bulu: Ve nge wo bene kui atan, jame Nti a litiya ma nde di:
Guiziga: Amma da ki ngum ci nga wuzla Babiloŋhoy na ta na, gwat masa gi avu ka ani, Bumbulvuŋ mabigiy di:
Fulfulde_Adamaoua: Ammaa ndaa ko Jawmiraawo yi'ni yam to a salake wurtaago:
Fulfulde_DC: Ammaa ndaa ko Jawmiraawo yi'ni yam to a salake wurtaago:
KALATA_KO_SC_Gbaya: Ɓɛɛ k’ɛ̀nɛ̀ bɛ̧ nɛa-a sitɛ o be Kaldee, mɔ nɛ̀ GASA WAN usa ha̧‘m tɛ mɔ‘i nɛ́ mɔ'ɔ:
KALATA_KO_DC_Gbaya: Ɓɛɛ k’ɛ̀nɛ̀ bɛ̧ nɛa-a sitɛ o be Kaldee, mɔ nɛ̀ GASA WAN usa ha̧‘m tɛ mɔ‘i nɛ́ mɔ'ɔ:
Kapsiki_DC: Ama keɗema na lə sha hɛ ne, wa nya wəsə nya ncɛte ɗa Mahwətə nya:
Tupurri: Hayga ndo day we go kalge gaa no, mokay diñ waçaçre maga Manwur naa nen äe ne ndi mono:

Francais: Voici que toutes les femmes qui sont restées de la maison du roi de Juda, seront menées aux chefs du roi de Babylone, et elles te diront: Tes amis t’ont séduit et dominé; tes pieds se sont enfoncés dans la boue, et eux se sont esquivés.
Anglais: And, behold, all the women that are left in the king of Judah's house shall be brought forth to the king of Babylon's princes, and those women shall say, Thy friends have set thee on, and have prevailed against thee: thy feet are sunk in the mire, and they are turned away back.
BIBALDA_TA_PELDETTA: Boyn kaf sa hini hay ziyna vi mulla vi Yuda, nisi ma narsi tam sa ŋulona vi mulla vi Babilon, boy nisina ma di ala: Sum sa daŋ ala naŋ ma fi sle'tana, nisi ɗutaŋ ɗutiya, nisi ginawaŋ ginawiya; wulini seŋ cukawa hay torɓokŋa ni, nisi vi tuwsiyawa goyo.
Bulu: binga bese be liʼiya nda njô bôte ya Yuda ba ye keeban e mo bivete bi njô bôte ya Babilôn a ba ye jô na: ba be nga kobô wo ajô mvoʼé be nga duʼu wo, a dañe wo a éyoñe mebo môé me nga mane fuban mbotoʼo été, be nga viane mane kôlô
Guiziga: ngwasay masa ndiram gar a hay buy Zuda, a sa ram taŋ da soje ngi buy Babiloŋhoyo, a sa ɓukuw ani: Yeme ɗikey a tukunukuw le, a gaka gwat taŋ muwuɗama le! Ka mica sar ar ndileɓ gbiv muduba na, taŋ a muɗam haŋ le avu ka!›
Fulfulde_Adamaoua: Ɓe ngurtinan rewɓe luttuɓe nder saare laamiiɗo Yahuuda fuu haa mawɓe laamiiɗo Baabila. Ndaa ko rewɓe mbi'ata dow maaɗa: Sooba'en ma esti ma, mbaɗi ma rikici. Jonta, nde kosɗe ma nufi nder loope, ɓe acci ma.”
Fulfulde_DC: Ɓe ngurtinan rewɓe luttuɓe nder saare laamiiɗo Yahuuda fuu haa mawɓe laamiiɗo Baabila. Ndaa ko rewɓe mbi'ata dow maaɗa: Sooba'en ma esti ma, mbaɗi ma rikici. Jonta, nde kosɗe ma nufi nder loope, ɓe acci ma.”
KALATA_KO_SC_Gbaya: Wa tɛ kai o okoo lɛŋ nɛ̀ ya kɔ̧́ tua ko wannu Juda nɛnɛ ha̧ gasa wi-biro ko wannu Babilɔŋ, ɓɛɛ o okoo nɔ‘i tɛ ya tɔ̧ nɛnɛ‘e: ‹O mgbák sɛm kɔ-mɛ nɔ‘i ɔra so nɛ́ mɛ́! Mɛ bina ɓɔtɛ, ɓɛɛ kɔ-wa, wa pɛsa e mɛ duk!›
KALATA_KO_DC_Gbaya: Wa tɛ kai o okoo lɛŋ nɛ̀ ya kɔ̧́ tua ko wannu Juda nɛnɛ ha̧ gasa wi-biro ko wannu Babilɔŋ, ɓɛɛ o okoo nɔ‘i tɛ ya tɔ̧ nɛnɛ‘e: ‹O mgbák sɛm kɔ-mɛ nɔ‘i ɔra so nɛ́ mɛ́! Mɛ bina ɓɔtɛ, ɓɛɛ kɔ-wa, wa pɛsa e mɛ duk!›
Kapsiki_DC: Pɛtɛa mi nyi ketene ki ghɛa meghea ka Zhəwda ne, katefə nda hɛ mbeli ke mbelia jama ta ka meghea ka Babilone. Ma tegha ŋa hɛ kwa cimə: ‹Nahe ka mcɛhɛ ka sla pela ta ŋa keghwetete ŋa. Ma kwa ndahwe ŋa nzaɓe ne, pɛtɛ hɛ wəfəyite ŋa.›
Tupurri: Naare maga gwa' wo liñ ni wañ Juda mo äuy aè hoo ge ra wo go ne minisdir mani wañ Babilon wo day naare sen la waçaç ge wo yañ gano: Jar maga hay wo jam de äo hay joñ wo loëge äo, AÀ hay kol wo go waçaç ree äo Day de maga äaale äo yoçä go nen paçaçge so mono, Saara raw mañ äil go äuy.

Francais: Et on mènera toutes tes femmes et tes enfants aux Chaldéens, et toi-même tu ne leur échapperas pas; mais tu seras pris par le roi de Babylone, et tu auras brûlé cette ville."
Anglais: So they shall bring out all thy wives and thy children to the Chaldeans: and thou shalt not escape out of their hand, but shalt be taken by the hand of the king of Babylon: and thou shalt cause this city to be burned with fire.
BIBALDA_TA_PELDETTA: Boyna vaŋu hiɗi gurona vi gurona vaŋ kaf nisi ma narsi mi sum sa Kaldeena, naŋ kaw, naŋ ma hulot goy hay ɓisiɗi, mulla vi Babilon ma vaŋ hiɗi ɓalam noŋo, hoyok-ziyn tani kut ma ŋalam goyo.
Bulu: Binga bôé bese a bone bôé ba ye keebane be Bekaldééñ; a wo, wo ye bo te fam e mo map, wo njô bôte ya Babilôn wo ye bi wo, nyô a ye diʼi tisone nyô a nduan.
Guiziga: Ngwas ɗikey ati ziri ɗikeye gar, a sa ram taŋ da Babiloŋhoy. Ka vuna, k'anta sa lih avu taŋ ta: buy madiɗa ngi Babiloŋ a sa juw, a sa wura walahaya.»
Fulfulde_Adamaoua: Yeremiya ɓesdi wi'ugo: “Ɓe ngurtinan rewɓe ma e ɓikkoy ma fuu haa Kaldiya'en. An boo a daɗataa ɓe, a laatoto kaɓɓaaɗo laamiiɗo Baabila, nden ɓe ngulan berniwol ngo'ol.”
Fulfulde_DC: Yeremiya ɓesdi wi'ugo: “Ɓe ngurtinan rewɓe ma e ɓikkoy ma fuu haa Kaldiya'en. An boo a daɗataa ɓe, a laatoto kaɓɓaaɗo laamiiɗo Baabila, nden ɓe ngulan berniwol ngo'ol.”
KALATA_KO_SC_Gbaya: «Wa tɛ mgbɔ o kóò kɔ-mɛ in o bem kɔ-mɛ lɛŋ ha̧ o be Kaldee. Kɔ-mɛ nɛ̀ tɛ mɛ, mɛ beka kpasi kɔ̧̀ er-wa na; wannu Babilɔŋ tɛ tik tɛ-mɛ, ɓɛɛ ye’ɛ tɛ bìì wee.»
KALATA_KO_DC_Gbaya: «Wa tɛ mgbɔ o kóò kɔ-mɛ in o bem kɔ-mɛ lɛŋ ha̧ o be Kaldee. Kɔ-mɛ nɛ̀ tɛ mɛ, mɛ beka kpasi kɔ̧̀ er-wa na; wannu Babilɔŋ tɛ tik tɛ-mɛ, ɓɛɛ ye’ɛ tɛ bìì wee.»
Kapsiki_DC: Pɛtɛ tefəave nda geva yɛ mi le ŋwalea ŋa ke ka Babilone. Gha perə ne, katembele ŋa na va hɛ we. Katekese ŋa meghea ka Babilone ba'a katendəmte meleme nya ŋkɛ le ghwə.»
Tupurri: AÈ hoo ge naare äon wo de weere äon wo wo go äuy ne jar Kalde wo day ndo, ndo yaçaç ge go do äaara gaa lay. Do wañ Babilon ba ge ndo day se roë ge äi leegen la go de wuu.

Francais: Et Sédécias dit à Jérémie: "Que personne ne sache rien de cet entretien, et tu ne mourras point.
Anglais: Then said Zedekiah unto Jeremiah, Let no man know of these words, and thou shalt not die.
BIBALDA_TA_PELDETTA: Sedekiyas di tam Yeremiyas: Hin sa mara hum ɓakŋa vay loɗi, naŋ as mitɗi.
Bulu: Ane Sédékias a nga jô Yérémi na: Môt éziñ a boʼo te yeme jam éziñe ya mejô ma, a wo ye bo teke wu.
Guiziga: Sedekiyas a ɓa Zeremi: «Ɓi ndra mikiɗaka slir naŋ ani ati ka na, anja mbur a si na ta, da mbur a si na le na, i muc ɗiki.
Fulfulde_Adamaoua: Sedekiya jaabi Yeremiya: “Taata goɗɗo annda ko en mbolidi, nden kam a maayataa.
Fulfulde_DC: Sedekiya jaabi Yeremiya: “Taata goɗɗo annda ko en mbolidi, nden kam a maayataa.
KALATA_KO_SC_Gbaya: Sedesias tɔ̧ɔ̧ ha̧ Jeremii: «Ká ŋma bíí zii wen n’ɛɛ tɔ̧ in mɛɛ'ɛ na; kà bo hegɔ na, mɛ tɛ fe.
KALATA_KO_DC_Gbaya: Sedesias tɔ̧ɔ̧ ha̧ Jeremii: «Ká ŋma bíí zii wen n’ɛɛ tɔ̧ in mɛɛ'ɛ na; kà bo hegɔ na, mɛ tɛ fe.
Kapsiki_DC: Ma ke Sɛdɛsiyas sha Zhɛrɛmi: «Ma keɗe na kanza teghweme ne, yagha kwete wəndə kafate ghena nyi gezehwe nyi mə.
Tupurri: Sedesiyas kal riñ Jermi gano: Jobo mo laa waçaçre sen wo go me' wa hase, jobo 'war ndo go gaè.

Francais: Si les chefs apprennent que j'ai parlé avec toi, et qu'ils viennent te dire: Déclare-nous ce que tu as dit au roi et ce que le roi t'a dit; ne nous cache rien, et nous ne te ferons pas mourir,
Anglais: But if the princes hear that I have talked with thee, and they come unto thee, and say unto thee, Declare unto us now what thou hast said unto the king, hide it not from us, and we will not put thee to death; also what the king said unto thee:
BIBALDA_TA_PELDETTA: La sa ŋulona humawa ala nan ɓak hiɗi naŋu, la nisi daŋawa ala naŋ disi va ma nay ɓakam jar-tuwayna, la nisi daŋawa ala naŋ ŋaysi vaɗi, nisi min caŋ goyɗi ni,
Bulu: Nge bivet bia wôʼô na ma te kobô wo, a nge bia zu jô wo na: Kate bia jam wo te jô njô bôt a jame njô bôt a te jô, wo te solé bia jôm a bia ye bo te wôé wo.
Guiziga: Yo da mizli madiɗa ngi slra ɗuwoy, a sinaka le, i kiɗam slir le ati ka, a soko le a cufuɗukuw: ‹Ɓo ndra ɓi ka miɓa da buy na! Buy a ɓuw mbrike? Da ki ɗumo ndra di le neˀ na, i muc ɗik» na,
Fulfulde_Adamaoua: To saraaki'en nani mi wolidi bee ma, to ɓe ngari haa maaɗa, ɓe mbi'i ma: Yeccu min ko a wolidi bee laamiiɗo. Min mbarataa ma, to a yecci min koo ɗume fuu,
Fulfulde_DC: To saraaki'en nani mi wolidi bee ma, to ɓe ngari haa maaɗa, ɓe mbi'i ma: Yeccu min ko a wolidi bee laamiiɗo. Min mbarataa ma, to a yecci min koo ɗume fuu,
KALATA_KO_SC_Gbaya: O gasawi tɛ zii'e ɛɛ tɔ̧ɔ̧ nyɛrɛ in ŋmaa; kà wa tɔ̧ ha̧ mɛ, mɛ̀ wé ɗoŋ mɔ nɛ̀ mɛ tɔ̧ɔ̧ ha̧‘m wen ká‘i tɛɛ gbɛ mɛ, ká mɛ hu̧si mɔ nɛ̀ wi na, ge mɔ ge a̧ wannu tɔ̧ɔ̧ ha̧ mɛ ge nde, wó,
KALATA_KO_DC_Gbaya: O gasawi tɛ zii'e ɛɛ tɔ̧ɔ̧ nyɛrɛ in ŋmaa; kà wa tɔ̧ ha̧ mɛ, mɛ̀ wé ɗoŋ mɔ nɛ̀ mɛ tɔ̧ɔ̧ ha̧‘m wen ká‘i tɛɛ gbɛ mɛ, ká mɛ hu̧si mɔ nɛ̀ wi na, ge mɔ ge a̧ wannu tɔ̧ɔ̧ ha̧ mɛ ge nde, wó,
Kapsiki_DC: Ghəpə yite kaɗema mbelia jama katefate nahe 'ya kegezete ŋa ghena we. Katese hɛ ka'yɛwe ghena nyi gezete mə va gha. Katemeɗe ŋa nza hɛ teghweme keɗema na kewəfərəakɛ kwete wəsə va hɛ.
Tupurri: Hayga minisdirn laa ge wo we ga ndi hay waçaç waçaçre we de äo day hayga aà a wo we riñ ndo ga ndo mo fer fen maga ndo fern ne wañ noga maga wañ fern ne ndo, yoñ mopo ne saara wa ni saara 'war ndo go gaa no,

Francais: tu leur répondras: J'ai présenté ma supplication au roi pour qu'il ne me fasse pas retourner dans la maison de Jonathan, où je mourrais."
Anglais: Then thou shalt say unto them, I presented my supplication before the king, that he would not cause me to return to Jonathan's house, to die there.
BIBALDA_TA_PELDETTA: naŋ ma hotsi dit ala: Nan giɗelem mi del mulla kay nam hotan hay ziyda vi Yonatanɗi, kay ɗawni nan ma mita.
Bulu: Wo ye yalane be na: Ma te kate njô bôt minjaʼane miame na, a bo te bulane ma e nda Yônatan me za wu été.
Guiziga: kisa mbiɗa taŋ di: ‹Yi ndil ng'avu buyo, i tumbuloŋ ɓa a mi ti ya ngi hay Yonataŋ mata, vur ya masa muc a diga.»
Fulfulde_Adamaoua: nden kam yeccu ɓe no a tori yam, taa mi lortine haa suudu Yonatan, a maaya ton.”
Fulfulde_DC: nden kam yeccu ɓe no a tori yam, taa mi lortine haa suudu Yonatan, a maaya ton.”
KALATA_KO_SC_Gbaya: mɛ̀ kífí nú ha̧ wa'e: ‹Mi kɔ̧ɔ̧ so mɛ zɔk nɛ́ wannu ha̧‘m mɛ ai nú ha̧ a̧ wen ká a̧ tɛ̀ɛ́ tom am si ɗoŋ si kɔ̧́ tua ko Yɔnataŋ, wen ká‘m tɛɛ fe.› »
KALATA_KO_DC_Gbaya: mɛ̀ kífí nú ha̧ wa'e: ‹Mi kɔ̧ɔ̧ so mɛ zɔk nɛ́ wannu ha̧‘m mɛ ai nú ha̧ a̧ wen ká a̧ tɛ̀ɛ́ tom am si ɗoŋ si kɔ̧́ tua ko Yɔnataŋ, wen ká‘m tɛɛ fe.› »
Kapsiki_DC: Ama tezhɛne nda na ke hɛ: ‹'Ya se kampi nda dzeve ke meghe kezha ɗema ŋkɛ kazhɛne kadzeki ki ghɛa Yonatan, yagha 'ya kamte ki.›»
Tupurri: ni ndo fer ge ne hara gano: Ndi hay joñ kam kam pel wañ maga aà mo fer ndi wo liñ ni Jonatañ maga ndi mo hu wo go ni wa.

Francais: Tous les chefs vinrent en effet vers Jérémie et le questionnèrent; il leur répondit entièrement selon ces paroles que le roi lui avait prescrites; et ils le laissèrent en repos, car l'entretien n'avait pas été entendu.
Anglais: Then came all the princes unto Jeremiah, and asked him: and he told them according to all these words that the king had commanded. So they left off speaking with him; for the matter was not perceived.
BIBALDA_TA_PELDETTA: Sum sa ŋulon kaf co kat Yeremiyas, nisi jobom vunamu. Nam hotsi dit ŋray ca ki mulla dum nala. Nisi ba vunsiya, vi tuwsi goyo may, kay labar kayni bay biya goyo.
Bulu: Bivete bise bi nga zu be Yérémi a sili nye minsili. A nga yalane be a mejô mebiene njô bôt a nga bendé nye. Ane be nga kôlô bivô, amu a nji kulane be jam éziñ.
Guiziga: Naŋ kine gisiŋ, mizli madiɗa ngi slra ngi buyoy tuwa gar, a soko ng'avi Zeremi, a cufuɗakaŋ, yo Zeremi kwana, a mbiɗa taŋ di kasl kasl ka buy mukutaŋ tuwa. Mizli madiɗa ngi slraˀahaya kwana, a hurdumom ti ɓi nah ta. Vurˀe, ko ɓi nah a njik ta.
Fulfulde_Adamaoua: Saraaki'en fuu ngari haa Yeremiya, ƴami mo. Kaŋko o yecci ɓe ko laamiiɗo umri mo wi'ugo. Ɓe njeeɗi, ɓe ndilli, ngam walaa mo nani haala man.
Fulfulde_DC: Saraaki'en fuu ngari haa Yeremiya, ƴami mo. Kaŋko o yecci ɓe ko laamiiɗo umri mo wi'ugo. Ɓe njeeɗi, ɓe ndilli, ngam walaa mo nani haala man.
KALATA_KO_SC_Gbaya: Zu mɔ‘i, o gasawi lɛŋ tɛɛ ak Jeremii; ɓɛɛ sɛn tɛ kifa nú kɔ̧-a̧, a̧ mboo zu tɛ mɔ nɛ̀ wannu tɔ̧a. Wa ir a̧ tɛ wen'i siti na; hegɔ, ŋma bíí kpa ndaa nyɛrɛ kɔ-wa'i na.
KALATA_KO_DC_Gbaya: Zu mɔ‘i, o gasawi lɛŋ tɛɛ ak Jeremii; ɓɛɛ sɛn tɛ kifa nú kɔ̧-a̧, a̧ mboo zu tɛ mɔ nɛ̀ wannu tɔ̧a. Wa ir a̧ tɛ wen'i siti na; hegɔ, ŋma bíí kpa ndaa nyɛrɛ kɔ-wa'i na.
Kapsiki_DC: Pɛkwe mbelia jama pɛtɛ sha Zhɛrɛmi kezha 'yɛwe ghena ve. Pa zhɛnete nda ke hɛ tserame kala nya gezave nda meghe. Seɗakwe seɗakwe hɛ slənji yite, va nya nza ŋkɛ, wəndə shɛ kefate ghena nyi gezehwe hɛ we.
Tupurri: Minisdirn raw wo age see Jermi äuy day wii wo jag äe. Se raw fer waçaçre ne hara do jag maga wañ hay waçaçn nono. Saara kal rawge go bay jage werga waçaçren hay bay go de dusgi wa.

Francais: Ainsi Jérémie resta dans la cour de garde jusqu'à la prise de Jérusalem, et il y était lorsque Jérusalem fut prise.
Anglais: So Jeremiah abode in the court of the prison until the day that Jerusalem was taken: and he was there when Jerusalem was taken.
BIBALDA_TA_PELDETTA: Yeremiyas mus hay wur-daŋŋa vi daŋgayna dam' ta-ta hay buur ma nisi sli Yerusalem.
Bulu: Yérémi a nga tabe nseñe bebaʼale mimbôk a kui môse Yérusalém a nga nyoñeban.
Guiziga: Zeremi a ndir a wazlaray mijigina hayaya, hã a tiɓaka Zeruzaleme. Gwat migi a dirba mitiɓaka Zeruzalem:
Fulfulde_Adamaoua: Yeremiya boo jooɗi haa daldal saare laamiiɗo haa aynooɓe aynata haa nyalaade Kaldiya'en nyaami Urusaliima .
Fulfulde_DC: Yeremiya boo jooɗi haa daldal saare laamiiɗo haa aynooɓe aynata haa nyalaade Kaldiya'en nyaami Urusaliima .
KALATA_KO_SC_Gbaya: Jeremii ɓɔna kɔ̧́ beegara ko o wi-pɛm-mɔ hɔ ŋgimbi tika-a ko Jerusalɛm.
KALATA_KO_DC_Gbaya: Jeremii ɓɔna kɔ̧́ beegara ko o wi-pɛm-mɔ hɔ ŋgimbi tika-a ko Jerusalɛm.
Kapsiki_DC: Mba Zhɛrɛmi ki ghɛa ka ya ŋkwa pa te və nya kelehwe Zhɛrəzalɛm mbeli.
Tupurri: Jermi raw gwa'ge äi feele tiñ dañgayn ni haçaç wo go ti wur maga aè yaçaç Jerusalem go mono. Mokay diñ faage maga aè yaçaç Jerusalem go de äe mono.

Francais: La neuvième année de Sédécias, roi de Juda, le dixième mois, Nabuchodonosor, roi de Babylone, vint avec toute son armée devant Jérusalem; et ils l'assiégèrent.
Anglais: In the ninth year of Zedekiah king of Judah, in the tenth month, came Nebuchadrezzar king of Babylon and all his army against Jerusalem, and they besieged it.
BIBALDA_TA_PELDETTA: Hay til ma doogona vi busata zleeŋeta vi Sedekiyas mulla vi Yuda, mulla Nebukadnesar co hiɗi sojena valam kaf vok Yerusalem, nisi ŋuya'a;
Bulu: Ngon awômô ya mbu ébulu Sédékias njô bôte ya Yuda a nga jôô, ñwô Nébukatnétzar njô bôte ya Babilôn a nga so a nkane bita wé ôse asu Yérusalém, a dili nye bita.
Guiziga: Angi kiya mukuruˀ ngi vi mungoltir naŋ, Sedekiyas mazum buy asi ruwuy Zuda na, Nabukodonozor buy madiɗa ngi Babiloŋ, a ndiloko ati soje naŋhay gar, walahay Zeruzaleme ndah.
Fulfulde_Adamaoua: Nder nduuɓu Sedekiya, laamiiɗo Yahuuda, njoweenayaɓu, nder lewru sappooru, Nabukodonosor, laamiiɗo Baabila wardi bee jama'aare konu muuɗum fuu, hippi Urusaliima.
Fulfulde_DC: Nder nduuɓu Sedekiya, laamiiɗo Yahuuda, njoweenayaɓu, nder lewru sappooru, Nabukodonosor, laamiiɗo Baabila wardi bee jama'aare konu muuɗum fuu, hippi Urusaliima.
KALATA_KO_SC_Gbaya: Mɔ nɛ̀ dea tɛ ŋgimbi tika-a ko Jerusalɛm nɛ́ mɔ'ɔ. Tɛ mɔɔrɔ-ɗoŋ-naar pɛ-wan ko Sedesias wannu Juda, tɛ ɓu fio-zɛ, Nabukɔdɔnɔsɔr wannu Babilɔŋ in o gíí wi-biro kɔ‘i lɛŋ hɔɔ sɛn Jerusalɛm, ɓɛɛ wa kɛr ye.
KALATA_KO_DC_Gbaya: Mɔ nɛ̀ dea tɛ ŋgimbi tika-a ko Jerusalɛm nɛ́ mɔ'ɔ. Tɛ mɔɔrɔ-ɗoŋ-naar pɛ-wan ko Sedesias wannu Juda, tɛ ɓu fio-zɛ, Nabukɔdɔnɔsɔr wannu Babilɔŋ in o gíí wi-biro kɔ‘i lɛŋ hɔɔ sɛn Jerusalɛm, ɓɛɛ wa kɛr ye.
Kapsiki_DC: Ma mbe kwa mesli ta va ta Sɛdɛsiyas, meghea ka Zhəwda te meghe, te kwa meŋe ta tere ne, pa yɛ Nabəkodonozor, meghea ka Babilone le pɛtɛa ka sewajɛa ŋkɛ senji kezha ha nda mpa ke Zhɛrəzalɛm.
Tupurri: Ti kiñgi ma de kaawa' maga Sedesiyas wañ Juda ti wañ, nen few ma de hwaln mono, Nebukanetsar wañ Babilon raw age de sode äen wo äuy kañge jag Jerusalem day cir wo ti äe go.

Francais: La onzième année de Sédécias, au quatrième mois, le neuvième jour du mois, une brèche fut faite à la ville.
Anglais: And in the eleventh year of Zedekiah, in the fourth month, the ninth day of the month, the city was broken up.
BIBALDA_TA_PELDETTA: hay buurta zleeŋeta vi til ma fiɗina kuɗ busata doogo yam kepta vi Sedekiyas, nisi co baŋan kir gulmunna vi hoyok-ziyna.
Bulu: Ngone nyini é too melu ébu ya mbu awôm a wua, Sédékias njô bôte ya Yuda a nga jôô, ñwô beta nsalan a nga bobane tisone Yérusalém.
Guiziga: Angi hin ngoltir ngi kiya mumufaɗ naŋ, ngi vi mukuruˀ ngaŋ kaˀ naŋ na, a slinam li le ɓoŋ avu mohol mugun walahaya.
Fulfulde_Adamaoua: Nder nduuɓu Sedekiya sappo e go'oowu, lewru nayaɓru, nyannde joweenayaɓre maaru, ɓe cumpiti mahi berniwol.
Fulfulde_DC: Nder nduuɓu Sedekiya sappo e go'oowu, lewru nayaɓru, nyannde joweenayaɓre maaru, ɓe cumpiti mahi berniwol.
KALATA_KO_SC_Gbaya: Tɛ ɓu-zua-kpɔk pɛ ɔɔ-wan ko Sedesias, tɛ naar fio-zɛ, tɛ mɔɔrɔ-ɗoŋ-naar ɔɔ-zɛ, o be Babilɔŋ mbaŋa garo ye nɛnɛ si saaye.
KALATA_KO_DC_Gbaya: Tɛ ɓu-zua-kpɔk pɛ ɔɔ-wan ko Sedesias, tɛ naar fio-zɛ, tɛ mɔɔrɔ-ɗoŋ-naar ɔɔ-zɛ, o be Babilɔŋ mbaŋa garo ye nɛnɛ si saaye.
Kapsiki_DC: Ma te kwa meŋe kwetɛŋeghəmbe ta va ta Sɛdɛsiyas, le hɛ mesli te tere kwa wəfaɗe ne, mpahwe ka Babilone ntsate wəfela te zli nya yitea meleme.
Tupurri: Nen kiñgi ma de hwal ti boñ ga Sedesiyas ti wañ nen few ma de naa ti naw ma de kaawa'n mono, aè raw caa ywaale ti kor ma äi leege no.

Francais: Tous les chefs du roi de Babylone entrèrent et s'établirent à la porte du milieu: Nergal-Séréser, gardien du trésor, Nabu-Sarsakim, chef des eunuques, Nergal-Séréser, chef des mages, et tout le reste des chefs du roi de Babylone.
Anglais: And all the princes of the king of Babylon came in, and sat in the middle gate, even Nergal–sharezer, Samgar–nebo, Sarsechim, Rab–saris, Nergal–sharezer, Rab–mag, with all the residue of the princes of the king of Babylon.
BIBALDA_TA_PELDETTA: Sa ŋulona vi mulla vi Babilon kaf cuk kulo hay hoyok-ziyna, nisi lak hay vun-galana ma jaara. Nisi kayni: Nergal-Saretser, Samgar-Nebu, Sarsekim, ma ŋolla vi sa patayna, Nergal-Saretser ma ŋolla vi sa li gul-yalda, hiɗi sa ŋulo segena vi Babilon kafe.
Bulu: Eyoñe te bivete bi njô bôte ya Babilôn bi nga zu a bômane mbé yʼézezañ bi too môé na: Nergal-Saretser, Samgar-Nebou, Sarsekim évete bemiak, Nergal-Saretser évete beyememam a bivete bi njô bôte ya Babilôn bivoʼo bise.
Guiziga: Dar madiɗa ngi soje ngi buy Babiloŋhoy a cam, ara cifam a mizlingre ngi wuzla. Soje tayna i ti: Nergal-Sareser, mbur Sin-Magir, Samgar-Nebo, madiɗa ngi soje ngi wazlarayay, Sar-Sekim, mbur ngisi mevel ngi buy waɗ soje madiɗa mekelemey ngi buyoyo cek.
Fulfulde_Adamaoua: Nden mawɓe laamiiɗo Baabila fuu nasti, njooɗi haa Dammugal Cakaawal. Nder maɓɓe Nergal-Sarecer e Samgar-Nebo e Sarsekim, mawɗo saraaki'en e Nergal-Sarecer feere, ardiiɗo annduɓe alaamaaji koode non boo mawɓe laamiiɗo Baabila woɗɓe.
Fulfulde_DC: Nden mawɓe laamiiɗo Baabila fuu nasti, njooɗi haa Dammugal Cakaawal. Nder maɓɓe Nergal-Sarecer e Samgar-Nebo e Sarsekim, mawɗo saraaki'en e Nergal-Sarecer feere, ardiiɗo annduɓe alaamaaji koode non boo mawɓe laamiiɗo Baabila woɗɓe.
KALATA_KO_SC_Gbaya: O gasa wi-biro ko wannu Babilɔŋ tɛɛ ba fara sɛn gasa beegara: mɛ̀ nɛ́ Nɛrgal-Sarɛsɛr, gasa wi-duk-zu o wi-biro, Sin-Magir, Nebu-Sarsekim, gasawi kɔ̧̀ kira ko wannu, in Nɛrgal-Sarɛsɛr, gasawi ko o wi-biro ká bá nɛ̀ o oi dɔka o gasa wi-biro lɛŋ.
KALATA_KO_DC_Gbaya: O gasa wi-biro ko wannu Babilɔŋ tɛɛ ba fara sɛn gasa beegara: mɛ̀ nɛ́ Nɛrgal-Sarɛsɛr, gasa wi-duk-zu o wi-biro, Sin-Magir, Nebu-Sarsekim, gasawi kɔ̧̀ kira ko wannu, in Nɛrgal-Sarɛsɛr, gasawi ko o wi-biro ká bá nɛ̀ o oi dɔka o gasa wi-biro lɛŋ.
Kapsiki_DC: Tagha gɛ, shishilimə mbelia jama ta meghea ka Babilone mbe meleme kanzanji mɛa mɛ degha nya te tepe. Yɛ Nɛrgal-Sarɛsɛr, wəndə nya te ghəa ka sewajɛ, Samgar-Nebo, Sar-Sekim, wəndə nya gezleŋema ghə meghe ve, kwete Nɛrgal-Sarɛsɛr, wəndə nya te ghəa ka mene ghwɛ le kweci mbelia jama ta meghea ka Babilone ya tagha.
Tupurri: Mo so no minisdir mani wañ Babilon raw wo le ya'ge day lag wo jag tiñ ma ti gisiëgi no, diñ Nergal-Saretser, Samgar-Nebu, Sarsekim wañ jar ma de ndar äayn wo, Nergal-Saretser wañ jar ko wer feçeçre wo de minisdir mani wañ Babilon ma lan wo äuy.

Francais: Lorsque Sédécias, roi de Juda, et tous les gens de guerre les eurent vus, ils s'enfuirent et sortirent de la ville pendant la nuit vers le chemin du jardin du roi, par la porte entre les deux murs, et ils prirent le chemin de la plaine.
Anglais: And it came to pass, that when Zedekiah the king of Judah saw them, and all the men of war, then they fled, and went forth out of the city by night, by the way of the king's garden, by the gate betwixt the two walls: and he went out the way of the plain.
BIBALDA_TA_PELDETTA: Hay li ma Sedekiyas mulla vi Yuda hiɗi sum sa li duura kaf irsi cuk kisiya, nisi muni jaŋi, nisi kal goy hay ziyna hay henjeta, nisi jik hay hagata vi jardeŋŋa vi mulla, hay hagata ta jar gulmun ma ma'na, nisi sli hagata ta hay beɗna.
Bulu: Nné ane Sédékias njô bôte ya Yuda a bôte mewosan bese be nga yene be, be nga tup, a kôlô tison alu be tyiʼi zen afube njô bôt, mbé ô ne zañe mimfine mibaé, a be nga kuu zene yʼAraba.
Guiziga: Sedekiyas, buy Zuda ati migi vurum naŋhaya gar, a puraka taŋ le, dar a kilam ngi duvuɗo, a bam tir jarne ngi buy, gweˀ avu mizlingre misi ar wala ngi moholoy cuw, a cohom kileŋ kini ngir ti Araba.
Fulfulde_Adamaoua: Nde Sedekiya, laamiiɗo Yahuuda e honooɓe muuɗum fuu ngi'i ɗum, ɓe ngurti berniwol bee jemma, ɓe ndoggiri laawol jarne laamiiɗo e dammugal caka mahi ɗiɗi, ɓe ngurtori waadiwol Urdun.
Fulfulde_DC: Nde Sedekiya, laamiiɗo Yahuuda e honooɓe muuɗum fuu ngi'i ɗum, ɓe ngurti berniwol bee jemma, ɓe ndoggiri laawol jarne laamiiɗo e dammugal caka mahi ɗiɗi, ɓe ngurtori waadiwol Urdun.
KALATA_KO_SC_Gbaya: Sedesias wannu Juda in o wi-biro kɔ‘i iŋa'e wa hɔɔ kaɗi, wa yuu mɔ yak saaye mɛ zɛ nɛ̀ tɛ̀ be fɔ ko wannu, nɛ̀ ká̧ nú garo nɛ̀ gbo nɛ̀ mgbara o ŋgeŋ yiitoo, ɓɛɛ wa ba nɛ́ yuwar si Araba mɛ.
KALATA_KO_DC_Gbaya: Sedesias wannu Juda in o wi-biro kɔ‘i iŋa'e wa hɔɔ kaɗi, wa yuu mɔ yak saaye mɛ zɛ nɛ̀ tɛ̀ be fɔ ko wannu, nɛ̀ ká̧ nú garo nɛ̀ gbo nɛ̀ mgbara o ŋgeŋ yiitoo, ɓɛɛ wa ba nɛ́ yuwar si Araba mɛ.
Kapsiki_DC: Nakɛma ta yɛ Sɛdɛsiyas, meghea ka Zhəwda le ka sewajɛa ŋkɛ pɛtɛ ke hɛ ne, kweracɛ hɛ hwɛnji shave mbe meleme heviɗi kadzawa laka ntsa ta meghe nya dekwe yitea mɛ degha nya kwelɛ zli. Ntəŋə hɛ dzawa kwa hweŋkwa nya kedzawa zlərəa Zhəwrdɛŋe.
Tupurri: De maga Sedesiyas wañ Juda wo de jar durgin wo wo korage mokay saara kal dañge de ëeere, laa wo go de suñ ti faage ma äil pay sugnee mani wañ ti holañ kor ma äogn wo day laa wo wo go ti faage maga kal wo go äil Araba mono.

Francais: Mais l'armée des Chaldéens les poursuivit et atteignit Sédécias dans les plaines de Jéricho. L'ayant pris ils le firent monter vers Nabuchodonosor, roi de Babylone, à Ribla, au pays d'Emath, et il prononça sur lui des sentences.
Anglais: But the Chaldeans' army pursued after them, and overtook Zedekiah in the plains of Jericho: and when they had taken him, they brought him up to Nebuchadrezzar king of Babylon to Riblah in the land of Hamath, where he gave judgment upon him.
BIBALDA_TA_PELDETTA: May sojena vi sa Kaldeena jaŋ kuɗsiya, nisi fi Sedekiyas hay liy ma beɗna vi Yeriko. Nisi vumu, maram kat Nebukadnesar mulla vi Babilon, hay Ribla, hay nagata vi Hamat; Nebukadnesar ka kitat kalamu.
Bulu: Ve nkane bita Bekaldééñ ô nga tôñe be a koone Sédékias njeʼese Yérikô. Be nga nyoñe nye, a bete nye be Nébukatnétzar, njô bôte ya Babilôn e Ribla e si Hamat a nye a nga tyiʼi ajô dé.
Guiziga: Amma soje Babiloŋhoy tuwa, a gidiɗaka taŋ, ara jaka is da Sedekiyas ar li micay a Zeriko. A joko di, a soko di da Nabukodonozor buy madiɗa ngi Babiloŋ a Ribla, hirwuy Hamat, joˀ Nabukodonozor a gaŋ kiita.
Fulfulde_Adamaoua: Ammaa jama'aare konu Kaldiya'en taasni ɓe, jokki Sedekiya nder ƴoole baŋnge Yeriko. Ɓe naŋngi mo, ɓe njahri mo haa laamiiɗo Baabila haa Ribla nder lesdi Hamat. Ton Nabukodonosor hiiti mo.
Fulfulde_DC: Ammaa jama'aare konu Kaldiya'en taasni ɓe, jokki Sedekiya nder ƴoole baŋnge Yeriko. Ɓe naŋngi mo, ɓe njahri mo haa laamiiɗo Baabila haa Ribla nder lesdi Hamat. Ton Nabukodonosor hiiti mo.
KALATA_KO_SC_Gbaya: Ɓɛɛ o wi-biro Kaldee ndak ɗoŋ wa nɛnɛ, ɓɛɛ nɛ́ɛ̀ kpa Sedesias sɛn bɔkɔ-nú Jeriko. Wa baa a̧, ɓɛɛ wa mgbɔ a̧ daŋnɛ pii Ribla, nù ko Hamat sitɛ Nabukɔdɔnɔsɔr wannu Babilɔŋ nɛ̀ gɔna kita zu a̧.
KALATA_KO_DC_Gbaya: Ɓɛɛ o wi-biro Kaldee ndak ɗoŋ wa nɛnɛ, ɓɛɛ nɛ́ɛ̀ kpa Sedesias sɛn bɔkɔ-nú Jeriko. Wa baa a̧, ɓɛɛ wa mgbɔ a̧ daŋnɛ pii Ribla, nù ko Hamat sitɛ Nabukɔdɔnɔsɔr wannu Babilɔŋ nɛ̀ gɔna kita zu a̧.
Kapsiki_DC: Ama tereŋe ka sewajɛa ka Babilone kwa sebe ta nci, pa kekave Sɛdɛsiyas kwagha te ŋwela ta Zhɛriko. Pa hɛ keseve kakeleghe nda kadzeme ke Nabəkodonozor, meghea ka Babilone pelɛ Ribla, te hɛɗia Hamat. Tagha mehate ghwə Nabəkodonozor te Sɛdɛsiyas.
Tupurri: Ama sode mani jar Kalden hoo wo ëeere wer äaara wo wo ba Sedesiyas wo äil fuul ma Jerikon wo. Saara raw bagge äe, raw wo de äe see Nebukanetsar wañ Babilon wo Ribla äil sir Hamade, se raw waçaç fen maga se ëign ti äe go ni.

Francais: Le roi de Babylone égorgea à Ribla les fils de Sédécias sous ses yeux; le roi de Babylone égorgea aussi tous les grands de Juda.
Anglais: Then the king of Babylon slew the sons of Zedekiah in Riblah before his eyes: also the king of Babylon slew all the nobles of Judah.
BIBALDA_TA_PELDETTA: Mulla vi Babilon ŋat gurona vi Sedekiyas goyo, nam ŋatsi gaa vok ir busiya hay Ribla; mulla vi Babilon ŋat sum sa ŋulona vi Yuda kaf kaw.
Bulu: Njô bôte ya Babilôn a nga wôé bone be Sédékias Ribla émien a lôô. Njô bôte ya Babilôn a nga wôé fe benya bôte bese ya Yuda.
Guiziga: Buy Babiloŋ a ɓi mizli, a slaka ˀay ngi ziri daˀ a mihiri ngi cine taŋ Sedekiyas vuna, a Ribla. Yo buy madiɗa ngi Babiloŋ a ɓi mizli, a slaka ˀay ngi misi zlili ngi Zudahaya cek ma.
Fulfulde_Adamaoua: O umri hirsugo ɓiɓɓe Sedekiya yeeso maako. O umri hirsugo tedduɓe Yahuuda boo.
Fulfulde_DC: O umri hirsugo ɓiɓɓe Sedekiya yeeso maako. O umri hirsugo tedduɓe Yahuuda boo.
KALATA_KO_SC_Gbaya: Wannu Babilɔŋ gbɛɛ o bem ko Sedesias sɛn Ribla ɓɔn yí-a. Wannu Babilɔŋ gbɛɛ o gasawi Juda mbɛt,
KALATA_KO_DC_Gbaya: Wannu Babilɔŋ gbɛɛ o bem ko Sedesias sɛn Ribla ɓɔn yí-a. Wannu Babilɔŋ gbɛɛ o gasawi Juda mbɛt,
Kapsiki_DC: Pa meghea ka Babilone sleslamte ghə te ŋwalea Sɛdɛsiyas kwa ntsə ta yiteyɛa nci mbe Ribla, tsagha te mbelia jama ta ka Zhəwda.
Tupurri: Wañ Babilon raw ngaë weere mani Sedesiyasn wo go nen äe Ribla ni. Wañ Babilon ngaë jar ma tinoo ma Judan wo go lay.

Francais: Puis il creva les yeux à Sédécias, et le lia avec deux chaînes d'airain, pour l'emmener à Babylone.
Anglais: Moreover he put out Zedekiah's eyes, and bound him with chains, to carry him to Babylon.
BIBALDA_TA_PELDETTA: Bugolda nam co ir Sedekiyas, junum hiɗi jaɓ ma kawayna kay naram hay Babilon.
Bulu: Wôna a nga bo na be tube Sédékias mis, a bo na be kaʼa nye a bibom bi mvot, asu ya kee nye Babilôn.
Guiziga: A dirba nah, a nduzoko hiri ngi Sedekiyasa cuw cuw taŋ, a juwaka ngiriɗ ngiriɗ ti celelu ngi ɓiri gaza zlaɓ cuw, a ram di nga Babiloŋ.
Fulfulde_Adamaoua: Nden o ɗoofi gite Sedekiya, o haɓɓi mo bee callalluuji njamndi mboɗeeri, ɓe njahri mo haa Baabila.
Fulfulde_DC: Nden o ɗoofi gite Sedekiya, o haɓɓi mo bee callalluuji njamndi mboɗeeri, ɓe njahri mo haa Baabila.
KALATA_KO_SC_Gbaya: ɓɛɛ a̧ o yí Sedesias, hɛr a̧ nɛ̀ nyak-ndɛrɛ gbam ŋmaa yiitoo wen baa a̧ si Babilɔŋ.
KALATA_KO_DC_Gbaya: ɓɛɛ a̧ o yí Sedesias, hɛr a̧ nɛ̀ nyak-ndɛrɛ gbam ŋmaa yiitoo wen baa a̧ si Babilɔŋ.
Kapsiki_DC: Kwa sebe ta ŋkɛ, pɛtɛ ntsamte ntsə kwa Sɛdɛsiyas, pa hwepete ŋkɛ le zewe lɛ nyi le mze kwa ghwə ghwə bake kezha kele kajive Babilone.
Tupurri: Blam äe se raw äeer nen Sedesiyas go, mbar geyam boo dob wo ne hen ma rawge de äe Babilone.

Francais: Puis les Chaldéens brûlèrent la maison du roi et les maisons du peuple, et démolirent les murailles de Jérusalem.
Anglais: And the Chaldeans burned the king's house, and the houses of the people, with fire, and brake down the walls of Jerusalem.
BIBALDA_TA_PELDETTA: Sum sa Kaldeena ŋal ziyna vi mulla hiɗi sumun goy hiɗi kuta, gulmunna vi Yerusalem nisi ɦom gaa'a.
Bulu: Bekaldééñ be nga diʼi nda njô bôt a nduan a menda me bôte yʼayoñ, wôna be nga kpwé fe mimfine ya Yérusalém.
Guiziga: Hay ngi buy ati hay ngi mizli misi zliliheye gar na, Babiloŋhoy a ɗuvaka taŋ vu a wuram, a mbizlaka mohol ngi Zeruzaleme ma.
Fulfulde_Adamaoua: Kaldiya'en nguli saare laamiiɗo e cuuɗi yimɓe, ɓe ngibbini mahi Urusaliima.
Fulfulde_DC: Kaldiya'en nguli saare laamiiɗo e cuuɗi yimɓe, ɓe ngibbini mahi Urusaliima.
KALATA_KO_SC_Gbaya: Ɓɛɛ nɛ̀ war ko tua-wan in o tua-mbɔi, o be Kaldee pi̧i̧ wee sɛnɛ, ɓɛɛ wa to o garo Jerusalɛm a nù.
KALATA_KO_DC_Gbaya: Ɓɛɛ nɛ̀ war ko tua-wan in o tua-mbɔi, o be Kaldee pi̧i̧ wee sɛnɛ, ɓɛɛ wa to o garo Jerusalɛm a nù.
Kapsiki_DC: Ma mbe Zhɛrəzalɛm ne, pa ka Babilone ndəmte ghɛa meghe ba'a ghɛa mbeli ganji. Pa hɛ mpəmte zli yitea meleme.
Tupurri: Jar Kalde raw wo hee wuu go ne tiñ mani wañ no, go ne tiñ mani jar sirn wo. Saara raw mbug kor ma ti Jerusalem wo go.

Francais: Nabuzardan, capitaine des gardes, emmena captifs à Babylone le reste du peuple qui était demeuré dans la ville, les transfuges qui s'étaient rendus à lui, et le reste du peuple du pays qui était demeuré là.
Anglais: Then Nebuzar–adan the captain of the guard carried away captive into Babylon the remnant of the people that remained in the city, and those that fell away, that fell to him, with the rest of the people that remained.
BIBALDA_TA_PELDETTA: Nebuzaradan, ma ŋolla vi sa ŋomda, yaw sum sa hin hay hoyok-ziyn kafe, hiɗi sum sa vul tuwsi hay ɓalamna kaf, hiɗi caw sumun ma hinna kaf, nam kalsi gorvo'o hay Babilon.
Bulu: Mfaʼa mebukaʼa me bôt me nga too tison, ba be nga kee bebiene be nye, a mebukaʼa me bôt me nga liʼi, Nébuzaradañ, évete bebaʼale, é nga kee be minkôm.
Guiziga: Nebuzaradaŋ, buy ngi mijigina hayaya, a ja mizli misi zlilihey mindiram a Zeruzaleme ati mizli mizizam hirnga, mira lumakaŋ, na zle misi zlilihey mindiram na gar si.
Fulfulde_Adamaoua: Nden Nebuzaradan, hooreejo aynooɓe laamiiɗo hoo'i luttuɓe nder berniwol e hawtannooɓe mo, dahi ɓe haa Baabila.
Fulfulde_DC: Nden Nebuzaradan, hooreejo aynooɓe laamiiɗo hoo'i luttuɓe nder berniwol e hawtannooɓe mo, dahi ɓe haa Baabila.
KALATA_KO_SC_Gbaya: Nɛbuzaradaŋ, gasawi ko o wi-pɛm-wannu kaia o wanmbɔi nɛ̀ ɓɔna so kɔ‘i sɛn saaye in o wi nɛ̀ yuu so mɔ sitɛ a̧ in o oi bíí lɛŋ nɛ̀ bara-biro yaknɛ si Babilɔŋ.
KALATA_KO_DC_Gbaya: Nɛbuzaradaŋ, gasawi ko o wi-pɛm-wannu kaia o wanmbɔi nɛ̀ ɓɔna so kɔ‘i sɛn saaye in o wi nɛ̀ yuu so mɔ sitɛ a̧ in o oi bíí lɛŋ nɛ̀ bara-biro yaknɛ si Babilɔŋ.
Kapsiki_DC: Kəliɓə Nebəwzaradan, wəndə nya te ghəa ka ya meghe fəghe mbeli nyi ketene mbe meleme kajive Babilone, tsagha mbeli nyi kendeke nda ghəa nci ba'a mbeli nyi keɗepe mene wəshi.
Tupurri: Ma jar maga sen gwa' wo äi leege ni, jar maga hay kol wo go wer wañ Babilon de te jar maga hay gwa' wo de tiñ ni mono, Nebusaradan, wañ soden raw rawge de äaara.

Francais: Nabuzardan, capitaine des gardes, laissa dans le pays de Juda quelques-uns des gens pauvres qui ne possédaient rien; et il leur donna des vignes et des champs, en ce jour-là.
Anglais: But Nebuzar–adan the captain of the guard left of the poor of the people, which had nothing, in the land of Judah, and gave them vineyards and fields at the same time.
BIBALDA_TA_PELDETTA: May Nebuzaradan, ma ŋolla vi sa ŋomda hin sum sa haw co'-co'na hiɗi sa va may hay ɓisiɗina hay nagata; nam vulsi gulda-gulda'a, vulsi sine'e kaw.
Bulu: Ve mimbubua mi bôte yʼayoñ, ba be mbe tekeʼe jôm, Nébuzaradañ évete bebaʼale, a nga ve be nguleya liʼi be too si ya Yuda a a nga ve be mindiʼi mi woon a mefube môs ôte.
Guiziga: Amma sey a pul misi murgahay cah asi ruwuy Zuda, mizli misi gwat taŋ anta neˀ ta, dar a vula taŋ guva ngi widis ngi zumoy ati guva ngi huvoy.
Fulfulde_Adamaoua: Walaa mo o acci, sey leesɓe, talaka'en nder lesdi Yahuuda, o hokki ɓe gese e gese inabooje.
Fulfulde_DC: Walaa mo o acci, sey leesɓe, talaka'en nder lesdi Yahuuda, o hokki ɓe gese e gese inabooje.
KALATA_KO_SC_Gbaya: A̧ ee o ŋma wisan ɓɔn tɛ nù‘i, ɓɛɛ a̧ ha̧ o fɔ-nyak-dɔ̧ɔ̧ in o ŋma fɔ ha̧ wa.
KALATA_KO_DC_Gbaya: A̧ ee o ŋma wisan ɓɔn tɛ nù‘i, ɓɛɛ a̧ ha̧ o fɔ-nyak-dɔ̧ɔ̧ in o ŋma fɔ ha̧ wa.
Kapsiki_DC: Ama pa sərəakɛ kwete bela ta ka titikwəa kɛfi, mbeli nyi ɗema wəshi va hɛ mbe Zhəwda, pa nehave nda yɛ wəve ba'a yɛ wəvea rɛzɛŋe ke hɛ.
Tupurri: Ama jar coo ma yoo jar maga mo äaara bay wa mono, Nebusaradan wañ soden raw men rage äil sir Juda ni day haç payre tlalum wo de payre wo ne hara ti wur sen ni.

Francais: Nabuchodonosor, roi de Babylone, donna un ordre à Nabuzardan, chef des gardes, au sujet de Jérémie en ces termes:
Anglais: Now Nebuchadrezzar king of Babylon gave charge concerning Jeremiah to Nebuzar–adan the captain of the guard, saying,
BIBALDA_TA_PELDETTA: Nebukadnesar mulla vi Babilon vul hagata tam Nebuzaradan ma ŋolla vi sa ŋomda kay Yeremiyas ala:
Bulu: Nébukatnétzar, njô bôte ya Babilôn, a nga ve abendé di ajô Yérémi be Nébuzaradañ évete bezimbi na:
Guiziga: Nebuzaradaŋ, buy ngi mijigina hayaya, Nabukodonozor buy madiɗa ngi Babiloŋ a ɓaŋ ɗaˀ le ani vur Zeremi:
Fulfulde_Adamaoua: Nabukodonosor, laamiiɗo Baabila umruno Nebuzaradan, hooreejo aynooɓe muuɗum, ngam daliila Yeremiya, wi'no mo:
Fulfulde_DC: Nabukodonosor, laamiiɗo Baabila umruno Nebuzaradan, hooreejo aynooɓe muuɗum, ngam daliila Yeremiya, wi'no mo:
KALATA_KO_SC_Gbaya: Nabukɔdɔnɔsɔr wannu Babilɔŋ ha̧a̧ so heembea zu mɔ ko Jeremii, ha̧ Nɛbuzaradaŋ gasawi ko o wi-pɛm-wannu'e:
KALATA_KO_DC_Gbaya: Nabukɔdɔnɔsɔr wannu Babilɔŋ ha̧a̧ so heembea zu mɔ ko Jeremii, ha̧ Nɛbuzaradaŋ gasawi ko o wi-pɛm-wannu'e:
Kapsiki_DC: Wa nya ghena nya gezave nda Nabəkodonozor, meghea ka Babilone ke Nebəwzaradan, wəndə te ghəa ka ya meghe te ghəa Zhɛrɛmi nya:
Tupurri: Nebukanetsar wañ Babilon hay fer jag äe le ne Nebusaradan wañ soden wo ti Jermi gano:

Francais: "Prends-le, aie les yeux sur lui, et ne lui fais point de mal; mais agis avec lui comme il te le dira."
Anglais: Take him, and look well to him, and do him no harm; but do unto him even as he shall say unto thee.
BIBALDA_TA_PELDETTA: Yeremiyas zawni naŋ ma vumu, ŋomomu; li va ma joo talamɗi, may naŋ ma li talamu ki nam di taŋ nala.
Bulu: nyoñe nye a fombô nye, te bo nye jam éziñ e nʼabé, ve boʼo nye avalʼa ye wo jô.
Guiziga: «Zuɓa ɓi ngi Zeremi, ki slimiɗ ara, ko ki gaŋ malambaˀ neˀ ta, gwat naŋ mucufuɗ le na, kiɗaŋ may naŋ jaka.»
Fulfulde_Adamaoua: “Hoo'u Yeremiya, hakkilan mo, taa hallan mo sam. Ammaa waɗan mo ko o wi'ete fuu.”
Fulfulde_DC: “Hoo'u Yeremiya, hakkilan mo, taa hallan mo sam. Ammaa waɗan mo ko o wi'ete fuu.”
KALATA_KO_SC_Gbaya: «Mɛ̀ bá a̧, mɛ̀ zɔ́k a̧ nɛ̀ de-a; ká mɛ́ de ŋma ɗaŋmɔ kpɔk in a̧ na, ɓɛɛ mɔ lɛŋ n'aa tɛ ak, mɛ̀ dé ha̧ a̧.»
KALATA_KO_DC_Gbaya: «Mɛ̀ bá a̧, mɛ̀ zɔ́k a̧ nɛ̀ de-a; ká mɛ́ de ŋma ɗaŋmɔ kpɔk in a̧ na, ɓɛɛ mɔ lɛŋ n'aa tɛ ak, mɛ̀ dé ha̧ a̧.»
Kapsiki_DC: «Kelete ŋkɛ, newe ghweme te, mba na kemene nda wəsə kwa ndiremi, ama menete nda wəshi nyi 'yɛwakɛ ŋkɛ.»
Tupurri: Ba ne, day nen äo mo hay ti äe ta', joñn de älagge po me' wa ama joñn do maga aà wii gi ndo nono.

Francais: Nabuzardan, chef des gardes, Nabusezban, chef des eunuques, et Nergal-Séréser, chef des mages,
Anglais: So Nebuzar–adan the captain of the guard sent, and Nebushasban, Rab–saris, and Nergal–sharezer, Rab–mag, and all the king of Babylon's princes;
BIBALDA_TA_PELDETTA: Nebuzaradan ma ŋolla vi sa ŋomda, Nebusazban ma ŋolla vi sa patayna, Nergal-Saretser ma ŋolla vi sa li gul-yalda, hiɗi sa ŋulona vi mulla vi Babilon kaf,
Bulu: Nébuzaradañ évete bezimbi, Nébukazbañ évete bemiak, Nergal-Saretser évete beyememam a bivete bi njô bôte ya Babilôn bise,
Guiziga: Nebuzaradaŋ, buy ngi mijigina hayaya, Nebusasbaŋ madiɗa ngi mizli ngi wazlarayay, Nergal-Sareser madiɗa ngi soje Babiloŋhoy cek, waɗ soje madiɗa mekelemey ngi buy Babiloŋhoy cek ma,
Fulfulde_Adamaoua: Ngam man Nebuzaradan, mawɗo saraaki'en e Nebusazaban, ardiiɗo annduɓe alaamaaji koode e Nergal-Sarecer e mawɓe laamiiɗo Baabila fuu
Fulfulde_DC: Ngam man Nebuzaradan, mawɗo saraaki'en e Nebusazaban, ardiiɗo annduɓe alaamaaji koode e Nergal-Sarecer e mawɓe laamiiɗo Baabila fuu
KALATA_KO_SC_Gbaya: Nɛbuzaradaŋ gasawi zu o wi-pɛm-wannu, Nɛbusasbaŋ gasawi kɔ̧̀ kira ko wannu, Nɛrgal-Sarɛsɛr gasawi ko o wi-biro ká bá nɛ̀ o oi gasa wi-biro ko wannu Babilɔŋ lɛŋ
KALATA_KO_DC_Gbaya: Nɛbuzaradaŋ gasawi zu o wi-pɛm-wannu, Nɛbusasbaŋ gasawi kɔ̧̀ kira ko wannu, Nɛrgal-Sarɛsɛr gasawi ko o wi-biro ká bá nɛ̀ o oi gasa wi-biro ko wannu Babilɔŋ lɛŋ
Kapsiki_DC: Pa Nebəwzaradan, wəndə te ghəa ka ya meghe tsahwe ghena le yɛ Nebəwshazdan, wəndə nya te ghəa mbelia jama, Nɛrgal-Sarɛsɛr, wəndə nya te ghəa ka mene ghwɛ le kweci mbelia jama ta ka sewajɛa meghea ka Babilone.
Tupurri: Nebusaradan wañ soden wo lay, Nebusasban wañ jar ma de ndar äayn wo lay, Negal-Saretser wañ jar ko wer feçeçren wo de jar kluuri mani wañ Babilon,

Francais: et tous les chefs du roi de Babylone envoyèrent prendre Jérémie dans la cour de garde, et ils le remirent à Godolias, fils d'Ahicam, fils de Saphan, pour le conduire dans sa maison. Et il demeura au milieu du peuple.
Anglais: Even they sent, and took Jeremiah out of the court of the prison, and committed him unto Gedaliah the son of Ahikam the son of Shaphan, that he should carry him home: so he dwelt among the people.
BIBALDA_TA_PELDETTA: nisi gi sunda kay Yeremiyas hay wur-daŋŋa vi daŋgayna, nisi vulum hay ɓam Gedaliya goora vi Ahikam, goora vi Safan, kay nam naram vo valamu. Nam mus jar sumuna.
Bulu: be nga lôme bôte na be nyoñe Yérémi nseñe bebaʼale mimbôk a kalane nye be Gedalia e mone Ahikam, ndaé Safan, na a kee nye nda jé. A a nga tabe ézezañe bôte yʼayoñ.
Guiziga: a slinam nga supo Zeremi a wazlaray mijigina hayaya, ɓa a pulaka asi haŋ ngi Gedaliya, mangal ngi Ahikam, i dideˀ ngi Safaŋ, ɓa Gedaliya a pulaŋ jiviɗ aru silaŋ ngi hay naŋ. Naŋ kine, Zeremi micifi a wuzla mizli.
Fulfulde_Adamaoua: neli ɗaɓɓitoygo Yeremiya haa daldal saare laamiiɗo haa aynooɓe aynata. Ɓe acci mo haa juŋngo Gedaliya ɓii Ahikam ɓii Safan, ngam o hoora mo jam. Bana nii Yeremiya jooɗori caka ummaatoore.
Fulfulde_DC: neli ɗaɓɓitoygo Yeremiya haa daldal saare laamiiɗo haa aynooɓe aynata. Ɓe acci mo haa juŋngo Gedaliya ɓii Ahikam ɓii Safan, ngam o hoora mo jam. Bana nii Yeremiya jooɗori caka ummaatoore.
KALATA_KO_SC_Gbaya: toma ha̧ wa mɛ ba Jeremii sɛn beegara ko o wi-pɛm-mɔ tɛnɛ mɛ e a̧ er Gedelias bem ko Ahikam, bem ko Safaŋ nɛ̀ tɛ e ha̧ a̧ mɛ si ɗoŋ tɛ̀ kɔ̧-a̧. Nɛ́ hegɔ a̧ Jeremii ɓɔna nɛnɛ mgbara dukbíí.
KALATA_KO_DC_Gbaya: toma ha̧ wa mɛ ba Jeremii sɛn beegara ko o wi-pɛm-mɔ tɛnɛ mɛ e a̧ er Gedelias bem ko Ahikam, bem ko Safaŋ nɛ̀ tɛ e ha̧ a̧ mɛ si ɗoŋ tɛ̀ kɔ̧-a̧. Nɛ́ hegɔ a̧ Jeremii ɓɔna nɛnɛ mgbara dukbíí.
Kapsiki_DC: Pa hɛ ghweneghe mbeli kaheka Zhɛrɛmi ki ghɛa ka ya ŋkwa kezha ve nda ke Gedaliya, wəzege ta Ahikam ba'a shia Shafan, nya ketepele nda hweŋkwa kalə sha ghɛa ŋkɛ. Tsetse nda se Zhɛrɛmi kanza hwa mbeli.
Tupurri: raw wo ba Jermi le go äi feele tiñ dañgay no, raw wo haçge äe ne Gedaliya je ni Ahikam je ni Safan nen maga aà mo wo de äe liñ ni äe. Jermi raw gwa'ge yoo jarn ni.

Francais: La parole de Yahweh fut adressée à Jérémie, pendant qu'il était enfermé dans la cour de garde, en ces termes:
Anglais: Now the word of the  Lord  came unto Jeremiah, while he was shut up in the court of the prison, saying,
BIBALDA_TA_PELDETTA: Hay li ma Yeremiyas ka giy daŋgaya hay wur-daŋŋa vi daŋgayna, Ma-Vatɗina ka di yoboyn talam ala:
Bulu: Ajô Nti e nga litibane be Yérémi nté a nga too mbôk nseñe bebaʼale mimbôʼô na:
Guiziga: Ti di Zeremi muro giceˀ a wazlaray mijigina hayay zleˀe na, Bumbulvuŋ a ɓa Zeremi ani:
Fulfulde_Adamaoua: Saa'i Yeremiya ɗonno haɓɓi haa daldal saare laamiiɗo haa aynooɓe aynata, Jawmiraawo wolwani mo, wi'i:
Fulfulde_DC: Saa'i Yeremiya ɗonno haɓɓi haa daldal saare laamiiɗo haa aynooɓe aynata, Jawmiraawo wolwani mo, wi'i:
KALATA_KO_SC_Gbaya: GASA WAN tɔ̧ɔ̧ ha̧ Jeremii hee mɔ'ɔ ga ŋgimbi nɛ̀ wa kpee so nɛ̀ a̧ e kɔ̧́ beegara ko o wi-pɛm-mɔ.
KALATA_KO_DC_Gbaya: GASA WAN tɔ̧ɔ̧ ha̧ Jeremii hee mɔ'ɔ ga ŋgimbi nɛ̀ wa kpee so nɛ̀ a̧ e kɔ̧́ beegara ko o wi-pɛm-mɔ.
Kapsiki_DC: Ma ke ghena ta Mahwətə gezeke nda geva ke Zhɛrɛmi vəa ŋkwa nya nza ŋkɛ mba kwa daŋgayɛ ki ghɛa ka ya ŋkwa:
Tupurri: Manwur kal waçaç waçaçre ne Jermi de maga aà hay de diggi äi feele tiñ dañgayn do kay nono gano:

Francais: Va, parle à Abdémélech, l'Ethiopien, et dis-lui: Ainsi parle Yahweh des armées, Dieu d'Israël: Voici que je vais exécuter mes paroles sur cette ville, pour le mal, et non pour le bien, et ces choses seront en ce jour-là sous tes yeux.
Anglais: Go and speak to Ebed–melech the Ethiopian, saying, Thus saith the  Lord  of hosts, the God of Israel; Behold, I will bring my words upon this city for evil, and not for good; and they shall be accomplished in that day before thee.
BIBALDA_TA_PELDETTA: Tuɗaŋu, lawaŋ tam Ebed-Melek ma Etiopiyana ala: Ma-Vatɗina vi vok-ma-duura, Lawna vi Israyel ka di'e: Humaŋu, nan min hin slen ma joona ma nan dum kay hoyok-ziyn tani co kalamu, may mi slen ma ŋaanɗi; sle namna naŋ ma wumu hay buur ma vokayna.
Bulu: kelek a kobô Ebéd-Mélék, môte yʼEtiôpi, a jô nye na: Avale di Nti ya minsamba mewosan, e Zambe Israél a jô na: Ô lôô, ma ye zuu jam me nga kobô ajô tisone nyô, asu bidim, saake asu mvaé; jame te da ye kui môs ôte mise môé me lôô.
Guiziga: «A ra ɓa mingiɓi ani da Ebet-Melek, mbur Etiyopi: ‹Bumbulvuŋ misi gidaŋ wãˀ, Buymisemuŋ ngi Israyel a ɓi na: I wuɗ i ra luuma walahay hana tris ti ɓi ya miɓa taŋ tuwa, anta ngi gaŋ mezle ta, amma ngi gaŋ malambaˀa, kisa pura tapasa ti hiri ɗiki.
Fulfulde_Adamaoua: “Yah, yeccu Ebed-Melek Etiyopiyaajo: Ndaa nii Jawmiraawo honooɓe asama, Allah Isra'iila wi'i: Mi timminan ko mbi'mi dow berniwol ngo'ol. Mi ukkanan ngol sarru, naa hayru, an bee hoore ma a yi'an ɗum nyannde man.
Fulfulde_DC: “Yah, yeccu Ebed-Melek Etiyopiyaajo: Ndaa nii Jawmiraawo honooɓe asama, Allah Isra'iila wi'i: Mi timminan ko mbi'mi dow berniwol ngo'ol. Mi ukkanan ngol sarru, naa hayru, an bee hoore ma a yi'an ɗum nyannde man.
KALATA_KO_SC_Gbaya: «Mɛ̀ nɛ́ɛ̀ tɔ̧ ha̧ Ebɛd-Mɛlɛk be Kus hee ndé, wen nɛ̀ GASA WAN nɛ̀ a̧a̧ nɛ̀ ŋgayamɔ lɛŋ, Sɔ̧ ko  Israɛl  tɔ̧ nɛ́ mɔ'ɔ: Mi tɛ de ha̧ mɔ n'am tɔ̧ɔ̧ so wen-aa zu ye’ɛ mɛ hɔ gba̧a̧. Mi tɛ pi̧ nɛ́ ŋgamɔ zu ye’ɛ, nɛ̀ bó nɛ́ demɔ na. Mɛ tɛ zɔk kànà mɔ‘i nɛ̀ yí-mɛ́.»
KALATA_KO_DC_Gbaya: «Mɛ̀ nɛ́ɛ̀ tɔ̧ ha̧ Ebɛd-Mɛlɛk be Kus hee ndé, wen nɛ̀ GASA WAN nɛ̀ a̧a̧ nɛ̀ ŋgayamɔ lɛŋ, Sɔ̧ ko  Israɛl  tɔ̧ nɛ́ mɔ'ɔ: Mi tɛ de ha̧ mɔ n'am tɔ̧ɔ̧ so wen-aa zu ye’ɛ mɛ hɔ gba̧a̧. Mi tɛ pi̧ nɛ́ ŋgamɔ zu ye’ɛ, nɛ̀ bó nɛ́ demɔ na. Mɛ tɛ zɔk kànà mɔ‘i nɛ̀ yí-mɛ́.»
Kapsiki_DC: «Kwiɗi shɛ na gezete nda ke Ɛbɛd-Mɛlɛk nya kande Ɛtiyopi: ‹Wa nya ghena nya geze Mahwətə nde berete, Shala ta ka Israyɛl nya: Nahe 'ya kezlapete nda ndiremi ke mbeli nyi mbe meleme nya, ama zeɗe nza we. Vatse gɛ ne, 'ya katemene wəsə nya gezete 'ya, katenakɛ na le ntsə ta ŋa.
Tupurri: See wo waçaç waçaçre ne Ebed-Meleg je Etiyopi no day ni ndo riñn gano: Manwur Pantway, Baa ma Israyeln waçaç do kay nono gano: Ko ga ndi day age de fen maga ndi hay waçaçn go ne äi leegen ti, diñ fen maga a ge de ree ne hara ti bay diñ fen ma de el see äaara wa. Ree sen joñ ge ti naw sen la de nen äo.

Francais: Mais je te délivrerai en ce jour-là, - oracle de Yahweh, - et tu ne seras pas livré aux mains des hommes que tu crains.
Anglais: But I will deliver thee in that day, saith the  Lord : and thou shalt not be given into the hand of the men of whom thou art afraid.
BIBALDA_TA_PELDETTA: May hay buur namna ɗawni, nan ma butaŋ goyo, Din mi Ma-Vatɗina, sa tuwaŋ li nar kisina naŋ ma vulis goy hay ɓisiɗi.
Bulu: Ve môs ôte ma ye nyii wo nalé Nti a jô, a wo ye bo te keeban e mo me bôte wo ko woñ.
Guiziga: Tapasa, i sa cukuw tir bonoyo, yo mizli ka mazluwun ti taŋ na, y'anta sa puluw asi haŋ taŋ ta. I ya Bumbulvuŋ maɓi.
Fulfulde_Adamaoua: Ammaa mi hisnete nyalaade man. A hokkataake haa juuɗe yimɓe ɓe kulata.
Fulfulde_DC: Ammaa mi hisnete nyalaade man. A hokkataake haa juuɗe yimɓe ɓe kulata.
KALATA_KO_SC_Gbaya: GASA WAN tɔ̧a: «Wese'i, mi tɛ gbo mɛ er o wi nɛ̀ mɛ de kíí-wa.
KALATA_KO_DC_Gbaya: GASA WAN tɔ̧a: «Wese'i, mi tɛ gbo mɛ er o wi nɛ̀ mɛ de kíí-wa.
Kapsiki_DC: Ama te veci nya tese ndiremia shɛ ne, katembele ŋa 'ya va mbeli nyi ghazlənə nyi na va hɛ, wa'a ke Mahwətə.
Tupurri: Ama ti wur sen mono ndi yaçaç ge ndo yañ go. Kay diñ jag Manwuri. Ndo joñ ge go äi coo do jar maga ndo de ma joñheçeçne äaara mo gaè.

Francais: Je te ferai sûrement échapper, et tu ne tomberas pas sous l'épée; tu auras ta vie pour butin, parce que tu t’es confié en moi, - oracle de Yahweh.
Anglais: For I will surely deliver thee, and thou shalt not fall by the sword, but thy life shall be for a prey unto thee: because thou hast put thy trust in me, saith the  Lord .
BIBALDA_TA_PELDETTA: Nan ma suɗaŋ goyo, kew-gaferaŋa ma caŋ goyɗi; irita vaŋu ma li ŋomiya, kay naŋ tun ŋalda vaŋ kanu, Din mi Ma-Vatɗina.
Bulu: Ma ye bo na ô tup, a wo ye bo te ku a nkpwaté mekôn; ényiñe jôé ja ye bo jôme jôé ya nsa, amu ô nga tabe ma ndi, nalé Nti a jô.
Guiziga: I sa lihuw gisiŋ gisiŋ, anta sa kuɗukuw ti maslalam ta. Ki sa laha hutuŋ ɗike na, asi ki puliy vu ɗike le mbak da ya. I ya Bumbulvuŋ maɓi.›»
Fulfulde_Adamaoua: Mi aynete fakat, ngam taa a maaya bee kaafahi. A hisnan yoŋki ma ngam a hoolake yam.” Non Jawmiraawo wi'i.
Fulfulde_DC: Mi aynete fakat, ngam taa a maaya bee kaafahi. A hisnan yoŋki ma ngam a hoolake yam.” Non Jawmiraawo wi'i.
KALATA_KO_SC_Gbaya: Mi tɛ kpasi mɛ nɛ̀ mbetɛ, mɛ beka fe fio gba-paa na. Kà mɛ ha̧ tɛ-mɛ ha̧‘m, mɛ tɛ duk nɛ̀ desee wen nɛ̀ mɛ kpasa. Nɛ́ GASA WAN a̧ tɔ̧ɔ̧ hegɔ.»
KALATA_KO_DC_Gbaya: Mi tɛ kpasi mɛ nɛ̀ mbetɛ, mɛ beka fe fio gba-paa na. Kà mɛ ha̧ tɛ-mɛ ha̧‘m, mɛ tɛ duk nɛ̀ desee wen nɛ̀ mɛ kpasa. Nɛ́ GASA WAN a̧ tɔ̧ɔ̧ hegɔ.»
Kapsiki_DC: Kaganda tembele ŋa 'ya, katemte na va kafayɛ we. Katembele mpia ŋa na, kwa nza ŋkɛ nahe na kendeke ɗa ghəa ŋa. Nya ya kaghena nya gezete Mahwətə.›»
Tupurri: Ndi joñ ge yañ ga ndo yaçaç go jag äaara day moslam taw ge ndo go gaè. Da'ge äon joñ ge na diñ tenen äo no werga ndo hay kañ ëiggi ti äi mono. Kay diñ jag Manwuri.

Francais: La parole qui fut adressée à Jérémie de la part de Yahweh, après que Nabuzardan, chef des gardes, l'eut envoyé de Rama, l'ayant fait prendre quand il était lié de chaînes au milieu de tous les captifs de Jérusalem et de Juda qu'on déportait à Babylone.
Anglais: The word that came to Jeremiah from the  Lord , after that Nebuzar–adan the captain of the guard had let him go from Ramah, when he had taken him being bound in chains among all that were carried away captive of Jerusalem and Judah, which were carried away captive unto Babylon.
BIBALDA_TA_PELDETTA: Ma-Vatɗina ka di yoboyna valam tam Yeremiyas, kayni bugol liy ma Nebuzaradan ma ŋolla vi sa ŋomda gum iram goy hay Rama gina. Hay li ma nam tuɗ garam kayni, Yeremiyas ay juni hiɗi jaɓna jar sa gorvona vi Yuda hiɗi Yerusalem kaf sa nisi min narsi hay Babilon.
Bulu: Ajô e nga litibane be Yérémi e soʼo be Nti, éyoñe te Nébuzaradañ évete bezimbi a maneya suu nye Rama. Eyoñ a nga bo na be nyoñe nye, Yérémi a mbe nkaʼan a bengôkop ézezañe bekee minkôme ya Yérusalém a Yuda, be nga ke minkôme Babilôn.
Guiziga: Nebuzaradaŋ, madiɗa ngi mijigina wazlarayay, mupula Zeremi ɓa a cuh baɗ ti Rama na, Bumbulvuŋ a ɓaŋ ɓi le. Nebuzaradaŋ muzuɓa ɓi ngi Zeremi na, naɓa i mujuwa le zleˀe ti celelu a wuzla mizli dangay ngi Zeruzalemey ati ngi Zudahay mijaka taŋ gar nga Babiloŋ na.
Fulfulde_Adamaoua: Jawmiraawo wolwani Yeremiya, ɓaawo Nebuzaradan, hooreejo aynooɓe laamiiɗo rimɗini mo haa Rama. Ɓe njahrno mo ton, o kaɓɓaaɗo bee callalluuji, caka yimɓe Urusaliima e Yahuuda, daheteeɓe  haa Baabila fuu.
Fulfulde_DC: Jawmiraawo wolwani Yeremiya, ɓaawo Nebuzaradan, hooreejo aynooɓe laamiiɗo rimɗini mo haa Rama. Ɓe njahrno mo ton, o kaɓɓaaɗo bee callalluuji, caka yimɓe Urusaliima e Yahuuda, daheteeɓe  haa Baabila fuu.
KALATA_KO_SC_Gbaya: GASA WAN tɔ̧ɔ̧ wen ha̧ Jeremii ɗoŋ nɛ̀ Nɛbuzaradaŋ gasawi zu o wi-pɛm-wannu gboo so nɛ̀ a̧ yinɛ sɛn Rama. Wa hɛra so Jeremii nɛ̀ nyak-boi pi̧ mgbara o bara-biro nɛ̀ wa kai yaknɛ nɛ̀ Jerusalɛm in nɛ̀ nù ko Juda si Babilɔŋ mɛ. Nɛ́ hi̧i̧ a̧ Nɛbuzaradaŋ kpaa nɛ̀ a̧,
KALATA_KO_DC_Gbaya: GASA WAN tɔ̧ɔ̧ wen ha̧ Jeremii ɗoŋ nɛ̀ Nɛbuzaradaŋ gasawi zu o wi-pɛm-wannu gboo so nɛ̀ a̧ yinɛ sɛn Rama. Wa hɛra so Jeremii nɛ̀ nyak-boi pi̧ mgbara o bara-biro nɛ̀ wa kai yaknɛ nɛ̀ Jerusalɛm in nɛ̀ nù ko Juda si Babilɔŋ mɛ. Nɛ́ hi̧i̧ a̧ Nɛbuzaradaŋ kpaa nɛ̀ a̧,
Kapsiki_DC: Pa Mahwətə gezete nda ghena ke Zhɛrɛmi kwa sebe ta nya mbelemte ŋkɛ Nebəwzaradan, wəndə te ghəa ka ya meghe mbe Rama. Tehwepe Zhɛrɛmi kwa zewe lɛ hwa ka Zhɛrəzalɛm ba'a ka Zhəwda nyi ketefə geva kajive Babilone nda mbelemte ŋkɛ.
Tupurri: Waçaçre maga Manwur waçaçn ne Jermi blam maga Nebusaradan wañ soden men faage go ne hen ma rawge wo Rama mono. De maga Nebusaradan hay ban mono, Jermi hay de laa rece' do yoo jar maga aè hoo ra le Jerusalem wo de sir Juda ma woge de äaara ti dañgay Babilon mono.

Francais: Le chef des gardes prit Jérémie et lui dit: "Yahweh, ton Dieu, avait annoncé ce malheur contre ce lieu,
Anglais: And the captain of the guard took Jeremiah, and said unto him, The  Lord  thy God hath pronounced this evil upon this place.
BIBALDA_TA_PELDETTA: Ma ŋolla vi sa ŋomda gi sunda kay gar Yeremiyas aya, ka dum ala: Ma-Vatɗina Lawna vaŋu di kay slen ma joona ma li kat liyn tani;
Bulu: Evete bezimbi é nga nyoñe Yérémi a jô nye na: Nti, e Zambe wôé, a nga kate foé ajô bidime bi, mbie bia wosane tisone nyô;
Guiziga: Buy ngi mijigina hayay a zuɓa ɓi ngi Zeremi le da naŋ, a ɓaŋ na: «Micico ɓi ngi bonoy ng'ar li misenna, i Bumbulvuŋ, Buymisemuŋ ɗiki.
Fulfulde_Adamaoua: Hooreejo aynooɓe go umri waddugo Yeremiya, wi'i mo: “Jawmiraawo Allah maaɗa wolwuno haala sarru ngu'u dow lesdi ndi'i.
Fulfulde_DC: Hooreejo aynooɓe go umri waddugo Yeremiya, wi'i mo: “Jawmiraawo Allah maaɗa wolwuno haala sarru ngu'u dow lesdi ndi'i.
KALATA_KO_SC_Gbaya: ba a̧ yinɛ mgbara wa, ɓɛɛ tɔ̧ ha̧ a̧: «Mɛ̀ nɛ́ GASA WAN Sɔ̧ kɔ-mɛ a̧ tɔ̧ɔ̧ so wen zu pɛrti bɔnɛ hegɔ mɛ tik fara’ɛ.
KALATA_KO_DC_Gbaya: ba a̧ yinɛ mgbara wa, ɓɛɛ tɔ̧ ha̧ a̧: «Mɛ̀ nɛ́ GASA WAN Sɔ̧ kɔ-mɛ a̧ tɔ̧ɔ̧ so wen zu pɛrti bɔnɛ hegɔ mɛ tik fara’ɛ.
Kapsiki_DC: Pa wəndə nya te ghəa ka ya meghe hekakɛ Zhɛrɛmi kwetɛŋenyɛ, ma ke shɛ: «Nahe Shala Mahwətə ta ŋa ketarete kave ndiremi nya kadzete meleme nya.
Tupurri: Wañ soden raw ba Jermi day riñn gano: Manwuri, Baa äon hay waçaç go ti ree maga de caa ngeeln mo ta' la no.

Francais: et il l'a fait venir; et Yahweh a fait comme il avait dit; parce que vous avez péché contre Yahweh et que vous n'avez point obéi à sa voix, cette chose vous est arrivée.
Anglais: Now the  Lord  hath brought it, and done according as he hath said: because ye have sinned against the  Lord , and have not obeyed his voice, therefore this thing is come upon you.
BIBALDA_TA_PELDETTA: slen ma Ma-Vatɗin di kalamna nam hinimawa co'o, nam hobom vunamawa kaw, slen kayni co kigiya kay nigi li sulukawa kat Ma-Vatɗina, ma nigi min humum delemɗina.
Bulu: Nti a boya a tôé jam a nga kate foé, amu mi nga bo Nti abé , a bo te vôʼôlô tyiñe jé. Jam a nga kate foé e kuiya foʼo be mia.
Guiziga: Bumbulvuŋ a so ti bonoyo le, a gi di i gwat mikaslsla kaɓa naŋ ɓi micica ɓi naŋ. Gwat mindilo kahana na, asi ki zluɓaka le, ki cinaka mi da Bumbulvuŋ ta.
Fulfulde_Adamaoua: Jonta o timmini ko o wi'no, ngam on mbaɗi hakke dow Jawmiraawo, on ɗowtanaaki mo. Ngam maajum kuuje ɗe'e fuu laatanake on.
Fulfulde_DC: Jonta o timmini ko o wi'no, ngam on mbaɗi hakke dow Jawmiraawo, on ɗowtanaaki mo. Ngam maajum kuuje ɗe'e fuu laatanake on.
KALATA_KO_SC_Gbaya: Ɓɛɛ GASA WAN fo bɔnɛ‘i tɛnɛ, a̧ dee mɔ nyɛm nɛ̀ ɗoŋ mɔ n'aa tɔ̧ɔ̧ so. Mɛ̀ nɛ́ wen n’ɛnɛ dee ɗaŋmɔ sitɛ GASA WAN, wen n’ɛnɛ zii wen nú-a na, ɓɛɛ sa mɔ‘i hɔ.
KALATA_KO_DC_Gbaya: Ɓɛɛ GASA WAN fo bɔnɛ‘i tɛnɛ, a̧ dee mɔ nyɛm nɛ̀ ɗoŋ mɔ n'aa tɔ̧ɔ̧ so. Mɛ̀ nɛ́ wen n’ɛnɛ dee ɗaŋmɔ sitɛ GASA WAN, wen n’ɛnɛ zii wen nú-a na, ɓɛɛ sa mɔ‘i hɔ.
Kapsiki_DC: Ma tsetsenya ne, nahe ŋkɛ kemenete wəsə nya gezete ŋkɛ, kwa nza ŋkɛ fete ya va gheyɛ kwa ɗema yɛ kese kahawe va ghena nyi gezete ŋayɛ ŋkɛ. Vatse menete ŋayɛ geva wəshi nyi.
Tupurri: Manwur raw age de äe day bag jag fen maga se hay waçaçn go wer maga nday hay joñ älagge see Manwuri, nday day laa jag äe gaè. Fen maga aà hay waçaçn go raw age ne nday ti so.

Francais: Et maintenant, voici que je te délie aujourd'hui des chaînes que tu avais aux mains. S'il paraît bon à tes yeux de venir avec moi à Babylone, viens, et j'aurai mes yeux sur toi; mais s'il paraît mauvais à tes yeux de venir avec moi à Babylone, laisse cela. Regarde, tout le pays est devant toi; là où il paraîtra bon et convenable à tes yeux d'aller, vas-y."
Anglais: And now, behold, I loose thee this day from the chains which were upon thine hand. If it seem good unto thee to come with me into Babylon, come; and I will look well unto thee: but if it seem ill unto thee to come with me into Babylon, forbear: behold, all the land is before thee: whither it seemeth good and convenient for thee to go, thither go.
BIBALDA_TA_PELDETTA: Wulin kayn humaŋu, nan but jaɓ ma hay ɓaŋŋa goy vaydi, la naŋ min co hiɗi nanu hay Babilon, naŋaya, nan ma kotaŋ tuwaŋu; la dikaŋ may firi kay co hiɗi nanɗi, musaŋu; ɗuwaŋu, nagat kaf ka vokaŋ hiriŋ-hiriŋ', tuɗaŋ hay liy ma kiraŋ ŋaana.
Bulu: Eyoñe ji ô lôô, ma vaa wo bengôkop be ne wo mo; nge da yené mvaé be wo na bia wo bi ke Babilôn, zaʼak, ma ye fombô wo, nge ô nji yene mvaé ja yiane wo na bia wo bi ke Babilôn, te zu; fombôʼô, si ése é ne wo ôsu, kele vôme wo ye yene mvaé a vôme a ye yiane wo na ô ke.
Guiziga: Amma wurenna, dana dana vuna si na, i cukuw tir celelu ɗik avra. Da ki wuɗ kis ɗu le nga Babiloŋ na, sawa, i sa ki slimiɗ ar ka, amma da may ɗik anta ya kwana, ki so ta. Hirwuyo n'ani a mbuŋ ɗike, ka ru ng'ar li ka muwuɗ le.
Fulfulde_Adamaoua: Jonta piistanmi callalluuji haa juuɗe ma, mi rimɗine. To ɗum fottani ma a yahda bee am haa Baabila, nden kam war, min boo mi hakkilante. Ammaa to ɗum fottanaay ma, nden kam taa war. Ndaa, lesdi fuu ɗon we'iti yeeso maaɗa, yah haa ngiɗɗa fuu.”
Fulfulde_DC: Jonta piistanmi callalluuji haa juuɗe ma, mi rimɗine. To ɗum fottani ma a yahda bee am haa Baabila, nden kam war, min boo mi hakkilante. Ammaa to ɗum fottanaay ma, nden kam taa war. Ndaa, lesdi fuu ɗon we'iti yeeso maaɗa, yah haa ngiɗɗa fuu.”
KALATA_KO_SC_Gbaya: Ɓɛɛ sɔsɔɔ kinii'i, mi bura nyak zɔɓɔ er-mɛ yinɛ; kà mɛ nɛ́ kɔ̧ɔ̧ mɛ nɛ̀ in am si Babilɔŋ mɛ, mɛ̀ tɛ́, ɛ̀ɛ̀ yàk, mi tɛ zɔk mɛ nɛ̀ de-a; ɓɛɛ kà mɛ nɛ́ bɛ̧ɛ̧ nɛa-a in am si Babilɔŋ, ká mɛ́ tɛ na. Nù lɛŋ a̧a̧ ti mɛ, mɛ̀ hók fara lɛŋ nɛ̀ mɛ kɔ̧ɔ̧ mɛ nɛ sɛnɛ.
KALATA_KO_DC_Gbaya: Ɓɛɛ sɔsɔɔ kinii'i, mi bura nyak zɔɓɔ er-mɛ yinɛ; kà mɛ nɛ́ kɔ̧ɔ̧ mɛ nɛ̀ in am si Babilɔŋ mɛ, mɛ̀ tɛ́, ɛ̀ɛ̀ yàk, mi tɛ zɔk mɛ nɛ̀ de-a; ɓɛɛ kà mɛ nɛ́ bɛ̧ɛ̧ nɛa-a in am si Babilɔŋ, ká mɛ́ tɛ na. Nù lɛŋ a̧a̧ ti mɛ, mɛ̀ hók fara lɛŋ nɛ̀ mɛ kɔ̧ɔ̧ mɛ nɛ sɛnɛ.
Kapsiki_DC: Ama ɓeshi nya gɛ ne, 'ya kapele zewe lɛ nyi kwa dzeve va gha. Ma keɗe na kabeghe ɗa kajive Babilone ne, mbi ɓə, katenewe ghweme 'ya te gha. Ama keɗema jive Babilone na ne, nza ŋa. Waɗe hweŋkwa va gha kalə te yayata ŋkwa nya ɗe na te hɛɗi nya.
Tupurri: Patala ndi pog rece' go ne ndo do. Hayga ndo ko we nen äo de el ga ndo raw mbo wer äi Babilon no, ni ndo wo mbo ndi kañ ge nen äi yañ ti äo. Day hayga aà coo we jag äo gaa ndo wo wer äi Babilon gaa lay no, ni ndo wo mbo wa lay Ko nen äo, sirn wo mo ti' äuy pel äo no, wo ti ngeel maga ndo kon de ele day coo jag äo ga ndo wo ni mono.

Francais: Comme Jérémie tardait à s'en aller: "Retourne, ajouta-t-il, vers Godolias, fils d'Ahicam, fils de Saphan, que le roi de Babylone a établi sur les villes de Juda, et demeure avec lui au milieu du peuple; ou bien va où il te plaira." Et le chef des gardes lui donna des vivres et des présents, et le congédia.
Anglais: Now while he was not yet gone back, he said, Go back also to Gedaliah the son of Ahikam the son of Shaphan, whom the king of Babylon hath made governor over the cities of Judah, and dwell with him among the people: or go wheresoever it seemeth convenient unto thee to go. So the captain of the guard gave him victuals and a reward, and let him go.
BIBALDA_TA_PELDETTA: Kay nam min hot dit gosoyɗi, nam hot dum ala: hotaŋ kat Gedaliya, goora vi Ahikam, goora vi Safan, ma mulla vi Babilon tunum kay hoyok-ziyna vi Yuda, musaŋ hiɗi namu jar sumuna, lebo naŋ as tuɗ hay liyn ma kiraŋ ŋaa'a kay naŋ as tuɗ haya. Ma ŋolla vi sa ŋomda vulum sle ma ti kalamu, vulum sle mara'a kaw, gum iramu.
Bulu: Yérémi a ngenan te yalan, nde évete bezimbi ja beta jô nye na: Bulaʼane be Gedalia e mone Ahikam, ndaé Safan, nye njô bôt ya Babilôn a nga telé e bitisone ya Yuda, a mia nye, tabaʼane bôte yʼayoñ été; nge na kele vôm ase wo ye yene mvaé ya ke. Evete bezimbi é nga ve nye bidi a memvaka a suu nye.
Guiziga: Da ki ngum cifi ati ya ta na, mi a muŋ ng'avi Gedaliya mangal ngi Ahikam, dideˀ ngi Safaŋ, buy madiɗa ngi Babiloŋ a cifaŋ le i buy miwi walahay Zudahay. A ra cifam ava a wuzla mizli vuna, malla ta na, aru ng'ar li ka muwuɗ le gar.» Dar buy ngi mijigina hayay, a vula gwat ngi zum da Zeremi waɗ gwatay, a pulaŋ a ru.
Fulfulde_Adamaoua: Ammaa Yeremiya dillaay tawon. Ngam maajum Nebuzaradan wi'i mo: “Lorta haa Gedaliya ɓii Ahikam ɓii Safan mo laamiiɗo Baabila waɗi ngomna dow gure Yahuuda. Jooɗoda bee maako caka yimɓe malla yah haa nokkuure koo ndeye fottanannde ma fuu.” Nden o hokki mo dokkal e njooɓaari laawol, o jaɓɓiti mo.
Fulfulde_DC: Ammaa Yeremiya dillaay tawon. Ngam maajum Nebuzaradan wi'i mo: “Lorta haa Gedaliya ɓii Ahikam ɓii Safan mo laamiiɗo Baabila waɗi ngomna dow gure Yahuuda. Jooɗoda bee maako caka yimɓe malla yah haa nokkuure koo ndeye fottanannde ma fuu.” Nden o hokki mo dokkal e njooɓaari laawol, o jaɓɓiti mo.
KALATA_KO_SC_Gbaya: «Kà mɛ kɔ̧ mɛ duk in am na, mɛ̀ sí ɗoŋ si katɛ Gedalias bem ko Ahikam, bem ko Safaŋ, nɛ̀ wannu Babilɔŋ ee mɛ duk zu o ye Juda, a̧ mɛ̀ dúk in a̧ mgbara dukbíí; kóó mɛ nyɛma nɛa-a fara lɛŋ nɛ̀ mɛ kɔ̧ɔ̧, nyɛm nɛ̀ ɗoŋ hokamɔ kɔ-mɛ.» Gasawi ko o wi-pɛm-wannu ha̧a̧ o nyɔŋmɔ in ŋma ha̧a̧mɔ ha̧ a̧, ɓɛɛ e a̧ yak.
KALATA_KO_DC_Gbaya: «Kà mɛ kɔ̧ mɛ duk in am na, mɛ̀ sí ɗoŋ si katɛ Gedalias bem ko Ahikam, bem ko Safaŋ, nɛ̀ wannu Babilɔŋ ee mɛ duk zu o ye Juda, a̧ mɛ̀ dúk in a̧ mgbara dukbíí; kóó mɛ nyɛma nɛa-a fara lɛŋ nɛ̀ mɛ kɔ̧ɔ̧, nyɛm nɛ̀ ɗoŋ hokamɔ kɔ-mɛ.» Gasawi ko o wi-pɛm-wannu ha̧a̧ o nyɔŋmɔ in ŋma ha̧a̧mɔ ha̧ a̧, ɓɛɛ e a̧ yak.
Kapsiki_DC: Ma keɗema nza na le 'ya ne, zhɛneghe geva tsagha kalə sha Gedaliya, wəzege ta Ahikam ba'a shia Shafan, nya veyi meghea ka Babilone kawəndə kwele nya te ghəa meleme nyi mbe Zhəwda. Nza ŋayɛ mə le hwa mbeli, keɗema kalə ŋa te ŋkwa nya ɗe na.» Pa wəndə nya te ghəa ka ya meghea shɛ ɗave nda wəshi kezeme kwa hweŋkwa ba'a wəshi gəmə ke Zhɛrɛmi, kwa sebe ta ŋkɛ, pa pelakɛ ŋkɛ kaslə.
Tupurri: De maga Jermi bay fer waçaçre wa ëa mono, Nebusaradan kal gano: Fer see Gedaliya je ni Ahikam je ni Safan maga wañ Babilon hayn waçaç ree äi leege ma Judan wo mono. Hay wo see äe yoo jarn wo ni, wo ti ngeel maga äil äo da woge ni mo äuy no. Wañ soden raw haç feçeçren reege wo ne hen de kayge wo, kal megeäe rawge.

Francais: Et Jérémie se rendit auprès de Godolias à Maspha, et il demeura avec lui au milieu du peuple laissé dans le pays.
Anglais: Then went Jeremiah unto Gedaliah the son of Ahikam to Mizpah; and dwelt with him among the people that were left in the land.
BIBALDA_TA_PELDETTA: Yeremiyas kali kat Gedaliya goora vi Ahikam hay Mispa, nam mus hiɗi namu jar sum sa hin hay nagatna.
Bulu: Nde Yérémi a nga ke be Gedalia, e mone Ahikam e Mispa, a baa nye be nga tabe e bôte yʼayoñ été be nga liʼi be too si jap.
Guiziga: Akẽh na, Zeremi aru nga Mispa a ciki Gedaliya mangal ngi Ahikam, a ndir a cikeˀe a wuzla mizli mindiram asi ruwuyo.
Fulfulde_Adamaoua: Yeremiya yehi haa Gedaliya ɓii Ahikam, jooɗodi bee maako haa Mispa, caka yimɓe luttuɓe nder lesdi.
Fulfulde_DC: Yeremiya yehi haa Gedaliya ɓii Ahikam, jooɗodi bee maako haa Mispa, caka yimɓe luttuɓe nder lesdi.
KALATA_KO_SC_Gbaya: Hegɔ Jeremii nɛ̀ɛ̀ hɔ Mispa katɛ Gedalias bem ko Ahikam, ɓɛɛ a̧ duk in a̧ mgbara o bíí nɛ̀ ɓɔna tɛ nù‘i.
KALATA_KO_DC_Gbaya: Hegɔ Jeremii nɛ̀ɛ̀ hɔ Mispa katɛ Gedalias bem ko Ahikam, ɓɛɛ a̧ duk in a̧ mgbara o bíí nɛ̀ ɓɔna tɛ nù‘i.
Kapsiki_DC: Tsetse se ŋkɛ nda ntishɛnyɛ Zhɛrɛmi mbe Mispa yitea Gedaliya, wəzege ta Ahikam. Pa nzanyɛ yite hwa mbeli nyi ketene mbe meleme.
Tupurri: Jermi raw woge Mispa see Gedaliya je ni Ahikam no, se raw hayge yoo jar maga hay wo de gwa'ge äil sirn ni mono.

Francais: Lorsque tous les chefs de troupes qui étaient dans la campagne, eux et leurs hommes, eurent appris que le roi de Babylone avait établi Godolias, fils d'Ahicam, gouverneur du pays, et qu'il lui avait confié les hommes, les femmes et les enfants, et ceux des pauvres du pays qui n'étaient pas déportés à Babylone,
Anglais: Now when all the captains of the forces which were in the fields, even they and their men, heard that the king of Babylon had made Gedaliah the son of Ahikam governor in the land, and had committed unto him men, and women, and children, and of the poor of the land, of them that were not carried away captive to Babylon;
BIBALDA_TA_PELDETTA: Hay li ma sa ŋulona vi vokŋa vi sojena sa ay meray goy hay fulda hiɗi sum sa kuɗsina kaf hum ala, mulla vi Babilon tun Gedaliya goora vi Ahikamawa mulu, sum jufayna, boyna, gurosgurayna, hiɗi sa hawna sa hin hay nagata sa kalsi hay Babilonɗina, mulla vul ŋomda visiyawa hay ɓam Gedaliya,
Bulu: Bivete bise ya nkane bita bi mbe afan be nga wôk, bebien, a bôte babe na njô bôte ya Babilôn a teléya Gedalia, e mone Ahikam, a jôô si, a na, a veya nye befam, binga, bongô a ba ya bingôngole bi bôt bi nga bo te ke minkôme Babilôn.
Guiziga: Dambalaka madiɗa ngi sojehey ada zleˀe ti soje taŋhay silaŋ pal taŋ a ɓuh aruŋ. Madiɗa ngi sojehey ati mizli taŋhaya, a cinaka na, buy madiɗa ngi Babiloŋ a vula madiɗa le da Gedaliya mangal ngi Ahikama, i buy asi ruwuyo. Mizli ziley, ngwasay ati ziri waɗ misi murgahay cah mindiram manja a jaka taŋ nga Babiloŋ na, buy a vula taŋ le asi haŋ ngi Gedaliya.
Fulfulde_Adamaoua: Nden mawɓe jama'aaje konu wonɓe nder ladde e honooɓe muuɗum'en nani laamiiɗo Baabila waɗi Gedaliya ɓii Ahikam ngomna lesdi fuu, halfitinani mo leesɓe nder lesdi ɓe ndahaaka haa Baabila, worɓe e rewɓe e ɓikkoy.
Fulfulde_DC: Nden mawɓe jama'aaje konu wonɓe nder ladde e honooɓe muuɗum'en nani laamiiɗo Baabila waɗi Gedaliya ɓii Ahikam ngomna lesdi fuu, halfitinani mo leesɓe nder lesdi ɓe ndahaaka haa Baabila, worɓe e rewɓe e ɓikkoy.
KALATA_KO_SC_Gbaya: O gasa wi-duk-zu o wi-biro lɛŋ nɛ̀ ɓɔna zaŋbɛɛ, wa in o bíí kɔ-wa zia'e ndé, wannu Babilɔŋ ee Gedalias bem ko Ahikam nɛ̀ gasa wi-duk-zu nù Juda, ɓɛɛ ha̧ o wiwii, o okoo gú nɛ̀ o obem in o ŋma bíí tɛ nù‘i nɛ̀ wa kai nɛ̀ bara-biro si Babilɔŋ na, ha̧ a̧.
KALATA_KO_DC_Gbaya: O gasa wi-duk-zu o wi-biro lɛŋ nɛ̀ ɓɔna zaŋbɛɛ, wa in o bíí kɔ-wa zia'e ndé, wannu Babilɔŋ ee Gedalias bem ko Ahikam nɛ̀ gasa wi-duk-zu nù Juda, ɓɛɛ ha̧ o wiwii, o okoo gú nɛ̀ o obem in o ŋma bíí tɛ nù‘i nɛ̀ wa kai nɛ̀ bara-biro si Babilɔŋ na, ha̧ a̧.
Kapsiki_DC: Pa mbelia jama ta ka sewajɛ nyi kwamte le mbeli nyi yitea hɛ fate nahe meghea ka Babilone keveyi Gedaliya, wəzege ta Ahikam kawəndə nya te ghəa te hɛɗi ba'a nahe ŋkɛ kedapate nda yɛ zhili, mi, ŋwale le mbeli nyi ketene tagha ɓɛhwɛ kaɗema kefəghe geva kajive Babilone te dzeve.
Tupurri: Jar kluuri sode maga hay wo wo go yoofi mo äuy raw wo laage de jar ma wer äaaran wo ga wañ Babilon hay Gedaliya je ni Ahikamn we ti sir no, haç werpiiri, naare, weere kleere de jar coo ma äil sirn ga aè hay hoo ra wo go Babilon gaa ne hen do.

Francais: ils vinrent vers Godolias, à Maspha, savoir: Ismaël, fils de Nathanias, Johanan et Jonathan, fils de Carée, Saraïas, fils de Tanéhumeth, les fils d'Ephoï, de Nétopha, et Jézonias, fils du Maahathien, eux et leurs hommes.
Anglais: Then they came to Gedaliah to Mizpah, even Ishmael the son of Nethaniah, and Johanan and Jonathan the sons of Kareah, and Seraiah the son of Tanhumeth, and the sons of Ephai the Netophathite, and Jezaniah the son of a Maachathite, they and their men.
BIBALDA_TA_PELDETTA: nisi kali kat Gedaliya hay Mispa, kayni si Ismayel, goora vi Netaniya, Yohanan hiɗi Yonatan gurona vi Kareyak, Seraya, goora vi Tanhumet, gurona vi Efay ma Netofana, hiɗi Yeezaniya, gurona vi sa ma Maakana, hiɗi sumuna visiya.
Bulu: Nde be nga ke be Gedalia e Mispa be too na: Israél e mone Netania, Yôhanañ a Yônatan e mone Kavéa, Séraya e mone Tanhumét, bone bʼEfayi ya Nétôfa a Yezania e mone Makatite, bebien a bôte bap,
Guiziga: Madiɗa ngi sojehey tuwa, a soko lumaka Gedaliya a Mispa, i ti: Ismayel mangal ngi Netaniya, Yohanaŋ waɗ Yonataŋ, i ziri ngi Kareyahay cuw taŋ, yo Seraya mangal ngi Tanehumet ati ziri ngi Efayay mbur Netofa waɗ Yazaniya mbur Maˀaka.
Fulfulde_Adamaoua: Ngam maajum Isma'iilu ɓii Netaniya e Yohanan ɓii Kareha e Seraya ɓii Tanhumet e ɓiɓɓe Efay Netofaajo e Yaajaniya Ma'akatiijo, kamɓe e worɓe maɓɓe njehi haa Gedaliya haa Mispa.
Fulfulde_DC: Ngam maajum Isma'iilu ɓii Netaniya e Yohanan ɓii Kareha e Seraya ɓii Tanhumet e ɓiɓɓe Efay Netofaajo e Yaajaniya Ma'akatiijo, kamɓe e worɓe maɓɓe njehi haa Gedaliya haa Mispa.
KALATA_KO_SC_Gbaya: Wa tɛ̀ɛ̀ kpa Gedalias sɛn Mispa: mɛ̀ nɛ́ Yismaɛl bem ko Nɛtania, Yohanaŋ in Yɔnataŋ o bem ko Karea, Sɛraya bem ko Tanumɛt, o bem ko Ofai be Nɛtɔfa, Yezania bem ko be Maka; wa in o bíí kɔ-wa.
KALATA_KO_DC_Gbaya: Wa tɛ̀ɛ̀ kpa Gedalias sɛn Mispa: mɛ̀ nɛ́ Yismaɛl bem ko Nɛtania, Yohanaŋ in Yɔnataŋ o bem ko Karea, Sɛraya bem ko Tanumɛt, o bem ko Ofai be Nɛtɔfa, Yezania bem ko be Maka; wa in o bíí kɔ-wa.
Kapsiki_DC: Hwa'a hɛ le mbelia nci sha Gedaliya mbe Mispa: yɛ Ismayɛl, wəzege ta Netaniya, yɛ Yohanan le Yonatan nyi kaŋwalea Karɛya, Seraya, wəzege ta Tanehəwmɛt, ŋwalea Ɛfay nya kande Netofa le Yazaniya, nde Ma'aka.
Tupurri: Saara raw woge Mispa see Gedaliya, aà hay wo diñ Ismayel je ni Netaniya no, diñ Yohanan wo de Jonatañ jar ni Kareya wo, diñ Seraya je ni Tanhumed no, diñ jar ni Efay ma Netofa wo de Yesaniyahu je ni je Maaka no, jar sen wo de jar äaaran wo wer äaara.

Francais: Godolias, fils d'Ahicam, fils de Saphan, leur dit avec serment, à eux et à leurs hommes: "Ne craignez point de servir les Chaldéens; demeurez dans le pays, servez le roi de Babylone, et vous vous en trouverez bien.
Anglais: And Gedaliah the son of Ahikam the son of Shaphan sware unto them and to their men, saying, Fear not to serve the Chaldeans: dwell in the land, and serve the king of Babylon, and it shall be well with you.
BIBALDA_TA_PELDETTA: Gedaliya goora vi Ahikam goora vi Safan yi va kalam voksiya, nisiya hiɗi sumuna visi kaw, nam ka disi ala: Ligi nari kay sum sa Kaldeenɗi, lakgi ziy hay nagata, sungi mulla vi Babilon, nala nigi ma lak ŋaa'a.
Bulu: Gedalia e mone Ahikam, ndaé Safan a nga kane be ngana, be, a bôte bap, a jôʼô na: Te koone woñe ya saane Bekaldééñ, tabaʼane si jenan, boʼone njô bôte ya Babilône bisaé, éyoñe te mia ye tabe mvoʼé .
Guiziga: Gedaliya mangal ngi Ahikam, dideˀ ngi Safaŋ, a ɓa taŋ ti hudum da taŋ jom ati mizli taŋhaya: «Ki zluwunam ngi tiɓa gwat ngi gi ngi Babiloŋhoy na ta. Cifam asi ruwuyo, hinam hirnga a mbuŋ buy madiɗa ngi Babiloŋ si na, naɓa gwat gar a sa cuh ti zuy si.
Fulfulde_Adamaoua: Gedaliya ɓii Ahikam ɓii Safan hunani ɓe: “Taa kule jagganaago Kaldiya'en. Njooɗe nder lesdi, njaggane laamiiɗo Baabila, nden kam on njooɗoto jam .
Fulfulde_DC: Gedaliya ɓii Ahikam ɓii Safan hunani ɓe: “Taa kule jagganaago Kaldiya'en. Njooɗe nder lesdi, njaggane laamiiɗo Baabila, nden kam on njooɗoto jam .
KALATA_KO_SC_Gbaya: Gedalias, bem ko Ahikam, bem ko Safaŋ tɔ̧ɔ̧ wen’ɛ ha̧ wa in o bíí kɔ-wa: «K’ɛ́nɛ́ yu kpɛka mɔ ko o be Kaldee na; ɛ̀nɛ̀ ɓɔ́n tɛ nù'ɛ, ɛ̀nɛ̀ mbó zu ha̧ wannu Babilɔŋ, ɓɛɛ mɔ lɛŋ tɛ nɛ nɛ̀ de-a h’ɛnɛ.
KALATA_KO_DC_Gbaya: Gedalias, bem ko Ahikam, bem ko Safaŋ tɔ̧ɔ̧ wen’ɛ ha̧ wa in o bíí kɔ-wa: «K’ɛ́nɛ́ yu kpɛka mɔ ko o be Kaldee na; ɛ̀nɛ̀ ɓɔ́n tɛ nù'ɛ, ɛ̀nɛ̀ mbó zu ha̧ wannu Babilɔŋ, ɓɛɛ mɔ lɛŋ tɛ nɛ nɛ̀ de-a h’ɛnɛ.
Kapsiki_DC: Ma ke Gedaliya, wəzege ta Ahikam ba'a shia Shafan meɗeyi nda ke hɛ pɛtɛ: «Ghazlənəma yɛ va nza mbe dzeve ta ka Babilone ma, nza ŋayɛ mə te hɛɗi nya ba'a hawe va meghea ka Babilone. Ma tsagha, megela tenza yɛ.
Tupurri: Gedaliya je ni Ahikam je ni Safan raw ha' ge go ne hara de jar äaaran wo gano: Joñ wee heçeçne ma joñ peele ne jar Kalde wo wa, lag wee äil sirn la, joñ wee peele ne wañ Babilone day ni nday da' see äay yañ de ele.

Francais: Pour, moi, voici que je reste à Maspha pour être aux ordres des Chaldéens qui viendront vers vous. Et vous, faites la récolte du vin, des fruits et de l'huile; mettez-les dans vos vases; et habitez vos villes que vous occupez."
Anglais: As for me, behold, I will dwell at Mizpah to serve the Chaldeans, which will come unto us: but ye, gather ye wine, and summer fruits, and oil, and put them in your vessels, and dwell in your cities that ye have taken.
BIBALDA_TA_PELDETTA: Humgiya, nan min mus hay Mispa, vok ir sa Kaldeena sa min co kataya, nigi hayɗini, jagi gulda-guldana, vuɗna vi sle ma vuɗ caydna, hiɗi mula, cukum hay dowayna vigiya, lakgi hay hoyok-ziyna vigi ma nigi hayamna.
Bulu: Ma nyô, me too Mispa, asu ya bo nkômbane Bekaldééñ, mbe ba ye zu be bia; mfaʼa wônan, kôʼane woon, bibuma yʼésep a mbon, futaʼane bie meviek, a tabaʼan e bitisone bienan, bi mi nga nyoñ.
Guiziga: Ya i cifi a Mispa, ar deɗe kum a mbuŋ Babiloŋhoy masoko ngi hay ndra na. Amma kumo na, kum slaka yi ngi gudubun kumoy ati ngi widis ngi zumoy waɗ yi ngi widis ngi malaya, wam taŋ vu, kum cifam ar walahayay kum misi ar taŋ na.»
Fulfulde_Adamaoua: Min mi jooɗoto haa Mispa, mi wakiiliijo mooɗon haa Kaldiya'en waranɓe haa amin. Onon boo, mooɓte inaboojam e ɓiɓɓe leɗɗe e nebbam, cige ɗum. Njooɗe nder gure ɗe maroton.”
Fulfulde_DC: Min mi jooɗoto haa Mispa, mi wakiiliijo mooɗon haa Kaldiya'en waranɓe haa amin. Onon boo, mooɓte inaboojam e ɓiɓɓe leɗɗe e nebbam, cige ɗum. Njooɗe nder gure ɗe maroton.”
KALATA_KO_SC_Gbaya: Kɔ‘m, mi tɛ duk sɛn Mispa wen o be Kaldee nɛ̀ tɛ́ tɛ̀ sɛn tɛ̀ k’ɛɛ; ɓɛɛ war k’ɛnɛ, ɛ̀nɛ̀ dé dɔ̧ɔ̧, ɛ̀nɛ̀ ɓí o waya-te, in o waya-te-nɔ̧́, ɛ̀nɛ̀ dé o nyɔŋmɔ nɛ̀ dɔka-a, ɓɛɛ ɛ̀nɛ̀ ɓɔ́n tɛ o ye n’ɛnɛ tɛ ya sɛnɛ‘i.»
KALATA_KO_DC_Gbaya: Kɔ‘m, mi tɛ duk sɛn Mispa wen o be Kaldee nɛ̀ tɛ́ tɛ̀ sɛn tɛ̀ k’ɛɛ; ɓɛɛ war k’ɛnɛ, ɛ̀nɛ̀ dé dɔ̧ɔ̧, ɛ̀nɛ̀ ɓí o waya-te, in o waya-te-nɔ̧́, ɛ̀nɛ̀ dé o nyɔŋmɔ nɛ̀ dɔka-a, ɓɛɛ ɛ̀nɛ̀ ɓɔ́n tɛ o ye n’ɛnɛ tɛ ya sɛnɛ‘i.»
Kapsiki_DC: Ma 'ya le ŋa ɗa ne, teke nza 'ya mbe Mispa kezha nza kwa kema ta ka Babilone nyi kese sha gheɓəmə. Ama gheyɛ le ŋa ŋayɛ, nda mə rɛzɛŋe, kweci ya ta wəfe se te wəve ba'a ta mə 'yi. Wəmbəyi mə hɛ ba'a nza mə mbe meleme nyi nza nyi yɛ.»
Tupurri: Ndi, ndi de hayle Mispa la de oole pel äay ma yiñgi de jar Kalde wo de maga aà a ge wo we äil sirn la mono, ma äayn mono, haçaç wee tlalum ma haçaç yii, haçaç wee le'ge koo ma ti ceeren wo de ma yuë noon wo. Lag wee ra ti feçeçre ma lag ragen wo day lag wee äi leege äay maga nday bag sen wo ma lagge mono.

Francais: Tous les Judéens qui étaient dans le pays de Moab, chez les fils d'Ammon et dans Edom, et qui apprirent dans tous ces pays-là que le roi de Babylone avait laissé un reste à Juda, et qu'il leur avait donné pour gouverneur Godolias, fils d'Ahicam, fils de Saphan.
Anglais: Likewise when all the Jews that were in Moab, and among the Ammonites, and in Edom, and that were in all the countries, heard that the king of Babylon had left a remnant of Judah, and that he had set over them Gedaliah the son of Ahikam the son of Shaphan;
BIBALDA_TA_PELDETTA: Sum sa Yudiyan kaf sa ay hay nagata vi Mowab, goy vi sa Amonna, hay nagata vi Edom, hiɗi sa hay nagat kafna, labara co tisi ala mulla vi Babilon hin dir sum sara'a hay Yuda, Gedaliya goora vi Ahikam, goora vi Safan nam vulsitawa ki guverner nala kaw.
Bulu: Avale te fe Beyude bese be mbe Môab, e be bone bʼAmon, Edom a mesi mese, be nga wôʼô na njô bôte ya Babilôn a nga liʼi mebukaʼa e Yuda a na, a nga telé Gedalia e mone Ahikam, ndaé Safan, a bo ngovina wop.
Guiziga: Naŋ kanah ma, mizli Yudehey gar misi a Moˀap, a wuzla Amoŋhoy a Edom waɗ misi asi ruwuy gara, a cinam na, buy madiɗa ngi Babiloŋ a pul mizli Zudahaya le cah asi ruwuyo, yo a cifa taŋ buy le, i Gedaliya mangal ngi Ahikam, dideˀ ngi Safaŋ.
Fulfulde_Adamaoua: Yahuudu'en wonɓe haa Mo'ab e Ammoon e Edoom e lesɗe goɗɗe, kamɓe boo ɓe nani laamiiɗo Baabila acci yimɓe luttuɓe haa Yahuuda. Ɓe nani boo o darni Gedaliya ɓii Ahikam ɓii Safan ngomnaajo dow maɓɓe.
Fulfulde_DC: Yahuudu'en wonɓe haa Mo'ab e Ammoon e Edoom e lesɗe goɗɗe, kamɓe boo ɓe nani laamiiɗo Baabila acci yimɓe luttuɓe haa Yahuuda. Ɓe nani boo o darni Gedaliya ɓii Ahikam ɓii Safan ngomnaajo dow maɓɓe.
KALATA_KO_SC_Gbaya: Kale-a mbɛt, o be Juda lɛŋ nɛ̀ a̧a̧ so sɛn nú Mɔab mgbara o be Amɔŋ sɛn nú Edɔm in tɛ o nù lɛŋ zia'e, wannu Babilɔŋ ee o oi bíí sɛn Juda, ɓɛɛ a̧ e Gedalias bem ko Ahikam, bem ko Safaŋ nɛ̀ wi-duk-zu nù‘i.
KALATA_KO_DC_Gbaya: Kale-a mbɛt, o be Juda lɛŋ nɛ̀ a̧a̧ so sɛn nú Mɔab mgbara o be Amɔŋ sɛn nú Edɔm in tɛ o nù lɛŋ zia'e, wannu Babilɔŋ ee o oi bíí sɛn Juda, ɓɛɛ a̧ e Gedalias bem ko Ahikam, bem ko Safaŋ nɛ̀ wi-duk-zu nù‘i.
Kapsiki_DC: Tsagha shɛ ne, pa ka Zhəwda nyi mbe Mowab, Amon, Ɛdom ba'a nyi mbe kweci hɛɗi fate nahe meghea ka Babilone kesərəakɛ kwete bela ta mbeli mbe Zhəwda ba'a nahe ŋkɛ kedapate nda hɛ te dzeve ke Gedaliya, wəzege ta Ahikam ba'a shia Shafan.
Tupurri: Jar Jwif maga hay wo le go ti sir Mowabe, ni jar Amoñ wo, ti sir Edom noga ti sir wo äuy raw wo laage lay ga wañ Babilon yañ de men jar äil sir Juda ni day se hay Gedaliya je ni Ahikam je ni Safan waçaç waçaçre prog no.

Francais: Alors tous les Judéens revinrent de tous les lieux où ils avaient été chassés, et se rendirent au pays de Juda auprès de Godolias, à Maspha; et ils récoltèrent du vin et des fruits en abondance.
Anglais: Even all the Jews returned out of all places whither they were driven, and came to the land of Judah, to Gedaliah, unto Mizpah, and gathered wine and summer fruits very much.
BIBALDA_TA_PELDETTA: Sum sa Yudiyan kaf hot ay hay liyn ma nisi ay meray goy hayamna pa, nisi kali hay nagata vi Yuda kat Gedaliya hay Mispa, nisi ja gulda-guldan ŋolo, hiɗi vuɗna vi sle ma vuɗ menda kaw.
Bulu: Ajô te Beyude bese be nga so mevôm mese be nga mane mialan a ke e Yuda be Gedalia Mispa, a be nga kôan étua abui woon a bibuma yʼésep.
Guiziga: A zlaka a moko tir lihey taŋ mizliɗam hirnga zleˀe mber mber nga diga na. Taŋ mindiloko asi ruwuy Zuda, a ciki Gedaliya a Mispa na, a ngilam yi ngi gudubun ati ngi widisey, hã sifi a gi le kuy kuy wãˀ.
Fulfulde_Adamaoua: Ngam maajum ɓe ngurti haa nokkuuje ɓe caŋkiti fuu, ɓe ngarti Yahuuda, haa Gedaliya nder wuro Mispa, ɓe mooɓti inaboojam e ɓiɓɓe leɗɗe, ɗuuɗɗum masin.
Fulfulde_DC: Ngam maajum ɓe ngurti haa nokkuuje ɓe caŋkiti fuu, ɓe ngarti Yahuuda, haa Gedaliya nder wuro Mispa, ɓe mooɓti inaboojam e ɓiɓɓe leɗɗe, ɗuuɗɗum masin.
KALATA_KO_SC_Gbaya: Wa gara pii ɗoŋ nɛ̀ o fara nɛtɛ nɛtɛ nɛ̀ wa pɛsa so wa si sɛnɛ. Ɓɛɛ nɛ̀ wa hɔɔ sɛn nù Juda katɛ Gedalias sɛn Mispa kaɗi, wa dee dɔ̧ɔ̧, wa ɓii o waya-te, wa mɔi̧a nyɔnɔ nɛ̀ dɔka-a nyɛmna.
KALATA_KO_DC_Gbaya: Wa gara pii ɗoŋ nɛ̀ o fara nɛtɛ nɛtɛ nɛ̀ wa pɛsa so wa si sɛnɛ. Ɓɛɛ nɛ̀ wa hɔɔ sɛn nù Juda katɛ Gedalias sɛn Mispa kaɗi, wa dee dɔ̧ɔ̧, wa ɓii o waya-te, wa mɔi̧a nyɔnɔ nɛ̀ dɔka-a nyɛmna.
Kapsiki_DC: Tagha gɛ, pɛtɛ ka Zhəwda nyi ketazeyi geva te yayata ŋkwa zhɛneke geva, hwa'a hɛ te hɛɗia ka Zhəwda sha Gedaliya, mbe Mispa. Pa hɛ ndake yɛ rɛzɛŋe ba'a kweci ya ta wəfe kwele kwele se te wəve.
Tupurri: Jar Jwif wo äuy kal wo men ngeel maga saara hay dus wo go ni wo le go äuy, fer wo le Mispa see Gedaliya ti sir Juda. Saara raw da' yii de le'ge tlalumn debañ lay, haçaç wo le'ge koore ma ti ceere wo debañ lay.

Francais: Mais Johanan, fils de Carée, et tous les chefs des troupes qui étaient dans la campagne, vinrent trouver Godolias à Maspha, et lui dirent:
Anglais: Moreover Johanan the son of Kareah, and all the captains of the forces that were in the fields, came to Gedaliah to Mizpah,
BIBALDA_TA_PELDETTA: Yohanan goora vi Kareyak, hiɗi sa ŋulona vi vokŋa sa ay meray goy fulu co kat Gedaliya hay Mispa,
Bulu: Yôhanañ e mone Karéa a bivete bise ya nkane bita ô mbe afan, be nga zu be Gedalia e Mispa,
Guiziga: Taŋ mindilam a ciki Gedaliya a Mispa na, Yohanaŋ mangal ngi Kareya waɗ buy ngi soje mitaˀ taˀ ti ngay taŋhay a ɓuh tuwa,
Fulfulde_Adamaoua: Ɓaawo man Yohanan ɓii Kareha e mawɓe konu woɗɓe go ngari haa Gedaliya haa Mispa,
Fulfulde_DC: Ɓaawo man Yohanan ɓii Kareha e mawɓe konu woɗɓe go ngari haa Gedaliya haa Mispa,
KALATA_KO_SC_Gbaya: Nɛ̀ wa hɔɔ katɛ Gedalias sɛn Mispa, Yohanaŋ bem ko Karea in o gasawi ko o wi-biro nɛ̀ ɓɔna so zaŋbɛɛ
KALATA_KO_DC_Gbaya: Nɛ̀ wa hɔɔ katɛ Gedalias sɛn Mispa, Yohanaŋ bem ko Karea in o gasawi ko o wi-biro nɛ̀ ɓɔna so zaŋbɛɛ
Kapsiki_DC: Kwa sebe ta ŋkɛ ne, hwa'a yɛ Yohanan, wəzege ta Karɛya le pɛtɛa mbeli nyi te ghəa ka sewajɛ kwamte sha Gedaliya mbe Mispa.
Tupurri: Yohanan je ni Kareyan wo de wañre sode maga hay wo le go yoofi mo äuy raw wo age Mispa see Gedaliya,

Francais: "Sais-tu pas que Baalis, roi des fils d’Ammon, a envoyé Ismaël, fils de Nathanias, pour t'ôter la vie?" Mais Godolias, fils d’Ahicam, ne les crut point.
Anglais: And said unto him, Dost thou certainly know that Baalis the king of the Ammonites hath sent Ishmael the son of Nethaniah to slay thee? But Gedaliah the son of Ahikam believed them not.
