BIBALDA_TA_PELDETTA: nisi dumu: Baalis mulla vi sa Amonna gi Ismayel goora vi Netaniya aya kay caŋ goyo, naŋ wi kayni su? May Gedaliya goora vi Ahikam min vi dita visi noŋɗi.
Bulu: a jô nye na: Ye wo yeme na Balis, ajô bôte bone bʼAmon, a lômeya Ismaél e mone Nétania na a wôé wo? Ve Gedalia e mone Ahikam a nji buni be.
Guiziga: a ɓakaŋ: «Baˀal i buy ngi Amoŋhoy, a slino Ismayel mangal ngi Netaniya le, ɓa a kiɗuw vagay na, ki si na le ya?» Amma Gedaliya mangal ngi Ahikama a tiɓa ɓi taŋ ta.
Fulfulde_Adamaoua: mbi'i: “A anndi na? Ba'alis, laamiiɗo Ammoon neli Isma'iilu ɓii Netaniya ngam mbarugo ma.” Ammaa Gedaliya ɓii Ahikam jaɓaay ko ɓe mbi'i.
Fulfulde_DC: mbi'i: “A anndi na? Ba'alis, laamiiɗo Ammoon neli Isma'iilu ɓii Netaniya ngam mbarugo ma.” Ammaa Gedaliya ɓii Ahikam jaɓaay ko ɓe mbi'i.
KALATA_KO_SC_Gbaya: aka a̧: «Mɛ iŋ kɔ-mɛ‘e Bablis wannu ko o be Amɔŋ toma Yismaɛl bem ko Nɛtania mɛ gbɛ mɛ na nde?» Gedalias bem ko Ahikam bɛ̧ɛ̧ wen'i.
KALATA_KO_DC_Gbaya: aka a̧: «Mɛ iŋ kɔ-mɛ‘e Bablis wannu ko o be Amɔŋ toma Yismaɛl bem ko Nɛtania mɛ gbɛ mɛ na nde?» Gedalias bem ko Ahikam bɛ̧ɛ̧ wen'i.
Kapsiki_DC: Ma ke hɛ shɛ: «Keɗepe na nahe Ba'alis, meghea ka Amon kegezete nda ke Ismayɛl, wəzege ta Netaniya kezha pesle ŋa tse yi?» Ama kese Gedaliya kayɛ ghena ta nci we.
Tupurri: day riñn wo gano: Ndo yañ mbo de koge ga Baalis wañ jar Amoñn le de äo' Ismayel je ni Netaniyan le ma 'war ndo go yawla? Ama Gedaliya je ni Ahikam laa haç äil ti waçaçre äaaran gaè.

Francais: Et Johanan, fils de Carée, parla en secret à Godolias à Maspha; en ces termes: "Que j'aille donc tuer Ismaël, fils de Nathanias, sans que personne le sache. Pourquoi t'ôterait-il la vie, et tous les Juifs qui se sont rassemblés vers toi seraient-ils dispersés, et le reste de Juda périrait-il?
Anglais: Then Johanan the son of Kareah spake to Gedaliah in Mizpah secretly, saying, Let me go, I pray thee, and I will slay Ishmael the son of Nethaniah, and no man shall know it: wherefore should he slay thee, that all the Jews which are gathered unto thee should be scattered, and the remnant in Judah perish?
BIBALDA_TA_PELDETTA: Bugolda Yohanan goora vi Kareyak di goy ŋayay mi Gedaliya hay Mispa ala: Naŋ vulan hagata kay nan tuɗ ci Ismayel goora vi Netaniya goyo, sa as kay wi kayni noŋ ne'ɗi. Nam caŋ goy kayn kay mige? A jafna vi Yuda kaf sa tokay kataŋŋa mer goyo, dir jafna vi Yuda ma hinina mit goyo kayn kay mige?
Bulu: Nde Yôhanañ e mone Karéa a nga jô Gedalia asoé e Mispa na: Vaʼa me ngule na me ke wôé Ismaél, e mone Nétania. Teke môt a ye yeme de. Amu jé a ye viane wôé wo? Amu jé bôte bese ya Yuda be ne nsulaʼane be wo ba yiane mane tyamelan, a mebukaʼa ya Yuda ki njañan?
Guiziga: Dar Yohanaŋ mangal ngi Kareya, aru yaŋ yaŋ ng'avi Gedaliya a Mispa, a cufuɗaŋ: «Inga puliy jiviɗ ɓa i ra kiɗa Mikayel mangal ngi Netaniya na vagay, manja mbur a sinaŋ. Ki wuɗ le gisiŋ ɓa a kuɗuw vagay kwa? Da a kuɗuw le vagay na, naɓa Yudehey muturpus a ciki ɗik na, a sa ndiram zlaɗ lambaˀ si ma, yo Zudahay mindiram na, a sa zizam.»
Fulfulde_Adamaoua: Nden Yohanan wi'i mo bee sirri: “Accu mi yaha, mi mbara Isma'iilu ɓii Netaniya. Walaa mo heɓtata ɗum. Koni o ɗaɓɓata mbarugo ma? To bana non, Yahuudu'en mooɓtiiɓe haa maaɗa fuu caŋkititto, luttuɓe Yahuuda fuu kalkan.”
Fulfulde_DC: Nden Yohanan wi'i mo bee sirri: “Accu mi yaha, mi mbara Isma'iilu ɓii Netaniya. Walaa mo heɓtata ɗum. Koni o ɗaɓɓata mbarugo ma? To bana non, Yahuudu'en mooɓtiiɓe haa maaɗa fuu caŋkititto, luttuɓe Yahuuda fuu kalkan.”
KALATA_KO_SC_Gbaya: Ɓɛɛ Yehohanaŋ, bem ko Karea ak Gedalias sɛn Mispa nɛ̀ hu̧sa-a hee mɔ'ɔ ga: «Mɛ̀ é ha̧‘m nɛ́ɛ̀ gbɛ Yismaɛl bem ko Nɛtania nɛ̀ hu̧sa-a, nɛ̀ bíí beka iŋ na. Mɛ kɔ̧ɔ̧ nɛ̀ mbetɛ, a̧ a̧ gbɛ mɛ nde? O be Juda nɛ̀ mɔi̧ ya katɛ mɛ tɛ yambali, ɓɛɛ oi o be Juda tɛ kum lɛŋ.»
KALATA_KO_DC_Gbaya: Ɓɛɛ Yehohanaŋ, bem ko Karea ak Gedalias sɛn Mispa nɛ̀ hu̧sa-a hee mɔ'ɔ ga: «Mɛ̀ é ha̧‘m nɛ́ɛ̀ gbɛ Yismaɛl bem ko Nɛtania nɛ̀ hu̧sa-a, nɛ̀ bíí beka iŋ na. Mɛ kɔ̧ɔ̧ nɛ̀ mbetɛ, a̧ a̧ gbɛ mɛ nde? O be Juda nɛ̀ mɔi̧ ya katɛ mɛ tɛ yambali, ɓɛɛ oi o be Juda tɛ kum lɛŋ.»
Kapsiki_DC: Ndagwara hwa'a se Yohanan, wəzege ta Karɛya teghərə teghərə sha Gedaliya mbe Mispa, ma ke shɛ: «Ndeke ɗa hweŋkwa kezha lə 'ya kapesle Ismayɛl, wəzege ta Netaniya tewəfərə. Wəndə shɛ kateɗepete we. Kaganda ɗe na kapeslekɛ ŋa ŋkɛ na? Ma kepeslekɛ ŋa ŋkɛ ne, pɛtɛ tezhɛne ka Zhəwda nyi ketsenete geva nyi yitea gha kataze geva. Ma tsagha gɛ, bətə tenza sebe te mbeli nyi ketene mbe Zhəwda.»
Tupurri: Yohanan je ni Kareya raw riñ Gedaliya go freñ Mispa gano: Haç faage me maga ndi wo go taw Ismayel je ni Netaniya no. Joñge joñge ga jar Juda maga hay tay wo le see äo fer wo go dusgi äuy noga jar Juda maga gwa' wo, yeeë wo go pa la?

Francais: Godolias, fils d’Ahicam, dit à Johanan, fils de Carée: "Ne fais point cela; car ce que tu dis au sujet d’Ismaël est faux."
Anglais: But Gedaliah the son of Ahikam said unto Johanan the son of Kareah, Thou shalt not do this thing: for thou speakest falsely of Ishmael.
BIBALDA_TA_PELDETTA: Gedaliya goora vi Ahikam hot dit tam Yohanan goora Kareyak ala: Naŋ ma li van kaynɗi, kay slen ma naŋ ka dum kay Ismayel zawni mi sinna.
Bulu: Gedalia, e mone Ahikam a nga yalane Yôhanañ e mone Karéa na: Te bo jame te; amu jame wo jô Ismaél é ne minsos.
Guiziga: Gedaliya mangal ngi Ahikam a mbiɗa da Yohanaŋ mangal ngi Kareya na: «Ki ga kanah ta! Ɓi ka maslufa vur Mikayel na, i slir.»
Fulfulde_Adamaoua: Ammaa Gedaliya jaabi mo: “Taa waɗ ɗum. Ko mbi'ɗa dow Isma'iilu, ɗum fewre.”
Fulfulde_DC: Ammaa Gedaliya jaabi mo: “Taa waɗ ɗum. Ko mbi'ɗa dow Isma'iilu, ɗum fewre.”
KALATA_KO_SC_Gbaya: Gedalias bem ko Ahikam kifa nú ha̧ Yohanaŋ bem ko Karea: «Ká mɛ de mɔ‘i na! Mɔ nɛ̀ mɛ tɔ̧ zu Yismaɛl nɛ́ ndela.»
KALATA_KO_DC_Gbaya: Gedalias bem ko Ahikam kifa nú ha̧ Yohanaŋ bem ko Karea: «Ká mɛ de mɔ‘i na! Mɔ nɛ̀ mɛ tɔ̧ zu Yismaɛl nɛ́ ndela.»
Kapsiki_DC: Ama ma ke Gedaliya, wəzege ta Ahikam zhɛnete nda ke Yohanan, wəzege ta Karɛya: «Menema na ma! Tseŋwə ghena nyi geze nyi na te Ismayɛl.»
Tupurri: Gedaliya je ni Ahikamn kal ferge ne Yehonan je ni Kareyan gano: Joñ sen wa werga fen maga ndo de waçaçge äe ti Ismayel diñ gete'e.

Francais: Au septième mois, Ismaël, fils de Nathanias, fils d'Elisama, de la race royale, vint, accompagné de grands officiers du roi et de dix hommes, vers Godolias, fils d'Ahicam, à Maspha; et ils mangèrent ensemble à Maspha,
Anglais: Now it came to pass in the seventh month, that Ishmael the son of Nethaniah the son of Elishama, of the seed royal, and the princes of the king, even ten men with him, came unto Gedaliah the son of Ahikam to Mizpah; and there they did eat bread together in Mizpah.
BIBALDA_TA_PELDETTA: Hay til ma siɗiyana, Ismayel goora vi Netaniya, goora vi Elisama, ma hay jafna vi Mulda, namu hiɗi sa ŋulona vi mulla, nisi ay tapay hiɗi sum sara doogo kaw, nisi co kat Gedaliya goora vi Ahikam hay Mispa. Ɗawni hay Mispa nisi ti fun kuɗ tuwsiya.
Bulu: E ngone zamgbwale, Ismaél e mone Nétania, ndaé Elikama môte ya mvoñe bejô bôt, wua ya biwôlô bebo bisaé be njô bôt, a nga zu be Gedalia, e mone Ahikam, e Mispa a bôte befe awôm; bese be nga di vôme wua Mispa.
Guiziga: Ar kiya mitarnaˀ naŋ ngi vi na, Ismayel mangal ngi Nataniya, dideˀ ngi Elisama, muy ngi buy, mbur ngi si mizli madiɗa ngi slra ngi buyoyo, a so luuma Gedaliya mangal ngi Ahikam a Mispa, mizli kuruˀ aseˀeŋ. Taŋ misi a Mispa na, a zumam ati Gedaliya bummoˀ.
Fulfulde_Adamaoua: Nder lewru joweeɗiɗaɓru, Isma'iilu ɓii Netaniya ɓii Eliisama, goɗɗo danygol laamiiɗo, gooto nder mawɓe huuwanooɓe mo, wardi bee worɓe sappo haa Gedaliya ɓii Ahikam haa Mispa. Saa'i ɓe ɗon nyaamda bee maako,
Fulfulde_DC: Nder lewru joweeɗiɗaɓru, Isma'iilu ɓii Netaniya ɓii Eliisama, goɗɗo danygol laamiiɗo, gooto nder mawɓe huuwanooɓe mo, wardi bee worɓe sappo haa Gedaliya ɓii Ahikam haa Mispa. Saa'i ɓe ɗon nyaamda bee maako,
KALATA_KO_SC_Gbaya: Tɛ mɔɔrɔ-ɗoŋ-yiitoo fio-zɛ, Yismaɛl bem ko Nɛtania, bem ko Elisama, ŋma be nutua-wan, ŋma mgbara o gasawi ko wannu tɛ̀ɛ̀ kpa Gedalias bem ko Ahikam sɛn Mispa; a̧ in o bíí ɓu, ɓɛɛ sɛn Mispa'i, wa nyɔŋa mɔ in o ŋmaa.
KALATA_KO_DC_Gbaya: Tɛ mɔɔrɔ-ɗoŋ-yiitoo fio-zɛ, Yismaɛl bem ko Nɛtania, bem ko Elisama, ŋma be nutua-wan, ŋma mgbara o gasawi ko wannu tɛ̀ɛ̀ kpa Gedalias bem ko Ahikam sɛn Mispa; a̧ in o bíí ɓu, ɓɛɛ sɛn Mispa'i, wa nyɔŋa mɔ in o ŋmaa.
Kapsiki_DC: Ma te kwa mberefaŋe ta tere, hwa'a Ismayɛl, wəzege ta Netaniya ba'a shia Ɛlishama sha Gedaliya mbe Mispa. Kahwelefe ta meghe ba'a kawəndə nya kwele yitea meghe se ŋkɛ. Mbeli meŋe ya kwa sebe ta ŋkɛ. Vəa ŋkwa nza hɛ kazeme wəsə kezeme ki ghɛa Gedaliya ne,
Tupurri: Nen few ma de renamn mono, Ismayel je ni Netaniya je ni Elisama ti wer mani wañn raw age de jar kluuri mani wañn wo de jar ni hwal Mispa see Gedaliya je ni Ahikam no. Saara raw reege de kaçaçra Mispa ni.

Francais: Et Ismaël, fils de Nathanias, se leva, lui et les dix hommes qui étaient avec lui, et ils frappèrent avec l'épée Godolias, fils d'Ahicam, fils de Saphan, et ils le firent mourir - lui que le roi de Babylone avait établi gouverneur du pays,
Anglais: Then arose Ishmael the son of Nethaniah, and the ten men that were with him, and smote Gedaliah the son of Ahikam the son of Shaphan with the sword, and slew him, whom the king of Babylon had made governor over the land.
BIBALDA_TA_PELDETTA: Ki kayn nala Ismayel goora vi Netaniya fokay kulo'o hiɗi sum sa doogo sa nam tapay kuɗsina, Gedaliya goora vi Ahikam goora vi Safan nisi calam hiɗi kew-gaferaŋa; ki kayn nala sa ma mulla vi Babilon tunum guverner hay nagatna nisi cum goy mati.
Bulu: Nde Ismaél e mone Netania a nga kôlô si baa be bôt awôme ba a wôé Gedalia e mone Ahikam ndaé Safan a nkpwaté mekôn. Ajô te be nga wôé môte njô bôte ya Babilôn a nga telé njôô Yuda.
Guiziga: Gurjik si na, Ismayel a slikiɗam wuw ati mizli mukuruˀ ngi seˀehey tuwa, a kiɗaka Gedaliya vagay ti maslalam. A kiɗaka mbur buy madiɗa ngi Babiloŋ mucufaŋ ngi wi li tuwa, kahana.
Fulfulde_Adamaoua: Isma'iilu e worɓe mum sappo losi kaafaaje muuɗum'en, mbari Gedaliya mo laamiiɗo Baabila waɗi ngomna lesdi.
Fulfulde_DC: Isma'iilu e worɓe mum sappo losi kaafaaje muuɗum'en, mbari Gedaliya mo laamiiɗo Baabila waɗi ngomna lesdi.
KALATA_KO_SC_Gbaya: Nɛ̀ haya-a Yismaɛl bem ko Nɛtɛnia in o bíí ɓu nɛ̀ nɛ̀ɛ̀ in a̧ kura gbɛ Gedalias bem ko Ahikam nɛ̀ gba-paa pi̧ nù. Nɛ́ hegɔ á̧ à̧ gbɛɛ nɛ̀ wi nɛ̀ wannu Babilɔŋ ee nɛ̀ wi-duk-zu nù‘i yinɛ.
KALATA_KO_DC_Gbaya: Nɛ̀ haya-a Yismaɛl bem ko Nɛtɛnia in o bíí ɓu nɛ̀ nɛ̀ɛ̀ in a̧ kura gbɛ Gedalias bem ko Ahikam nɛ̀ gba-paa pi̧ nù. Nɛ́ hegɔ á̧ à̧ gbɛɛ nɛ̀ wi nɛ̀ wannu Babilɔŋ ee nɛ̀ wi-duk-zu nù‘i yinɛ.
Kapsiki_DC: pepelɛhetɛme yɛ Ismayɛl le mbeli nyi meŋe nyi yite sate te ŋkwa, kawe kawe hɛ tsaslemte ŋkɛ le kafayɛ. Mbəhə hɛ peslekɛ wəndə nya veyi meghea ka Babilone te ghəa hɛɗia Zhəwda.
Tupurri: Mo so no Ismayel je ni Netaniyan raw wo hooge de jar ma hwal maga hay wo wer äe mono, kal wo car Gedaliya je ni Ahikamn je ni Safann go de moslam. Do kay no so no ga se 'war je maga wañ Babilon hay kañn ti sirn go mono.

Francais: - ainsi que tous les judéens qui étaient avec lui, - avec Godolias, - à Maspha; Ismaël tua aussi les Chaldéens qui se trouvaient là, les gens de guerre.
Anglais: Ishmael also slew all the Jews that were with him, even with Gedaliah, at Mizpah, and the Chaldeans that were found there, and the men of war.
BIBALDA_TA_PELDETTA: Sum sa Yudiyan kaf sa ay kat Gedaliya hay Mispa, hiɗi sa Kaldeena sa ka hay liy namna, sum sa wi duura kaw, Ismayel cisi goy kafe.
Bulu: Ismaél a nga wôé fe Beyude bese be nga too fefele Gedalia e Mispa, nalé fe Bekaldééñ be mbe bôte mewosan be nga too valé.
Guiziga: Akẽh na, Ismayel a kiɗa Yudehey misi ati Gedaliya a Mispa cek, waɗ soje ngi Babiloŋhoy misi a Mispa cek ma.
Fulfulde_Adamaoua: Nden Isma'iilu mbari Yahuudu'en wonduɓe bee Gedaliya haa Mispa fuu e honooɓe Kaldiya'en wonɓe ton .
Fulfulde_DC: Nden Isma'iilu mbari Yahuudu'en wonduɓe bee Gedaliya haa Mispa fuu e honooɓe Kaldiya'en wonɓe ton .
KALATA_KO_SC_Gbaya: Nɛ́ kpɔk kalemɔ‘i mbɛt a̧ Yismaɛl gbɛɛ nɛ̀ o be Juda lɛŋ nɛ̀ yaa so in Gedalias sɛn Mispa, ká bá nɛ̀ o wi-biro ko o be Kaldee nɛ̀ a̧a̧ so sɛn Mispa.
KALATA_KO_DC_Gbaya: Nɛ́ kpɔk kalemɔ‘i mbɛt a̧ Yismaɛl gbɛɛ nɛ̀ o be Juda lɛŋ nɛ̀ yaa so in Gedalias sɛn Mispa, ká bá nɛ̀ o wi-biro ko o be Kaldee nɛ̀ a̧a̧ so sɛn Mispa.
Kapsiki_DC: Kwa sebe ta ŋkɛ, mɛke Ismayɛl mpəmte ka Zhəwda nyi mbe Mispa yitea Gedaliya pɛtɛ, tsagha ka sewajɛa ka Babilone nyi tagha.
Tupurri: Ismayel raw id jar Jwif maga hay wo Mispa see Gedaliya ni wo go äuy de sode jar Kalde maga hay wo ni mo lay no.

Francais: Le second jour après le meurtre de Godolias, avant que personne le sût,
Anglais: And it came to pass the second day after he had slain Gedaliah, and no man knew it,
BIBALDA_TA_PELDETTA: Hay buurta ma'ta bugol ci-goyta vi Gedaliya, hay li ma sa bay hum labara tuwa,
Bulu: Alu baa, mvuse ñwôane Gedalia, môt a ngenane te yeme jam éziñ,
Guiziga: A gam hin cuw a dirba mikiɗaka Gedaliya na, ko mbur micina ɓi nah fẽt anta.
Fulfulde_Adamaoua: Jaŋngo man, hiddeko goɗɗo heɓta ɓe mbari Gedaliya,
Fulfulde_DC: Jaŋngo man, hiddeko goɗɗo heɓta ɓe mbari Gedaliya,
KALATA_KO_SC_Gbaya: Zɛ yiitoo ɗoŋ fio ko Gedalias, nɛ̀ bíí tɛ iŋ hɔ̧ɔ̧ na,
KALATA_KO_DC_Gbaya: Zɛ yiitoo ɗoŋ fio ko Gedalias, nɛ̀ bíí tɛ iŋ hɔ̧ɔ̧ na,
Kapsiki_DC: Hɛ bake kwa sebe ta nya peslekɛ Gedaliya mbeli ne, wəndə shɛ keɗepe we.
Tupurri: Ti naw ma de äog blam maga aè 'war Gedaliya go day jobo bay de laage äe wa ëa mono,

Francais: des hommes vinrent de Sichem, de Silo et de Samarie, au nombre de quatre-vingts, la barbe rasée, les vêtements déchirés et le corps couvert d'incisions; ils portaient des offrandes et de l'encens, pour les présenter à la maison de Yahweh.
Anglais: That there came certain from Shechem, from Shiloh, and from Samaria, even fourscore men, having their beards shaven, and their clothes rent, and having cut themselves, with offerings and incense in their hand, to bring them to the house of the  Lord .
BIBALDA_TA_PELDETTA: sumun dok-glafandi may goy hay Sikem, hay Silo hiɗi Samariya pa, jiwersi welay goyo, sligar ma tisin jetay goyo, tuwsi goy jiriya kaw, nisi mar vulda hiɗi ɗifin ma no'osna, kay tuɗum hay ziyda vi Ma-Vatɗina.
Bulu: bôte mewôme muam be nga so Sikem, Silô a Samari, zele ntyeñan, a mengômesane nyaban a mimbaʼa nyô; be nga bili mimveane ya mefub a ôlobinda e mo na, be liti bie Nda Nti.
Guiziga: Dar mizli a ndiloko ti Sikem, ti Silo waɗ ti Samari, taŋ mizli kukur dangafaɗa, mazlamay mihicahay le, zana mingirahay le, vuhoyo car car, taŋ ti gwat ngi vul ati mukuturɓuy mazĩˀĩ ndum, ɓa ngi zlum ar hay ngi Bumbulvuŋ.
Fulfulde_Adamaoua: worɓe cappanɗe njoweetato ngari diga Sikem e Silo e Samariya. Ɓe laɓno bakkuɗe maɓɓe, ɓe ceekno limce maɓɓe, ɓe ƴarino ɓalli maɓɓe boo. Ɓe ngari bee dokke nyaamdu e uurle haa juuɗe maɓɓe, haa ɓe lii'o ɗum haa haykaliiru Jawmiraawo.
Fulfulde_DC: worɓe cappanɗe njoweetato ngari diga Sikem e Silo e Samariya. Ɓe laɓno bakkuɗe maɓɓe, ɓe ceekno limce maɓɓe, ɓe ƴarino ɓalli maɓɓe boo. Ɓe ngari bee dokke nyaamdu e uurle haa juuɗe maɓɓe, haa ɓe lii'o ɗum haa haykaliiru Jawmiraawo.
KALATA_KO_SC_Gbaya: o bíí tɛ̀ɛ́ nɛ Sikɛm, nɛ̀ Silo in nɛ̀ Samarii; wa lɛŋ duka so nɛ́ o bíí ɓu-mɔɔrɔ-ɗoŋ-taar. Wa kpuia zera, pi̧ nɛ̀ o a̧ka̧ laa zɛgbɛ-zɛgbɛ, gɔn nɛ̀ tɛ-wa mbɛt, wa tui so nɛ́ o ha̧a̧mɔ in fuu-nyama tɛnɛ pii kɔ̧́ Tua ko Sɔ̧.
KALATA_KO_DC_Gbaya: o bíí tɛ̀ɛ́ nɛ Sikɛm, nɛ̀ Silo in nɛ̀ Samarii; wa lɛŋ duka so nɛ́ o bíí ɓu-mɔɔrɔ-ɗoŋ-taar. Wa kpuia zera, pi̧ nɛ̀ o a̧ka̧ laa zɛgbɛ-zɛgbɛ, gɔn nɛ̀ tɛ-wa mbɛt, wa tui so nɛ́ o ha̧a̧mɔ in fuu-nyama tɛnɛ pii kɔ̧́ Tua ko Sɔ̧.
Kapsiki_DC: Pɛkwe kweci mbeli deghesemsə se mbe Sishɛm, Silo ba'a Samari. Keŋsə ŋsə ghwɛmɛa nci, keŋkwahe ŋkwahe lekwesa ta nci ba'a keperawe perawe geva ta nci. Ha ba'a 'wərdə ya va hɛ kalə kabete mbe ghɛa Mahwətə.
Tupurri: jar po wo do nenma' aà wo le Sikem, le Silo wo de Samari wo go de ceçë piñ äaara, wo go de ngrag oçoçbe see day wo de ngaë see äaara. AÀ hay wo de feçeçre haçge wo de fen foçoçre no do ma woge de äaara äil tiñ mani Manwur no.

Francais: Ismaël, fils de Nathanias, sortit de Maspha à leur rencontre, tout en pleurant; et, quand il les eut atteints, il leur dit: "Venez vers Godolias, fils d'Ahicam."
Anglais: And Ishmael the son of Nethaniah went forth from Mizpah to meet them, weeping all along as he went: and it came to pass, as he met them, he said unto them, Come to Gedaliah the son of Ahikam.
BIBALDA_TA_PELDETTA: Ismayel goora vi Netaniya kali goy hay Mispa vok irsiya; nam tuɗ kilan tiy kila'. Hay li ma nam ŋaf hiɗi nisiya, nam di tisiya: Nigiyay goy tam Gedaliya goora vi Ahikam.
Bulu: Nde Ismaél e mone Nétania a nga ke tôbane be; a mbe a wuluʼu, a yônôk, éyoñ a kuiya vôm be mbe, a nga jô be na: Zaʼane be Gedalia e mone Ahikam.
Guiziga: Ismayel mangal ngi Netaniya, a bo ti Mispa nga ji ti taŋ hirnga, ara ru bal ti tuwuy, naŋ mindil avu taŋ na, a ɓa taŋ: «Soko puraka Gedaliya ayɗi!»
Fulfulde_Adamaoua: Isma'iilu ɓii Netaniya wurti Mispa ngam fottugo bee maɓɓe, o ɗon woya. Nde o fotti bee maɓɓe, o wi'i ɓe: “Ngare kommbi Gedaliya ɓii Ahikam.”
Fulfulde_DC: Isma'iilu ɓii Netaniya wurti Mispa ngam fottugo bee maɓɓe, o ɗon woya. Nde o fotti bee maɓɓe, o wi'i ɓe: “Ngare kommbi Gedaliya ɓii Ahikam.”
KALATA_KO_SC_Gbaya: Yismaɛl bem ko Nɛtania kura sɛn Mispa we nɛ̀ ti wa, nɛ̀ hi̧a kɔ̧a̧; a̧ kpaa wa yuwar mɛ, ɓɛɛ a̧ tɔ̧ ha̧ wa: «Ɛ̀nɛ̀ tɛ́ɛ̀ zɔ́k Gedalias bem ko Ahikam.»
KALATA_KO_DC_Gbaya: Yismaɛl bem ko Nɛtania kura sɛn Mispa we nɛ̀ ti wa, nɛ̀ hi̧a kɔ̧a̧; a̧ kpaa wa yuwar mɛ, ɓɛɛ a̧ tɔ̧ ha̧ wa: «Ɛ̀nɛ̀ tɛ́ɛ̀ zɔ́k Gedalias bem ko Ahikam.»
Kapsiki_DC: Pɛkwe Ismayɛl, wəzege ta Netaniya le nehwene shave mbe Mispa kezha begeme le hɛ. Ma kwa ntsehe ŋkɛ yitea hɛ, ma ke sha hɛ: «Nde mə kenewe Gedaliya, wəzege ta Ahikam.»
Tupurri: Ismayel je ni Netaniya raw kalge le go Mispa caa pel äaara de seege caw ti ro. De maga aà a go dayge see äaara mono, se kal riñ rage gano: See wee le ni Gedaliya je ni Ahikam no.

Francais: Mais dès qu'ils furent entrés au milieu de la ville, Ismaël, fils de Nathanias, les égorgea et les jeta au milieu de la citerne, lui et les hommes qui étaient avec lui.
Anglais: And it was so, when they came into the midst of the city, that Ishmael the son of Nethaniah slew them, and cast them into the midst of the pit, he, and the men that were with him.
BIBALDA_TA_PELDETTA: Hay li ma nisi co kulo way hoyok-ziyna, Ismayel goora vi Netaniya ŋatsi goyo, nam cuksi hay kaara, gut kuɗum kayn si sum sa tapay kuɗumna.
Bulu: Vʼéyoñe be nga kui ézezañe tison, Ismaél e mone Nétania a nga wôé be, a wua be ébé mendim, bôte baa be be be mbe nsamba be nga volô nye.
Guiziga: Taŋ micam nga hur walahay muduba na, Ismayel mangal ngi Netaniya ati mizli ngi seˀehey tuwa, a ngizlaka taŋ kap, waɗ vagay taŋhaya fuk fuk ng'ar vigiɗi.
Fulfulde_Adamaoua: Nde ɓe nasti wuro, Isma'iilu e worɓe muuɗum mbari ɓe, cakkini ɓe nder ɓulndu.
Fulfulde_DC: Nde ɓe nasti wuro, Isma'iilu e worɓe muuɗum mbari ɓe, cakkini ɓe nder ɓulndu.
KALATA_KO_SC_Gbaya: Hee mɔ'ɔ nɛ̀ wa hɔɔ see ye kaɗi ga, Yismaɛl bem ko Nɛtania in o bíí nɛ̀ a̧a̧ so in a̧ tika zu wa, kum wa, ɓɛɛ kai o wɔr-wa a kɔ̧̀ gɔna-yì.
KALATA_KO_DC_Gbaya: Hee mɔ'ɔ nɛ̀ wa hɔɔ see ye kaɗi ga, Yismaɛl bem ko Nɛtania in o bíí nɛ̀ a̧a̧ so in a̧ tika zu wa, kum wa, ɓɛɛ kai o wɔr-wa a kɔ̧̀ gɔna-yì.
Kapsiki_DC: Ama ntsehema ta nci mbe meleme ne, pa Ismayɛl, wəzege ta Netaniya le mbeli nyi yite mpəmte hɛ, tereke hɛ sha geva ta nci kwa belageji.
Tupurri: Ama de maga aà day wo go ti gesiëgi äi leegen mono, Ismayel je ni Netaniyan raw ngaë rage go day laa rage go äi gutugi, jar maga hay wo see äe kay wo ne ni.

Francais: Mais il se trouva parmi eux dix hommes qui dirent à Ismaël: "Ne nous fais pas mourir, car nous avons dans les champs des provisions cachées de froment, d'orge, d'huile et de miel." Alors il s'arrêta et ne les fit pas mourir au milieu de leurs frères.
Anglais: But ten men were found among them that said unto Ishmael, Slay us not: for we have treasures in the field, of wheat, and of barley, and of oil, and of honey. So he forbare, and slew them not among their brethren.
BIBALDA_TA_PELDETTA: May sum segen ka jarsi doogo, nisi di tam Ismayel ala: Cuma goyɗi, kay numa ka hiɗi sle ma tin ŋayay goy hay sinena: alkamarena, orgena, mula hiɗi yumna. Nala nam hinsi goyo, min cisi goy kuɗ ɓosiyosinɗi.
Bulu: Ve bôt awôme yʼété be nga jô Ismaél na: Te bo na bi wu amu bi bili mengaʼaban nsolan e mefup: fôn a nlisi, mbon a wôé. Ajô te a nga jôʼé ôsimesane ya wôé be baa be bobenyañe bap.
Guiziga: Mizli kuruˀ a wuzla mizli tayna, a ɓaka Ismayele le zleˀe: «Ki kiɗa ndra ta, i wam vu le ti gwatay ɗum ɗum haɗi a ɓuh: alkamari, daw giziŋ, mal waɗ mam.» Vurˀe, Ismayel a pula taŋ, a kiɗa taŋ ati sukum taŋhaya ta.
Fulfulde_Adamaoua: Ammaa woodi worɓe sappo caka maɓɓe ɓe mbi'i Isma'iilu: “Useni taa mbar min! Min nyukkini alkamaari e sa'iiruuri e nebbam e njumri nder gese.” Ngam man o acci ɓe, o mbardaay ɓe bee sooba'en maɓɓe.
Fulfulde_DC: Ammaa woodi worɓe sappo caka maɓɓe ɓe mbi'i Isma'iilu: “Useni taa mbar min! Min nyukkini alkamaari e sa'iiruuri e nebbam e njumri nder gese.” Ngam man o acci ɓe, o mbardaay ɓe bee sooba'en maɓɓe.
KALATA_KO_SC_Gbaya: Mgbara wa'i, o bíí ɓu a̧a̧ sɛnɛ nɛ̀ tɔ̧ɔ̧ ha̧ Yismaɛl: «Ká mɛ́ gbɛ yɛ na, ɛɛ a̧a̧ nɛ̀ o nyɔŋmɔ n’ɛɛ hu̧sa̧ zaŋbɛɛ: alkamaari, fon, nɔ̧́ in gɔrɔ.» Yismaɛl ee wa duk in o nya-wa.
KALATA_KO_DC_Gbaya: Mgbara wa'i, o bíí ɓu a̧a̧ sɛnɛ nɛ̀ tɔ̧ɔ̧ ha̧ Yismaɛl: «Ká mɛ́ gbɛ yɛ na, ɛɛ a̧a̧ nɛ̀ o nyɔŋmɔ n’ɛɛ hu̧sa̧ zaŋbɛɛ: alkamaari, fon, nɔ̧́ in gɔrɔ.» Yismaɛl ee wa duk in o nya-wa.
Kapsiki_DC: Ama kweci mbeli meŋe hwa hɛ meŋe sha Ismayɛl: «Mba na kempə n'yɛ, kwa nza ŋkɛ mba wəshi kezeme ta n'yɛ kwamte hwa gamba te wəfərə, yɛ ha, megi, n'yi le yɛməa mze.» Tagha, pa Ismayɛl ɗema mpə hɛ le ka menəhɛ nci.
Tupurri: Ama jar po hay wo we yoo äaara ni hwal raw wo wii Ismayel gano: Id wuur go wa werga wuur yañ de yoñ feçeçre reege wo äil pay wo la de coore ble, de orje, de noo wo noo yoçoçre. Do kay nono se raw men rage ië ra go do heçeçre äaaran wo gaè.

Francais: La citerne dans laquelle Ismaël jeta les cadavres des hommes qu'il avait frappés à cause de Godolias, est celle que le roi Asa avait faite en vue de Baasa, roi d'Israël; c'est elle qu'Ismaël, fils de Nathanias, remplit de cadavres.
Anglais: Now the pit wherein Ishmael had cast all the dead bodies of the men, whom he had slain because of Gedaliah, was it which Asa the king had made for fear of Baasha king of Israel: and Ishmael the son of Nethaniah filled it with them that were slain.
BIBALDA_TA_PELDETTA: Kaata ta Ismayel cuk tuwna vi sa nam cisi goboy hiɗi Gedaliya kayni ti kaata ta mulla Asa kota'ta, nam kota' kayni kuɗ Bayeska mulla vi Israyel, Ismayel goora vi Netaniya cuk tuw sum sa nam cisin kayn hay kaat na'ta.
Bulu: Ebé mendime Ismaél a nga wua mimbime mi bôte bese a nga wôé fefele Gedalia é ne ji njô bôt Asa a nga bo, amu Baéka njô bôte yʼIsraél; nje Ismaél, e mone Nétania a nga jalé mimbim.
Guiziga: Vigiɗ misi Ismayel mingizla mizli, naŋ mizliɗa vagay taŋhay ng'ara na, i vigiɗ Gedaliya, buy Asa milaŋ, ti taŋ magam vurum ati Basa buy Israyel. Ismayel a naha mbaf ti vagay ngi mizli.
Fulfulde_Adamaoua: Ɓulndu ndu Isma'iilu sakkini ɓalli mbaraaɓe go nder muuɗum, ndu mawndu. Laamiiɗo Asa wasno ndu ngam daliila Ba'asa, laamiiɗo Isra'iila. Isma'iilu ɓii Netaniya hebbini ndu bee mbaraaɓe.
Fulfulde_DC: Ɓulndu ndu Isma'iilu sakkini ɓalli mbaraaɓe go nder muuɗum, ndu mawndu. Laamiiɗo Asa wasno ndu ngam daliila Ba'asa, laamiiɗo Isra'iila. Isma'iilu ɓii Netaniya hebbini ndu bee mbaraaɓe.
KALATA_KO_SC_Gbaya: Gɔna-kɔ̧́-yì nɛ̀ Yismaɛl aa so o wɔr-bíí n'aa gbɛɛ so sɛnɛ‘i duka so nɛ́ gasa gɔna-kɔ̧́-yì nɛ̀ wannu Asa gɔna so ŋgimbi nɛ̀ Baɛsa wannu  Israɛl  baa so nɛ̀ biro dúk nɛ̀ a̧. Yismaɛl bem ko Nɛtania aa o wɔr dun gɔna-kɔ̧́-yì‘i,
KALATA_KO_DC_Gbaya: Gɔna-kɔ̧́-yì nɛ̀ Yismaɛl aa so o wɔr-bíí n'aa gbɛɛ so sɛnɛ‘i duka so nɛ́ gasa gɔna-kɔ̧́-yì nɛ̀ wannu Asa gɔna so ŋgimbi nɛ̀ Baɛsa wannu  Israɛl  baa so nɛ̀ biro dúk nɛ̀ a̧. Yismaɛl bem ko Nɛtania aa o wɔr dun gɔna-kɔ̧́-yì‘i,
Kapsiki_DC: Kebeŋwenyɛ belageji nya beteyi mbeli nyi kempə mpə nyighɛ Ismayɛl kwa. Meghe Asa nde late kwa nza hɛ kampa le Basha, meghea ka Israyɛl. Mpɛafe Ismayɛl viɗikɛ le mbeli nyi mpəmte ŋkɛ.
Tupurri: Gutug maga Ismayel laa huli jar maga se id ra go wer Gedaliya ni lay diñ gutug maga wañ Asa hay teen do heçeçne Baesa wañ Israyel mono. Se na diñ gutug se ga Ismayel je ni Netaniyan ban go de huli jar mo so no.

Francais: Et Ismaël emmena prisonnier le reste du peuple qui était à Maspha, les filles du roi et tout le peuple qui était resté à Maspha, auxquels Nabuzardan, chef des gardes, avait donné pour chef Godolias, fils d'Ahicam; Ismaël, fils de Nathanias, les emmena prisonniers, et partit pour passer chez les fils d'Ammon.
Anglais: Then Ishmael carried away captive all the residue of the people that were in Mizpah, even the king's daughters, and all the people that remained in Mizpah, whom Nebuzar–adan the captain of the guard had committed to Gedaliah the son of Ahikam: and Ishmael the son of Nethaniah carried them away captive, and departed to go over to the Ammonites.
BIBALDA_TA_PELDETTA: Sum sa hin hay Mispan kaf Ismayel yawsi gorvo'o, guro-boyna vi mulla hiɗi sum sa ka lakay hay liy namna kaf, sum sa Nebuzaradan ma ŋolla vi sa ŋomda hinsi hay ɓam Gedaliya goora vi Ahikam, sum nisina Ismayel goora vi Netaniya yawsi gorvo'o, nam kaliya kay tuɗ goy vi sa Amonna.
Bulu: Ismaél a nga kee mebukaʼa me bôte mese yʼayoñ me mbe Mispa minkôm: bengon be njô bôt a ba bese ya bôt be mbe Mispa, mbe Nébuzaradañ, évete bezimbi, a nga kee Gedalia e mone Ahikam; Ismaél, e mone Nétania a nga kee be minkôm a a nga bulane ke koone bone bʼAmon.
Guiziga: Akẽh na, is ngi mizli Mispahaya, Ismayel a ja taŋ cek, aru taŋ: maˀãyay ati is ngi mizli mindiram ti siifa a Mispa gar, mizli, Nebuzaradaŋ madiɗa ngi mijigina buy, mupula taŋ asi haŋ ngi Gedaliya. Joˀ Ismayel aru ti mizli mijahaya ng'avi Amoŋhoy.
Fulfulde_Adamaoua: Nden o naŋngi ɓiɓɓe laamiiɗo rewɓe e yimɓe luttuɓe haa Mispa ɓe Nebuzaradan, hooreejo aynooɓe halfitinno Gedaliya ɓii Ahikam. O hoo'i ɓe ngam o daha ɓe haa lesdi Ammoon.
Fulfulde_DC: Nden o naŋngi ɓiɓɓe laamiiɗo rewɓe e yimɓe luttuɓe haa Mispa ɓe Nebuzaradan, hooreejo aynooɓe halfitinno Gedaliya ɓii Ahikam. O hoo'i ɓe ngam o daha ɓe haa lesdi Ammoon.
KALATA_KO_SC_Gbaya: ɓɛɛ a̧ kai o oi bíí saaye Mispa nɛ̀ bara-biro yaknɛ: o boko-be-wan in o oi bíí nɛ̀ ɓɔna so kɔ‘i fara ɔa-a Mispa kaŋ, o wan nɛ̀ Nɛbuzaradaŋ wan ko o wi-pɛm-wannu aa so er Gedalias, bem ko Ahikam, Yismaɛl bem ko Nɛtania kaia wa nɛ̀ bara-biro yaknɛ, ɓɛɛ a̧ nɛ́ɛ̀ kpa nɛ̀ o be Amɔŋ.
KALATA_KO_DC_Gbaya: ɓɛɛ a̧ kai o oi bíí saaye Mispa nɛ̀ bara-biro yaknɛ: o boko-be-wan in o oi bíí nɛ̀ ɓɔna so kɔ‘i fara ɔa-a Mispa kaŋ, o wan nɛ̀ Nɛbuzaradaŋ wan ko o wi-pɛm-wannu aa so er Gedalias, bem ko Ahikam, Yismaɛl bem ko Nɛtania kaia wa nɛ̀ bara-biro yaknɛ, ɓɛɛ a̧ nɛ́ɛ̀ kpa nɛ̀ o be Amɔŋ.
Kapsiki_DC: Kwa sebe ta ŋkɛ, kəliɓə Ismayɛl fəhwe mbeli nyi ketene mbe Mispa kaka mavashi, tsagha ŋwalea kwɛa meghe, geze ta ŋkɛ, pɛtɛa mbeli nyi dapave nda Nebəwzaradan, wəndə nya te ghəa ka ya meghe ke Gedaliya. Ntəŋə Ismayɛl le ka mavashia shɛhɛ kalə sha ka Amon.
Tupurri: Ismayel raw hoo jar maga hay gwa' wo Mispa ni mo äuy dañgay. Mayre mani wañn wo de jar maga hay gwa' wo Mispa ga Nebusaradan wañ soden hay haç ra ne Gedaliya je ni Ahikamn do mono, Ismayel je ni Netaniyan hoo ra dañgay day raw de äaara ma woge ni jar Amoñ wo.

Francais: Johanan, fils de Carée, et tous les chefs de troupes qui étaient avec lui, ayant appris tout le mal qu'Ismaël, fils de Nathanias, avait fait,
Anglais: But when Johanan the son of Kareah, and all the captains of the forces that were with him, heard of all the evil that Ishmael the son of Nethaniah had done,
BIBALDA_TA_PELDETTA: Yohanan goora vi Kareyak, hiɗi sa ŋulona vi sojena sa ay hiɗi namna kaf nisi hum labara kay joo ma Ismayel goora vi Netaniya lumna.
Bulu: Yôhanañ, e mone Kavéa, a bivete bise ya nkane bita baa be be be mbe nsamba, be nga wôʼôtan abé ese Ismaél e mone Nétania a nga bo.
Guiziga: Mungra madiɗa Ismayel mangal ngi Netaniya miga tuwa, Yohanaŋ mangal ngi Kareya ati madiɗa ngi sojehey gar micinaka ɓi naŋ na,
Fulfulde_Adamaoua: Ammaa Yohanan ɓii Kareha e mawɓe wonduɓe bee maako fuu nani kalluɗum ko Isma'iilu ɓii Netaniya waɗi.
Fulfulde_DC: Ammaa Yohanan ɓii Kareha e mawɓe wonduɓe bee maako fuu nani kalluɗum ko Isma'iilu ɓii Netaniya waɗi.
KALATA_KO_SC_Gbaya: Ŋgimbi nɛ̀ Yohanaŋ, bem ko Karea in o gasa wi-biro nɛ̀ yaa so in a̧‘i zia wen gbɛɛ-zu ko Yismaɛl, bem ko Natania,
KALATA_KO_DC_Gbaya: Ŋgimbi nɛ̀ Yohanaŋ, bem ko Karea in o gasa wi-biro nɛ̀ yaa so in a̧‘i zia wen gbɛɛ-zu ko Yismaɛl, bem ko Natania,
Kapsiki_DC: Fatema ta yɛ Yohanan, wəzege ta Karɛya le mbelia jama nyi te ghəa ka sewajɛ nyi yite ke wəsə kwa ndiremi nya menete Ismayɛl, wəzege ta Netaniya ne,
Tupurri: Yohanan je ni Koreyan wo de jar kluuri sode maga hay wo see äe mo äuy raw wo laa ree älagge maga Ismayel je ni Netaniyan joñn mo äuy no.

Francais: prirent tous leurs hommes et se mirent en marche pour combattre Ismaël, fils de Nathanias; ils l'atteignirent près du grand étang de Gabaon.
Anglais: Then they took all the men, and went to fight with Ishmael the son of Nethaniah, and found him by the great waters that are in Gibeon.
BIBALDA_TA_PELDETTA: Nisi yaw sumun kuɗsi kaf kali kay mot Ismayel goora vi Netaniya. Nisi fum goboy hiɗi goloŋ ŋulona vi Gabawon.
Bulu: Nde be nga nyoñe bôte bese a ke wosane Ismaél e mone Nétania. Be nga koone nye e beta mendim me ne Gabaoñ.
Guiziga: a kusoko mizli taŋhaya gar, a bam nga kiɗa vu ati Ismayel mangal ngi Netaniya. A ra lumakaŋ a mi yam madiɗa a Gabaˀoŋ.
Fulfulde_Adamaoua: Ɓe mooɓti worɓe maɓɓe fuu, ɓe njehi haɓugo bee maako. Ɓe njokki mo baŋnge weendu mawndu haa Gibiyon.
Fulfulde_DC: Ɓe mooɓti worɓe maɓɓe fuu, ɓe njehi haɓugo bee maako. Ɓe njokki mo baŋnge weendu mawndu haa Gibiyon.

Francais: Et quand tout le peuple qui était avec Ismaël, vit Johanan, fils de Carée, et tous les chefs des troupes qui étaient avec lui, il s'en réjouit.
Anglais: Now it came to pass, that when all the people which were with Ishmael saw Johanan the son of Kareah, and all the captains of the forces that were with him, then they were glad.
BIBALDA_TA_PELDETTA: Hay li ma sum sa ay kuɗ Ismayel kaf wi Yohanan goora vi Kareyak hiɗi sa ŋulona vi vokŋa vi sojen kaf kuɗumu, nisi li firiya;
Bulu: Eyoñe bôte bese baa be Ismaél be mbe nsamba be nga yene Yôhanañ, e mone Kavéa, ba be bivete ya nkane bita nsamba, ane be nga vak;
Guiziga: Mizli Ismayel mija taŋ tuwa gar, taŋ mupuraka Yohanaŋ mangal ngi Kareya ati madiɗa ngi sojeheye aseˀe na, ara mumulom.

KALATA_KO_DC_Gbaya: Ŋgimbi nɛ̀ o bíí lɛŋ nɛ̀ yaa so in Yismaɛl zɔka Yohanaŋ bem ko Karea in o gasa wi-biro lɛŋ nɛ̀ yaa so in a̧, wa kpaa desee.

Francais: Et tout le peuple qu'Ismaël emmenait prisonnier de Maspha se retourna et vint se joindre à Johanan, fils de Carée.

Francais: Mais Ismaël, fils de Nathanias, s'échappa avec huit hommes devant Johanan, et alla chez les fils d'Ammon.
Anglais: But Ishmael the son of Nethaniah escaped from Johanan with eight men, and went to the Ammonites.

Guiziga: Amma Ismayel mangal ngi Netaniya, a kil ti mizli dangafaɗ a mbuŋ Yohanaŋ mangal ngi Kareya, a ram nga wuzla mizli Amoŋhoy.
Fulfulde_Adamaoua: Ammaa Isma'iilu e worɓe njoweetato ndaɗi Yohanan, ndilli lesdi Ammoon.

Francais: Et Johanan, fils de Carée, et tous les chefs des troupes qui étaient avec lui, prirent tout le reste du peuple qu'Ismaël, fils de Nathanias, avait emmené de Maspha, après avoir tué Godolias, fils d'Ahicam, hommes de guerre, femmes, enfants et eunuques, et ils les ramenèrent de Gabaon.
Anglais: Then took Johanan the son of Kareah, and all the captains of the forces that were with him, all the remnant of the people whom he had recovered from Ishmael the son of Nethaniah, from Mizpah, after that he had slain Gedaliah the son of Ahikam, even mighty men of war, and the women, and the children, and the eunuchs, whom he had brought again from Gibeon:
BIBALDA_TA_PELDETTA: Ki kayn nala, Yohanan goora vi Kareyak hiɗi sa ŋulona vi sojena sa kuɗum kafna, yaw caw sum sa hinna, nam butsi goy hay ɓam Ismayel goora vi Netaniya, hay ma nam kal sumun goy hay Mispa pa bugol nan ci Gedaliya goora vi Ahikam goy cina. Nisi sa Yohanan hotsi ay hay Gabawon pan kayni; sum sa wi duura, boyna, gurosgurayna, sa patayna kaw.
Bulu: Yôhanañ, e mone Kavéa, a bivete bise ya nkane bita baa be be be mbe nsamba, be nga nyoñe mebukaʼa me bôte be nga so me Mispa, be Ismaél, e mone Nétania a nga wôé Gedalia, e mone Ahikam, me too ana: Bôte mewosan, binga, bon a bemiak, a nga soo be Gabaoñ.
Guiziga: A dirba nah na, Yohanaŋ mangal ngi Kareya ati madiɗa ngi sojehey misi aseˀe, a tiɓaka is ngi mizli mindiram na cek. I mizli Ismayel mangal ngi Netaniya mujo taŋ a Mispa, a dirba naŋ mikiɗa Gedaliya mangal ngi Ahikam tuwa: mizli mizile ngi vurumoy, ngwasay, ziri ati mizli ngi mamay buyoy, naŋ muso taŋ ti Gabaˀoŋ.
Fulfulde_Adamaoua: Nden Yohanan ɓii Kareha e mawɓe konu wonduɓe bee maako kooci honooɓe e rewɓe e ɓikkoy e suka'en laamiiɗo, waato yimɓe ɓe Isma'iilu naŋnguno haa Mispa, ɓaawo o mbarino Gedaliya ɓii Ahikam. Ɓe koo'i ɓe haa Gibiyon,

Mɛ̀ nɛ́ o wan nɛ̀ Yismaɛl bem ko Nɛtania kaia so nɛ̀ bara-biro sɛn Mispa ɗoŋ fio ko Gedalias, bem ko Ahikam: o wiwii, o wi-biro, o okoo, o obem in o bíí mɛ kɔ̧̀ kira ko wannu nɛ̀ wa kaia tɛnɛ nɛ̀ Gabaɔŋ.

Mɛ̀ nɛ́ o wan nɛ̀ Yismaɛl bem ko Nɛtania kaia so nɛ̀ bara-biro sɛn Mispa ɗoŋ fio ko Gedalias, bem ko Ahikam: o wiwii, o wi-biro, o okoo, o obem in o bíí mɛ kɔ̧̀ kira ko wannu nɛ̀ wa kaia tɛnɛ nɛ̀ Gabaɔŋ.
Kapsiki_DC: Kwa sebe ta ŋkɛ, kəliɓə yɛ Yohanan, wəzege ta Karɛya le mbelia jama nyi te ghəa ka sewajɛ nyi yite te mbeli nyi ketene teghweme hwa mbeli nyi fəke Ismayɛl shave mbe Mispa, kwa sebe ta mte ta Gedaliya, wəzege ta Ahikam: zhili, ka sewajɛ, mi, ŋwale ba'a mbelia jama nyi fəke hɛ se mbe Gabawon.
Tupurri: Yohanan je ni Kareyan wo de jar kluuri sode maga hay wo wer äe raw wo hoo jar maga Ismayel hay hoo ra le Mispa blam huli Gedaliya je ni Ahikam wo äuy: Jar durgi wo, naaren wo, weeren wo de jar kluuri wo de jar ma de ndar äayn wo saara hoo ra le Gabawoñ fer wo le de äaara.

Francais: Ils allèrent et s'arrêtèrent au caravansérail de Chamaam, près de Bethléem, pour se retirer ensuite en Egypte,
Anglais: And they departed, and dwelt in the habitation of Chimham, which is by Beth–lehem, to go to enter into Egypt,
BIBALDA_TA_PELDETTA: Nisi fokay tuɗa, ta-ta nisi lak kayn kat liyn ma kot tina vi Kimham goboy hiɗi Betlehem, kay tuɗ ŋay goy hay Egipte bugolda,
Bulu: Be nga wulu a tebe nda beyeñ é ne Kimham, bebé Bétléhém asu ya suʼulane ke Ejipte
Guiziga: A zuɓaka jiviɗe, ara cicam ar li pi sar ngi mulakay a Kimeham, prok ngi Betelyem, may taŋ ngi ru nga Ezipte.
Fulfulde_Adamaoua: ɓe ndilli. Ɓe njippi wakkati seɗɗa haa hoɗorde Kimham baŋnge Baytilaama. Ɓe annini yahugo haa Misra

KALATA_KO_SC_Gbaya: Wa baa yuwar yak, ɓɛɛ wa yor sɛn kɔ̧̀ gbagari Kimam ká̧ Bɛtlɛhɛm zu naŋ-wa, wen yaka-a si Egiptɛ.
KALATA_KO_DC_Gbaya: Wa baa yuwar yak, ɓɛɛ wa yor sɛn kɔ̧̀ gbagari Kimam ká̧ Bɛtlɛhɛm zu naŋ-wa, wen yaka-a si Egiptɛ.
Kapsiki_DC: Cape kwa hweŋkwa, pa hɛ ghereŋenji mbe ghedəkwəa Kimeham, takwa yitea Bɛtelɛhɛm. Kadzawa Ɛzhipte zəzəte hɛ,
Tupurri: Saara mañ faage day lag wo iggi ti tiñ waare ma Kimham ti jeñ Betlehem no ma dañge wo go blam äe äil sir Ejipte

Francais: loin des Chaldéens qu'ils craignaient, parce qu'Ismaël, fils de Nathanias, avait tué Godolias, fils d'Ahicam, que le roi de Babylone avait établi gouverneur du pays.
Anglais: Because of the Chaldeans: for they were afraid of them, because Ishmael the son of Nethaniah had slain Gedaliah the son of Ahikam, whom the king of Babylon made governor in the land.
BIBALDA_TA_PELDETTA: gine hiɗi sa Kaldeena sa nisi ka li nar kisiya, kay mige Ismayel goora vi Netaniya ci Gedaliya goora vi Ahikam goyo, kay tun Gedaliya guverner hay kayni mi mulla vi Babilon.
Bulu: ôyap a Bekaldééñ be mbe be koo woñ, amu Ismaél, e mone Nétania a nga wôé Gedalia e mone Ahikam nye njô bôte ya Babilôn a nga telé ngovina ya Yuda.
Guiziga: A kilam ti Babiloŋhoy, taŋ mazluwunam ti taŋ, asi Ismayel mangal ngi Netaniya mikiɗa Gedaliya mangal ngi Ahikam, buy madiɗa ngi Babiloŋ mucufaŋ buy miwi li tuwa.
Fulfulde_Adamaoua: ngam daaytaago bee Kaldiya'en. Ɓe kuli Kaldiya'en, ngam Isma'iilu mbari Gedaliya mo laamiiɗo Baabila waɗino ngomna lesdi.
Fulfulde_DC: ngam daaytaago bee Kaldiya'en. Ɓe kuli Kaldiya'en, ngam Isma'iilu mbari Gedaliya mo laamiiɗo Baabila waɗino ngomna lesdi.
KALATA_KO_SC_Gbaya: Wa yuu so nɛ́ o be Kaldee nɛ̀ wa de kíí-wa, wen nɛ̀ Yismaɛl bem ko Nɛtania gbɛɛ so Gedalias, bem ko Ahikam, wi-duk-zu-nù nɛ̀ wannu Babilɔŋ ee so.
KALATA_KO_DC_Gbaya: Wa yuu so nɛ́ o be Kaldee nɛ̀ wa de kíí-wa, wen nɛ̀ Yismaɛl bem ko Nɛtania gbɛɛ so Gedalias, bem ko Ahikam, wi-duk-zu-nù nɛ̀ wannu Babilɔŋ ee so.
Kapsiki_DC: kwa nza ŋkɛ nahe hɛ keghazlənənji va ka Babilone, ghala kwa peslekɛ Gedaliya, wəndə nya veyi meghea ka Babilone te ghəa hɛɗi Ismayɛl.
Tupurri: do jar Kalde wo. Gahaçyla, aà hay wo de heçeçne do äaara ga aà joñ wo bon saara, ti maga Ismayel je ni Netaniyan 'war Gedaliya je ni Ahikam maga wañ Babilon hay kañn waçaç ree sirn go mono.

Francais: Alors tous les chefs de troupes, ainsi que Johanan, fils de Carée, Jezonias, fils d'Osaïas, et tout le peuple, petits et grands,
Anglais: Then all the captains of the forces, and Johanan the son of Kareah, and Jezaniah the son of Hoshaiah, and all the people from the least even unto the greatest, came near,
BIBALDA_TA_PELDETTA: Sum sa ŋulona vi sojen kaf, Yohanan goora vi Kareyak, Yezaniya goora vi Hoseya, hiɗi sumun kaf, tun caw tam sa gurayn pa ta-ta tam sa ŋulona co vok Yeremiyas,
Bulu: Bivete bise ya nkane bita: Yôhanañ e mone Karéa, Yezania e mone Hôkaya a bôte bese yʼayoñ, ataté nyô a ne tyôtyoé a kui nyô a nʼanen, be nga zu
Guiziga: Madiɗa ngi sojehey gar, ngay taŋ taˀ taˀ mufaɗa, wãˀ naŋ na, ti: Yohanaŋ mangal ngi Kareya, Yezaniya mangal ngi Hosaya, waɗ mizli gar, ziri ati mizli madiɗahay, a ram ng'avi
Fulfulde_Adamaoua: Yohanan ɓii Kareha e Yejaniya . ɓii Hosa'ya e mawɓe konu woɗɓe fuu ngardi bee yimɓe mawɓe e leesɓe fuu
Fulfulde_DC: Yohanan ɓii Kareha e Yejaniya . ɓii Hosa'ya e mawɓe konu woɗɓe fuu ngardi bee yimɓe mawɓe e leesɓe fuu
KALATA_KO_SC_Gbaya: O gasa wi-biro lɛŋ, Yohanaŋ bem ko Karea, in Azaria bem ko Hosaya in o bíí lɛŋ, o gasawi in o geɗek-wi tɛ̀ɛ̀ pii katɛ
KALATA_KO_DC_Gbaya: O gasa wi-biro lɛŋ, Yohanaŋ bem ko Karea, in Azaria bem ko Hosaya in o bíí lɛŋ, o gasawi in o geɗek-wi tɛ̀ɛ̀ pii katɛ
Kapsiki_DC: Pɛtɛa mbelia jama nyi te ghəa wəvəsəa ka sewajɛ, geze ta ŋkɛ, yɛ Yohanan, wəzege ta Karɛya, Yezaniya, wəzege ta Hoshaya le mbeli nyi tagha pɛtɛ, se te ŋwale hwa'a te mbelia jama hendeke nda geva
Tupurri: Wañre soden wo äuy, Yohanan je ni Kareya no, Yesaniya je ni Hosayan wo de jarn äuy, tï¡ï¡ ti ma kleen haçaç go ti ma kluu raw wo ya'ge le,

Francais: s'approchèrent et dirent à Jérémie, le prophète: "Que notre supplication arrive devant toi; intercède pour nous auprès de Yahweh, ton Dieu, pour tout ce reste de Juda; car, de beaucoup que nous étions, nous sommes réduits à un petit nombre, comme tes yeux nous voient.
Anglais: And said unto Jeremiah the prophet, Let, we beseech thee, our supplication be accepted before thee, and pray for us unto the  Lord  thy God, even for all this remnant; (for we are left but a few of many, as thine eyes do behold us:)
BIBALDA_TA_PELDETTA: nisi di tam Yeremiyas ma jobta ala: Siɗawta vuma kayni naŋ ma huma' humge. Siɗawaŋ kuma'a vok Ma-Vatɗina Lawna vaŋu, siɗawaŋ kay caw sumun ma hinin kaf, kay numa ay ŋolo, wulini numa hini kiɗaya, ki iraŋ ka wi nala;
Bulu: a jô Yérémi na: Njaʼane wongan ô tame kui asu dôé; yeʼelaʼane Nti, e Zambe wôé, ajô dangan a asu mebukaʼa ma. Amu bi nga too abui, éyoñe ji bi liʼiya ôyôm abim avale mise môé me lôô de.
Guiziga: mijiviɗ Zeremi, a ɓakaŋ na: «Inga tiɓa tumbul ndra na takwa! Tumbulo Bumbulvuŋ Buymisemuŋ ɗik ar deɗe ndra mindiram njireˀ hana takwa. Haˀaw ndra zleˀe haɗi, ani i ndiram ti siifa njireˀ kini! Ka vuna ki si na le kuy kuy.
Fulfulde_Adamaoua: haa annabi Yeremiya, mbi'i mo: “Useni jaɓ tornde amin! Toran min Jawmiraawo Allah maaɗa, minin luttuɓe. Naane min ɗuuɗɓe, ammaa minin luttuɓe jonta, min ɗuuɗaay, bana ngi'rata ɗo.
Fulfulde_DC: haa annabi Yeremiya, mbi'i mo: “Useni jaɓ tornde amin! Toran min Jawmiraawo Allah maaɗa, minin luttuɓe. Naane min ɗuuɗɓe, ammaa minin luttuɓe jonta, min ɗuuɗaay, bana ngi'rata ɗo.
KALATA_KO_SC_Gbaya: Jeremii  wi-tɔ̧-wen  oi nú Sɔ̧, ɓɛɛ tɔ̧ ha̧ a̧: «Ɛ̀nɛ̀ zíí aia-nú k’ɛɛ, ɛ̀nɛ̀ kɔ́fí GASA WAN Sɔ̧ k’ɛnɛ wen be oi yɛ tikiɗi nɛ̀ ɓɔna’ɛ; ɛ́ɛ́ n’ɛ̀ɛ́ yaa so nɛ́ gba gíí bíí, nɛ́ mɔ'ɔ n’ɛ̀ɛ́ sira pii ɗoŋ tikiɗi, hee mɔ'ɔ n’ɛnɛ zɔka kinii’ɛ ga.
KALATA_KO_DC_Gbaya: Jeremii  wi-tɔ̧-wen  oi nú Sɔ̧, ɓɛɛ tɔ̧ ha̧ a̧: «Ɛ̀nɛ̀ zíí aia-nú k’ɛɛ, ɛ̀nɛ̀ kɔ́fí GASA WAN Sɔ̧ k’ɛnɛ wen be oi yɛ tikiɗi nɛ̀ ɓɔna’ɛ; ɛ́ɛ́ n’ɛ̀ɛ́ yaa so nɛ́ gba gíí bíí, nɛ́ mɔ'ɔ n’ɛ̀ɛ́ sira pii ɗoŋ tikiɗi, hee mɔ'ɔ n’ɛnɛ zɔka kinii’ɛ ga.
Kapsiki_DC: ke nde mɛ ŋkwa Zhɛrɛmi, ma ke hɛ shɛ: «Vate mehele te 'yɛwe ta n'yɛ təhwə təhwə, səkwə Shala Mahwətə ta ŋa kezha ghen'yɛ mbeli nyi ketene teghweme, kwa nza ŋkɛ keɓɛhwɛ n'yɛ ghen'yɛ kala nya newe nya na.
Tupurri: day riñ wo Jermi je ndar nen waçaçre Baa gon gano: Daga joñge kamkam wuurn mo coo jag äo. Tos Manwuri, Baa äon ti wuuri, ti te maga gwa' wo mono. Gahaçyla wuur hay ngaäa day wuur gwa' go mbagge, do maga nen äo de koge äe nono.

Francais: Que Yahweh, ton Dieu, nous indique le chemin que nous devons suivre, et ce que nous avons à faire."
Anglais: That the  Lord  thy God may shew us the way wherein we may walk, and the thing that we may do.
BIBALDA_TA_PELDETTA: a Ma-Vatɗina Lawna vaŋu ma ɗekma kay haga ta numa sli haya'ta, hiɗi va ma numa as a lumna.
Bulu: Nti, e Zambe wôé, a litiʼi bia zene bia yiane tôñ, a jam bia yiane bo!
Guiziga: Da i zuɓam jiviɗ wana, yo i gam mike na, anja Bumbulvuŋ Buymisemuŋ ɗike, a biga ndra di takwa.»
Fulfulde_Adamaoua: Ngam maajum tora Jawmiraawo haa o anndina min laawol ngol min tokkoto e ko min mbaɗata boo.”
Fulfulde_DC: Ngam maajum tora Jawmiraawo haa o anndina min laawol ngol min tokkoto e ko min mbaɗata boo.”
KALATA_KO_SC_Gbaya: GASA WAN Sɔ̧ k’ɛnɛ a̧ úsí yuwar n’ɛɛ tɛ ba in mɔ n’ɛɛ tɛ de h’ɛɛ.»
KALATA_KO_DC_Gbaya: GASA WAN Sɔ̧ k’ɛnɛ a̧ úsí yuwar n’ɛɛ tɛ ba in mɔ n’ɛɛ tɛ de h’ɛɛ.»
Kapsiki_DC: Ncɛte n'yɛ hweŋkwa nya kele n'yɛ ba'a wəsə nya temene ghen'yɛ Shala Mahwətə ta ŋa.»
Tupurri: Daga Manwuri, Baa äon mo naa nen fen maga wuur nen seege ti äe go ne wuur nen maga wuur mo joñ ne.

Francais: Jérémie, le prophète, leur répondit: "J'ai entendu; voici que je vais prier Yahweh, votre Dieu, selon vos paroles, et tout ce que Yahweh vous répondra, je vous le ferai connaître, sans rien vous cacher."
Anglais: Then Jeremiah the prophet said unto them, I have heard you; behold, I will pray unto the  Lord  your God according to your words; and it shall come to pass, that whatsoever thing the  Lord  shall answer you, I will declare it unto you; I will keep nothing back from you.
BIBALDA_TA_PELDETTA: Yeremiyas ma jobta hotsi dita: nan humiya, wulini nan min siɗaw Ma-Vatɗina Lawna vigiya, kuɗ jobta vigiya; nan min ɗekgi goyo kay hot dita vi Ma-Vatɗin tigi kafe, nan as ŋay va kigi noŋɗi.
Bulu: Nkulu mejô Yérémi a nga jô be na: Ma wôk, mi lôô ma zu yeʼelane Nti, e Zambe wônan ane mejô menan me né; a ma ye liti mia ajô ese Nti a ye yalane mia, teke solé mia jam éziñ.
Guiziga: Mijiviɗ Zeremi a ɓa taŋ: «I cine le! I ra tumbulo Bumbulvuŋ Buymisemuŋ kumo ar deɗe kumo, kaɓa kum mucufuɗikiy, yo ɓi Bumbulvuŋ masa mbuɗukum di gar na, i sa ɓukum di, ko y'anta sa ɗumukum ɓi neˀ le ta.»
Fulfulde_Adamaoua: Annabi Yeremiya jaabi ɓe: “Booɗɗum, mi nani kadi. Mi toroto Jawmiraawo, Allah mooɗon ko ƴamɗon. Nden mi yecca on ko Jawmiraawo jaaboto, mi suuɗataa on koo ɗume.”
Fulfulde_DC: Annabi Yeremiya jaabi ɓe: “Booɗɗum, mi nani kadi. Mi toroto Jawmiraawo, Allah mooɗon ko ƴamɗon. Nden mi yecca on ko Jawmiraawo jaaboto, mi suuɗataa on koo ɗume.”
KALATA_KO_SC_Gbaya: Jeremii  wi-tɔ̧-wen  oi nú Sɔ̧ tɔ̧ɔ̧ ha̧ wa: «Mi zia! Mi tɛ kɔfi GASA WAN Sɔ̧ k’ɛnɛ hee mɔ'ɔ n’ɛnɛ aka'm mɛ de ga; ɓɛɛ mi tɛ tɔ̧ wen lɛŋ nɛ̀ GASA WAN tɛ kifi nú zu-a sɛnɛ ha̧‘m h’ɛnɛ. Mi beka hu̧si ŋma mɔ nɛ̀ ɛnɛ na.»
KALATA_KO_DC_Gbaya: Jeremii  wi-tɔ̧-wen  oi nú Sɔ̧ tɔ̧ɔ̧ ha̧ wa: «Mi zia! Mi tɛ kɔfi GASA WAN Sɔ̧ k’ɛnɛ hee mɔ'ɔ n’ɛnɛ aka'm mɛ de ga; ɓɛɛ mi tɛ tɔ̧ wen lɛŋ nɛ̀ GASA WAN tɛ kifi nú zu-a sɛnɛ ha̧‘m h’ɛnɛ. Mi beka hu̧si ŋma mɔ nɛ̀ ɛnɛ na.»
Kapsiki_DC: Ma ke nde mɛ ŋkwa Zhɛrɛmi sha hɛ: «Nahe 'ya kefate! Katesəkwə Shala Mahwətə ta ɓəmə 'ya kala nya gezete ɗa yɛ. Kwa sebe ta ŋkɛ, kategeze zhɛne ta Mahwətə 'ya, wəsə shɛ katewəfərə 'ya va gheyɛ we.»
Tupurri: Jermi je ndar nen waçaçre Baa gon raw riñ rage gano: Ndi laa we. Ko wee ga ndi tos ge Manwuri, Baa äayn yañ do maga nday waçaçn nono. Ndi naa ge nen waçaçre maga Manwur fern ge go ne nday äuy, ndi yoñ ge mopo go ne nday gaa hase.

Francais: Ils dirent à Jérémie: "Que Yahweh soit un témoin véridique et fidèle contre nous, si nous n'agissons pas en tout selon la parole que Yahweh, ton Dieu, t'aura envoyé nous communiquer.
Anglais: Then they said to Jeremiah, The  Lord  be a true and faithful witness between us, if we do not even according to all things for the which the  Lord  thy God shall send thee to us.
BIBALDA_TA_PELDETTA: Nisi hot di tam Yeremiyas: Hin Ma-Vatɗina li di-goyta ta gasita hiɗi ta ɗigerta kuma'a, la slen ma Ma-Vatɗin Lawna vaŋu vulaŋ hagatawa kay dum tuma'ana numa li kuɗum kafɗi.
Bulu: Be nga jô Yérémi na: Nti a boʼo bebela a zôsôô ngaa a tele bia ngame yat, nge bia bo te bo ajô ese Nti e Zambe wôé a ye lôme wo asu dangan!
Guiziga: Taŋ a ɓaka Zeremi njah: «Ɓi Bumbulvuŋ Buymisemuŋ ɗik masa ɓo ndra di ti balam ɗik gar na, i sa gaka tiɗeˀe, anja Bumbulvuŋ a gi sedewo mikaslsla, migisiŋ a hirnga ndra.
Fulfulde_Adamaoua: Ɓe mbi'i Yeremiya: “Jawmiraawo laato ceedoowo gooŋɗuɗo koolniiɗo dow amin, to min ɗowtanaaki umrooje fuu ɗe Jawmiraawo Allah maaɗa umrete ngam amin.
Fulfulde_DC: Ɓe mbi'i Yeremiya: “Jawmiraawo laato ceedoowo gooŋɗuɗo koolniiɗo dow amin, to min ɗowtanaaki umrooje fuu ɗe Jawmiraawo Allah maaɗa umrete ngam amin.
KALATA_KO_SC_Gbaya: Ɓɛɛ wa tɔ̧ kɔ-wa ha̧ Jeremii hee mɔ'ɔ ga: «GASA WAN a̧ dúk nɛ́ kpasa wi-sedaako k’ɛɛ. Ɛɛ tɛ de mɔ nyɛm nɛ̀ ɗoŋ mɔ nɛ̀ GASA WAN k’ɛnɛ tɛ tɔ̧ h’ɛnɛ mɛ tɔ̧ h’ɛɛ.
KALATA_KO_DC_Gbaya: Ɓɛɛ wa tɔ̧ kɔ-wa ha̧ Jeremii hee mɔ'ɔ ga: «GASA WAN a̧ dúk nɛ́ kpasa wi-sedaako k’ɛɛ. Ɛɛ tɛ de mɔ nyɛm nɛ̀ ɗoŋ mɔ nɛ̀ GASA WAN k’ɛnɛ tɛ tɔ̧ h’ɛnɛ mɛ tɔ̧ h’ɛɛ.
Kapsiki_DC: Ma ke hɛ zhɛnete nda ke Zhɛrɛmi: «Kazeme ghen'yɛ kafela kamene wəsə nya gezete Shala Mahwətə ta ŋa kaŋa n'yɛ tserame. Nza Shala kande negha fete nya kaganda ba'a nya tiɗiɗi yitea fela ta n'yɛ!
Tupurri: Saara kal riñ Jermi gano: Daga Manwur mo hay diñ je sedewa ma cwaçy ma de deele no, mo joñ wuur de mopo, hayga wuur lag we ti jag waçaçre maga Manwuri, Baa äon waçaçn ge le ne ndo jag ne wuur gaa mono.

Francais: Que ce soit du bien ou du mal, nous obéirons à la voix de Yahweh, notre Dieu, vers qui nous t'envoyons, afin qu'il nous arrive du bien, en obéissant à la voix de Yahweh, notre Dieu."
Anglais: Whether it be good, or whether it be evil, we will obey the voice of the  Lord  our God, to whom we send thee; that it may be well with us, when we obey the voice of the  Lord  our God.
BIBALDA_TA_PELDETTA: Ma-Vatɗina Lawna vuma'a numa gaŋ talam kayni, la nam dum mi sle ma ŋaa'a, va ma joo kaw numa as hum kuɗ della valamu, kay a numa ma lak hay sle'ta, la numa hum kuɗ della vi Ma-Vatɗina Lawna vuma'a.
Bulu: Toʼo mvaé ngʼabé, bia ye ve tyiñe Nti, e Zambe wongan, mfaʼa biabebien bia lôme wo mewôk: nalé bia ye vak amu mveane tyiñe Nti, e Zambe wongane mewôk.
Guiziga: Da ko ɓi naŋ, a cira ndra hiri le, ko a cira ndra hiri ta kwana, i sa cinaka mi ngi Bumbulvuŋ Buymisemuŋ ndra, ndra mislinukuw ng'ava na, gwat gar a sa cuh kuy avu ndra, asi ndra micinaka mi ngi Bumbulvuŋ Buymisemuŋ ndra na.
Fulfulde_Adamaoua: Koo booɗɗum koo kalluɗum, min ɗowtanto Jawmiraawo Allah amin mo min neli ma ƴamugo ɗum. Min anndi to min ɗowtanake mo, min keɓan hayru.”
Fulfulde_DC: Koo booɗɗum koo kalluɗum, min ɗowtanto Jawmiraawo Allah amin mo min neli ma ƴamugo ɗum. Min anndi to min ɗowtanake mo, min keɓan hayru.”
KALATA_KO_SC_Gbaya: Kóó mɔ‘i a̧ dee tɛ yɛ, kóó de tɛ yɛ na, ɛɛ tɛ zii tiger GASA WAN Sɔ̧ k’ɛɛ n’ɛɛ tom'nɛ́ sitɛ a̧‘i. Mɔ lɛŋ tɛ́ nɛ̀ nɛ̀ de-a wen n’ɛɛ tɛ zii wen nú GASA WAN Sɔ̧ k’ɛɛ.»
KALATA_KO_DC_Gbaya: Kóó mɔ‘i a̧ dee tɛ yɛ, kóó de tɛ yɛ na, ɛɛ tɛ zii tiger GASA WAN Sɔ̧ k’ɛɛ n’ɛɛ tom'nɛ́ sitɛ a̧‘i. Mɔ lɛŋ tɛ́ nɛ̀ nɛ̀ de-a wen n’ɛɛ tɛ zii wen nú GASA WAN Sɔ̧ k’ɛɛ.»
Kapsiki_DC: Ya ghena shɛ nza ganyɛke keɗema ndiremike, katefa nda ŋa Shala Mahwətə ta ɓəmə nya ghwene ŋa n'yɛ shɛ ghen'yɛ. Katezlama n'yɛ te ghena ta Shala Mahwətə ta ɓəmə nya fate n'yɛ.»
Tupurri: A mo hay ba diñ ma de ele noga de älagge, wuur yaçaç ge jag Manwuri, Baa wuur maga wuur de see wuur tu wuur äo' ndo wo see äe yañ mbe. Do kay no so no wuur joñ ge yañ de fruygi ti maga wuur yaçaç jag Manwuri, Baa wuurn mono.

Francais: Et au bout de dix jours, la parole de Yahweh fut adressée à Jérémie,.
Anglais: And it came to pass after ten days, that the word of the  Lord  came unto Jeremiah.
BIBALDA_TA_PELDETTA: Buur doogo bugolda, Ma-Vatɗina di yoboyna valam tam Yeremiyas.
Bulu: Mvuse melu awôm, ajô Nti e nga yené be Yérémi.
Guiziga: Hin kuruˀ a dirba nah na, Bumbulvuŋ a ɓa mingiɓi naŋ da Zeremi.
Fulfulde_Adamaoua: Ɓaawo nyalɗe sappo, Jawmiraawo wolwani Yeremiya.
Fulfulde_DC: Ɓaawo nyalɗe sappo, Jawmiraawo wolwani Yeremiya.
KALATA_KO_SC_Gbaya: Ɗoŋ zɛ ɓu, GASA WAN tɔ̧ɔ̧ wen ha̧ Jeremii.
KALATA_KO_DC_Gbaya: Ɗoŋ zɛ ɓu, GASA WAN tɔ̧ɔ̧ wen ha̧ Jeremii.
Kapsiki_DC: Ma kwa sebe ta hɛ meŋe ne, pa ghena ta Mahwətə gezeke nda geva ke Zhɛrɛmi.
Tupurri: Naw wo mañge hwal mono, Manwur raw waçaç waçaçre ne Jermi.

Francais: Et il appela Johanan, fils de Carée, tous les chefs des troupes qui étaient avec lui, et tout le peuple, petits et grands,
Anglais: Then called he Johanan the son of Kareah, and all the captains of the forces which were with him, and all the people from the least even to the greatest,
BIBALDA_TA_PELDETTA: Nala Yeremiyas yi Yohanan goora vi Kareyak, sum sa ŋulona vi vokŋa kafe sa ay hiɗi namu hiɗi sumun kafe, tun caw tam sa gurayn pa ta-ta tam sa ŋulona.
Bulu: Nde Yérémi a nga loone Yôhanañ, e mone Kavéa, bivete bise ya nkane bita bi mbe nsamba wé, a bôte bese yʼayoñ, ataté nyô a dañe tyôtyoé, a kui nyô a dañ anen.
Guiziga: Zeremi kwana, a zilo Yohanaŋ mangal ngi Kareya waɗ madiɗa ngi soje ngi seˀehey ati mizli gar, ziri ati mizli madiɗahaya,
Fulfulde_Adamaoua: Yeremiya ewni Yohanan ɓii Kareha e mawɓe konu wonduɓe bee maako e yimɓe mawɓe e leesɓe fuu,
Fulfulde_DC: Yeremiya ewni Yohanan ɓii Kareha e mawɓe konu wonduɓe bee maako e yimɓe mawɓe e leesɓe fuu,
KALATA_KO_SC_Gbaya: Jeremii saa Yohanaŋ bem ko Karea in o gasa wi-biro lɛŋ nɛ̀ yaa so katɛ a̧, ká bá nɛ̀ dukbíí lɛŋ, o gasawi in o geɗek-wi,
KALATA_KO_DC_Gbaya: Jeremii saa Yohanaŋ bem ko Karea in o gasa wi-biro lɛŋ nɛ̀ yaa so katɛ a̧, ká bá nɛ̀ dukbíí lɛŋ, o gasawi in o geɗek-wi,
Kapsiki_DC: Pa ŋkɛ hekakɛ yɛ Yohanan, wəzege ta Karɛya le mbelia jama nyi te ghəa wəvəsəa ka sewajɛ nyi yite pɛtɛ, tsagha mbeli nyi tagha, se te ŋwalea fəshi hwa'a te mbelia jama.
Tupurri: Jermi raw ëe Yohanan je ni Kareyan wo le de jar kluuri sode maga hay wo see äe mo äuy de jar ma äuyn wo, tï¡ï¡ le ti ma kleen haçaç go ti ma kluu no.

Francais: et il leur dit : Ainsi, parle Yahweh, Dieu d'Israël, vers qui vous m'avez envoyé pour présenter devant lui votre supplication :
Anglais: And said unto them, Thus saith the  Lord , the God of Israel, unto whom ye sent me to present your supplication before him;
BIBALDA_TA_PELDETTA: Nam di tisiya: Humgi dita vi Ma-Vatɗina Lawna vi Israyel, nam ma nigi gan talamu kay nan naram siɗawta vigiya:
Bulu: A nga jô be na: Avale di Nti, e Zambe Israél, mfaʼa mi nga lôme ma me bo na njaʼane wônan ô kui asu dé na:
Guiziga: dar a ɓa taŋ: «Bumbulvuŋ Buymisemuŋ kumo ngi Israyel, kum mislinikiy ng'ava, ɓa i raŋ ti ɓi ngi tumbul kum tuwa, a ɓi na:
Fulfulde_Adamaoua: wi'i ɓe: “Ndaa ko Jawmiraawo, Allah Isra'iila mo nelɗon yam toraago ɗum ngam mooɗon, wi'i:
Fulfulde_DC: wi'i ɓe: “Ndaa ko Jawmiraawo, Allah Isra'iila mo nelɗon yam toraago ɗum ngam mooɗon, wi'i:
KALATA_KO_SC_Gbaya: ɓɛɛ a̧ tɔ̧ ha̧ wa: «Wen nɛ̀ GASA WAN Sɔ̧ ko  Israɛl  n’ɛnɛ toma'm sitɛ a̧ nɛ̀ aia-nú k’ɛnɛ tɔ̧ nɛ́ mɔ'ɔ:
KALATA_KO_DC_Gbaya: ɓɛɛ a̧ tɔ̧ ha̧ wa: «Wen nɛ̀ GASA WAN Sɔ̧ ko  Israɛl  n’ɛnɛ toma'm sitɛ a̧ nɛ̀ aia-nú k’ɛnɛ tɔ̧ nɛ́ mɔ'ɔ:
Kapsiki_DC: Ma ke sha hɛ: «Wa nya ghena nya geze Shala Mahwətə ta ka Israyɛl nya ghweneghe shɛ kezha mpi ŋayɛ dzeve yite nya:
Tupurri: Se day riñ ra gano: Manwuri, Baa ma Israyel maga nday hay äo' ndi wo see äe maga ndi mo wo kamge äe ne nday waçaç so gano:

Francais: Si vous continuez à demeurer dans ce pays, je vous établirai et ne vous détruirai point, je vous planterai et ne vous arracherai point; car je me repens du mal que je vous ai fait.
Anglais: If ye will still abide in this land, then will I build you, and not pull you down, and I will plant you, and not pluck you up: for I repent me of the evil that I have done unto you.
BIBALDA_TA_PELDETTA: La nigi lak hay nagat tani, nan ma lakgi gaa haya'a, nan ma ɓulakgi goyɗi, nan ma pigi gaa'a nan ma patgi kuloɗi; kay nan gi hama mi tuwanu kay joota ta nan la' tigita.
Bulu: nge mia ke ôsu a tabe si jenane nyô, ma ye yemete mia été, a ma ye bo te tyame mia, ma ye bé mia, a bo teke té mia si; amu ma jôban abé me nga bo mia.
Guiziga: ‹Da ki ngumam le ngi cifi asi ruwuy hana na, naɓa i sa cucukum gidaŋ gidaŋ, y'anta sa zuzukum mata, yi sa cifi ti kum hǝɗ hǝɗ kuy kuy, y'anta sa hizigiɗukum mata wãˀ, i sa wulka malambaˀ ya mugukum di na.
Fulfulde_Adamaoua: To on tokkake jooɗaago nder lesdi ndi'i, nden kam mi tabitinan on, mi nattintaa on, mi juboto on, mi ɗoofataa on. Ngam mi mimsitan sarru ngu mi ukkani on.
Fulfulde_DC: To on tokkake jooɗaago nder lesdi ndi'i, nden kam mi tabitinan on, mi nattintaa on, mi juboto on, mi ɗoofataa on. Ngam mi mimsitan sarru ngu mi ukkani on.
KALATA_KO_SC_Gbaya: K’ɛ̀nɛ̀ kpɛk mɛ duk tɛ nù'ɛ, ɓɛɛ mi tɛ ba'nɛ́ e ŋgɔn, mi beka ɗaŋ‘nɛ́ yinɛ na; mi tɛ gun'nɛ́, ɓɛɛ mi beka zuɗi'nɛ́ ɓɔna. Mi tɛ ba ŋgamɔ n'am dee in'nɛɛ‘i yinɛ.»
KALATA_KO_DC_Gbaya: K’ɛ̀nɛ̀ kpɛk mɛ duk tɛ nù'ɛ, ɓɛɛ mi tɛ ba'nɛ́ e ŋgɔn, mi beka ɗaŋ‘nɛ́ yinɛ na; mi tɛ gun'nɛ́, ɓɛɛ mi beka zuɗi'nɛ́ ɓɔna. Mi tɛ ba ŋgamɔ n'am dee in'nɛɛ‘i yinɛ.»
Kapsiki_DC: ‹Ma keyɛhwe yɛ kanza te hɛɗi nya ne, katezhɛne 'ya kaŋa ŋayɛ kenya teŋzla ŋayɛ 'ya. Katezhɛne 'ya kamɓe ŋayɛ kenya tenteɗe ŋayɛ 'ya. Katehi wəsə kwa ndiremi nya menete ŋayɛ 'ya 'ya.
Tupurri: Hayga nday lag mbay we de tiñ äil sirn la no, ndi geçeç ge nday yañ ciñ äil äe la ni, ndi taw nday ge go gaè. Ndi toçë ge wer äay yañ gesiñ, ndi ndar nday ge go gaa werga ndi fer ëig älagge maga ndi hay joñ nday de äe mono.

Francais: Ne craignez pas le roi de Babylone, dont vous avez peur; ne le craignez point, - oracle de Yahweh, - car je suis avec vous pour vous sauver et vous délivrer de sa main.
Anglais: Be not afraid of the king of Babylon, of whom ye are afraid; be not afraid of him, saith the  Lord : for I am with you to save you, and to deliver you from his hand.
BIBALDA_TA_PELDETTA: Nigi ma li nar kay mulla vi Babilonɗi; nigi ma li nar kalam noŋɗi, Din mi Ma-Vatɗina, kay nan ka hiɗi nigiya kay suɗgi goyo, kay butgi goyo hay ɓalamu;
Bulu: Te koone njô bôte ya Babilône woñ, nyô mia ko woñ asu dé, te koone nye woñ, nalé Nti a jô. Amu me ne be mia, asu ya nyii a kôté mia e wo wé.
Guiziga: Buy Babiloŋ, kum majijikam di na, ki zluwunam di mata, asi y'ada ati kum, ɓa ngi lih kumo, ɓa ngi tuɓo kum tisi haŋ naŋ. I ya Bumbulvuŋ maɓi.
Fulfulde_Adamaoua: Taa kule laamiiɗo Baabila. Taa kule mo, ngam min Jawmiraawo mi ɗon wondi bee mooɗon, haa mi hisna on e juŋngo maako, mi rimɗina on. Non Jawmiraawo wi'i.
Fulfulde_DC: Taa kule laamiiɗo Baabila. Taa kule mo, ngam min Jawmiraawo mi ɗon wondi bee mooɗon, haa mi hisna on e juŋngo maako, mi rimɗina on. Non Jawmiraawo wi'i.
KALATA_KO_SC_Gbaya: GASA WAN tɔ̧a: «Ká kíí wannu Babilɔŋ de'nɛ́ na; k’ɛ́nɛ́ yu a̧ ɓɔna, wen mi a̧a̧ in'nɛɛ ha̧‘m mɛ gbo'nɛ́, mi tɛ zuɗi'nɛ́ ɗɔɔ ŋgai kɔ̧-a̧ yinɛ.
KALATA_KO_DC_Gbaya: GASA WAN tɔ̧a: «Ká kíí wannu Babilɔŋ de'nɛ́ na; k’ɛ́nɛ́ yu a̧ ɓɔna, wen mi a̧a̧ in'nɛɛ ha̧‘m mɛ gbo'nɛ́, mi tɛ zuɗi'nɛ́ ɗɔɔ ŋgai kɔ̧-a̧ yinɛ.
Kapsiki_DC: Ma tsetsenya gɛ, zhɛnema yɛ kaghazlənə va meghea ka Babilone ma. Ma 'ya, 'ya Mahwətə: zhɛnema yɛ kaghazlənə ve ma, kwa nza ŋkɛ le gheyɛ 'ya kezha mbele ŋayɛ ba'a kezha fə ŋayɛ shave mbe dzeve ta ŋkɛ.
Tupurri: Joñ wee heçeçne do wañ Babilon maga nday go de heçeçne do äe mo wa, joñ wee heçeçne do äe wa werga ndi yañ see äay ma yaçaç weege go, ma yaçaç nday le go do äe. Kay diñ jag Manwuri.

Francais: Je vous ferai obtenir compassion, et il aura compassion de vous, et il vous fera retourner dans votre pays.
Anglais: And I will shew mercies unto you, that he may have mercy upon you, and cause you to return to your own land.
BIBALDA_TA_PELDETTA: nan ma kal slugot hayamu, nam ma wigi hawgiya, nam ma hingi lak hay nagata vigiya.
Bulu: Ma ye liti mia mvam a a ye ko mia éngôngo, a ye bo na mi beta bulane si jenan.

Francais: Tous ceux qui auront tourné leurs regards vers l'Egypte pour y aller et pour y habiter mourront par l'épée, par la famine et la peste, et il n'y en aura point parmi eux qui survive et qui échappe au mal que je ferai venir sur eux.
Anglais: So shall it be with all the men that set their faces to go into Egypt to sojourn there; they shall die by the sword, by the famine, and by the pestilence: and none of them shall remain or escape from the evil that I will bring upon them.
BIBALDA_TA_PELDETTA: Nisi kaf sa muɗ irsiyawa kay kal hay Egipte kay li ziy ɗawni, kew-gaferaŋa ma calsiya, mayta hiɗi moyna ma vatsiya, sa kep kaw as hulot goy vok joota ta nan min mara' kigitaɗi, sa kep kaw as pir goyɗi.
Bulu: Ba bese ba ye tyiʼi na ba kʼEjipte na ba tabe wé, ba ye wu a nkpwaté mekôn, mfumbale zaé nge bim, e mbe ba ye bo na, bi zu be be.

Francais: Car ainsi parle Yahweh des armées, Dieu d'Israël: Comme ma colère et ma fureur ont fondu sur les habitants de Jérusalem, ainsi ma fureur fondra sur vous quand vous serez entrés en Egypte; vous serez un objet d'exécration, de stupéfaction, de malédiction et d'outrages, et vous ne reverrez plus ce lieu-ci.
Anglais: For thus saith the  Lord  of hosts, the God of Israel; As mine anger and my fury hath been poured forth upon the inhabitants of Jerusalem; so shall my fury be poured forth upon you, when ye shall enter into Egypt: and ye shall be an execration, and an astonishment, and a curse, and a reproach; and ye shall see this place no more.
BIBALDA_TA_PELDETTA: Kay Ma-Vatɗina vi vok-ma-duura Lawna vi Israyel ka di ala: Ki ɦiyda hiɗi purcakka vanu yamay goyo kay sum sa hay Yerusalem nala, ɦiyda van ma yam goy kigi nala kaw, la nigi tuɗ hay Egipte, nigi ma fi ŋulda, fi ɦuyumda, fi be'da hiɗi zulota, liyn tani nigi ma hot wum loɗi.
Bulu: Amu avale di Nti ya minsamba mewosan, e Zambe Israél a jô na: Aval ayaa, a ayoʼo dam bi nga sôéban e be bôte ya Yérusalém, avale te ayaa dam da ye sôébane be mia, nge mia kʼEjipte; mia ye bo jôme biyoʼé, melunga, ébiasé a ôsame. A mia ye bo te beta yene vôme nyô.
Guiziga: Haˀaw, Bumbulvuŋ misi gidaŋ wãˀ, Buymisemuŋ ngi Israyele, a ɓi na: ‹Ya muzuɓ mevel, himaˀ fõh fõh ng'ar mizli Zeruzalemey na, kum misa ndilam le a Ezipte na, i sa zuɓ himaˀ fõh fõh ng'ar kumo kanah ya: kisa tiram mizli mihirsahay le putuk wãˀ, a sa zuwulam vu, a sa nisam vu waɗ a sa zam vu ti slimiɗ kumo. Ko kum anta sa puraka hirwuy hana mata wãˀ.›»
Fulfulde_Adamaoua: Ndaa nii Jawmiraawo honooɓe asama, Allah Isra'iila wi'i: “Bana mi rufi tikkere am e ɓernuki am dow yimɓe Urusaliima, bana non ndufranmi ɓernuki am dow mooɗon, to on ndilli Misra. Mi laatinan on hulniiɓe, yimɓe kuɗan on, naaliran bee inɗe mon. On meetataa yi'ugo nokkuure nde'e boo.”
Fulfulde_DC: Ndaa nii Jawmiraawo honooɓe asama, Allah Isra'iila wi'i: “Bana mi rufi tikkere am e ɓernuki am dow yimɓe Urusaliima, bana non ndufranmi ɓernuki am dow mooɗon, to on ndilli Misra. Mi laatinan on hulniiɓe, yimɓe kuɗan on, naaliran bee inɗe mon. On meetataa yi'ugo nokkuure nde'e boo.”
KALATA_KO_SC_Gbaya: Jeremii tɔ̧ɔ̧ ha̧ wa woyo'e: «Nɛ̀ mbetɛ, tɔ̧ɔ̧-wen ko GASA WAN nɛ̀ a̧a̧ nɛ̀ ŋgayamɔ lɛŋ, Sɔ̧ ko  Israɛl  nɛ́ mɔ'ɔ: Hee mɔ'ɔ nɛ̀ nyimsea kɔ‘m in tu̧u̧-see kɔ‘m tika nɛnɛ zu o bíí Jerusalɛm ga, kale-a mbɛt, tu̧u̧-see kɔ‘m tɛ tik zu'nɛ́ ŋgimbi n’ɛnɛ bé tɛ̀ɛ́ hɔ nɛnɛ Egiptɛ; ɓɛɛ ɛ́nɛ́ tɛ kifi geemɔ; ɓɛɛ o bíí tɛ sa nin'nɛ́ fom nɛ̀ ŋmaa, be nɛ̀ mɔ a zu ŋmaa, da̧ nɛ̀ ŋmaa mbɛt. Ɓɛɛ ɛ́nɛ́ beka zɔk fara’ɛ ɓɔna.»
KALATA_KO_DC_Gbaya: Jeremii tɔ̧ɔ̧ ha̧ wa woyo'e: «Nɛ̀ mbetɛ, tɔ̧ɔ̧-wen ko GASA WAN nɛ̀ a̧a̧ nɛ̀ ŋgayamɔ lɛŋ, Sɔ̧ ko  Israɛl  nɛ́ mɔ'ɔ: Hee mɔ'ɔ nɛ̀ nyimsea kɔ‘m in tu̧u̧-see kɔ‘m tika nɛnɛ zu o bíí Jerusalɛm ga, kale-a mbɛt, tu̧u̧-see kɔ‘m tɛ tik zu'nɛ́ ŋgimbi n’ɛnɛ bé tɛ̀ɛ́ hɔ nɛnɛ Egiptɛ; ɓɛɛ ɛ́nɛ́ tɛ kifi geemɔ; ɓɛɛ o bíí tɛ sa nin'nɛ́ fom nɛ̀ ŋmaa, be nɛ̀ mɔ a zu ŋmaa, da̧ nɛ̀ ŋmaa mbɛt. Ɓɛɛ ɛ́nɛ́ beka zɔk fara’ɛ ɓɔna.»
Kapsiki_DC: Ma ke Zhɛrɛmi zhɛkwa: «Wa nya ghena nya geze Mahwətə nde berete, Shala ta ka Israyɛl nya: ‹Kala nya vaghe geva ghwə ta hwepe wənəa ɗa kənəa ka Zhɛrəzalɛm ne, tsagha tenza hwepe wənəa ɗa kənəa gheyɛ kedzawa Ɛzhipte yɛ. Gheyɛ yatekele mbeli kawəsə keyipə pa kenza mbeli kabezla ŋkwa, kaŋele ŋkwa, kageze ghena te wəsə nya ndiremi ba'a kapəli nda hawe ke wəndə. Katezhɛne yɛ kanakɛ hɛɗi nya tɛape we.›»
Tupurri: Gahaçyla Manwur Pantway, Baa ma Israyel waçaç gano: Do maga bagge poçoç äin wo de äil soçoçge äin hay joñ jar Jerusalem wo go de guur nono, soçoçge äil äin joñ ge nday go de guur lay hayga nday raw we Ejipte no. Nday kol ge diñ fen faëge, fen lawge, fen feg ti, fen mbuë fuy day nday ko ge ngeeln mo ta' la gaa so hase.

Francais: Restes de Juda, Yahweh vous dit: N'entrez point en Egypte; sachez bien que je vous avertis solennellement aujourd'hui.
Anglais: The  Lord  hath said concerning you, O ye remnant of Judah; Go ye not into Egypt: know certainly that I have admonished you this day.
BIBALDA_TA_PELDETTA: Caw jafna vi Yuda ma hinina, tuɗgi hay Egipteɗi, wigi ala nan telgi vaydi, Ma-Vatɗina digiyawa.

Guiziga: Kum mizli Zudahay mindiram ti siifa, Bumbulvuŋ a ɓukum na: ‹Ki ram nga Ezipte ta! Dana, sinaka sin le, i ra ɓukum di njah wãˀ!

KALATA_KO_SC_Gbaya: Jeremii tɔ̧ɔ̧ ha̧ wa woyo: «Ɛ́nɛ́ oi o bíí nɛ̀ ɓɔna kpasa sɛn Juda’ɛ, GASA WAN hee ndé, k’ɛ́nɛ́ nɛ́ si Egiptɛ na! Ɛ́nɛ́ iŋa nɛ̀ mbetɛ, sɔsɔɔ, mi nɛ́ wi-sedaako k’ɛnɛ.
KALATA_KO_DC_Gbaya: Jeremii tɔ̧ɔ̧ ha̧ wa woyo: «Ɛ́nɛ́ oi o bíí nɛ̀ ɓɔna kpasa sɛn Juda’ɛ, GASA WAN hee ndé, k’ɛ́nɛ́ nɛ́ si Egiptɛ na! Ɛ́nɛ́ iŋa nɛ̀ mbetɛ, sɔsɔɔ, mi nɛ́ wi-sedaako k’ɛnɛ.
Kapsiki_DC: Ma ke Zhɛrɛmi mtsehete: «Mahwətə nde geze ŋayɛ kezha ɗema yɛ kadzawa Ɛzhipte, gheyɛ ka Zhəwda nyi ketene. Fate mə megela, fəyitekeghə geze ŋayɛ 'ya ɓeshi.
Tupurri: Nday jar Juda maga gwa' mono, Manwur waçaçn ne nday! Wo wee Ejipte wa! Laan wee go de ele ndi kam nday wara kamge.

Francais: Car vous vous abusiez vous-mêmes, lorsque vous m'avez envoyé vers Yahweh, notre Dieu, en disant: Intercède pour nous auprès de Yahweh, notre Dieu, et tout ce que Yahweh, notre Dieu, dira, déclare-le-nous, et nous le ferons.
Anglais: For ye dissembled in your hearts, when ye sent me unto the  Lord  your God, saying, Pray for us unto the  Lord  our God; and according unto all that the  Lord  our God shall say, so declare unto us, and we will do it.
BIBALDA_TA_PELDETTA: Nigi ka ɗut tuwgiya, kay nigi gan kat Ma-Vatɗina Lawna vigiya; nigi di tan ala: siɗawaŋ kuma'a tam Ma-Vatɗina Lawna vuma'a, ɗekma kay slen kaf ma Ma-Vatɗina Lawna vuma'a duma kay lumna, numa ma lumu may.
Bulu: Mia duʼu miabebien, amu mi nga lôme ma be Nti, e Zambe wônan, mi jôʼô na: Yeʼelaʼane Nti, e Zambe wongan asu dangan, a jam ese Nti, e Zambe wongan, a ye jô, kate bia de a bia ye de bo.
Guiziga: Kum vuna tihaŋ kumo, kum mislinikiy ng'avu Bumbulvuŋ Buymisemuŋ kumo na, ki vulam di i vu kum taˀ da mucu, ki ɓikiy na: ‹Inga tumbulo Bumbulvuŋ Buymisemuŋ ar deɗe ndra takwa, ɓi Bumbulvuŋ Buymisemuŋ ndra maɓa gar na, ɓa ndra di tiɗeˀe, ɓa i gakaŋ!›
Fulfulde_Adamaoua: On ɗon majjina ko'e mooɗon. On neli yam haa Jawmiraawo, Allah mooɗon, on mbi'i yam: Do'ana min Jawmiraawo Allah amin. Anndin min ko o wi'ete fuu, min mbaɗan ɗum.
Fulfulde_DC: On ɗon majjina ko'e mooɗon. On neli yam haa Jawmiraawo, Allah mooɗon, on mbi'i yam: Do'ana min Jawmiraawo Allah amin. Anndin min ko o wi'ete fuu, min mbaɗan ɗum.
KALATA_KO_SC_Gbaya: Ɛ́nɛ́ tɛ̀ɛ́ yɔ kɔya-tɛ‘nɛ́; ɛ́nɛ́ nɛ̀ tɛ‘nɛ́ toma'm sitɛ GASA WAN, Sɔ̧ k’ɛnɛ tɔ̧ nɛnɛ ha̧‘m'e, a̧‘m nɛ́ɛ̀ ai nú wen'nɛ́ ha̧ GASA WAN Sɔ̧ k’ɛnɛ, a̧‘m tɔ̧́ mgbak mɔ nɛ̀ GASA WAN Sɔ̧ k’ɛnɛ tɔ̧a, ɓɛɛ ɛnɛ tɛ de.
KALATA_KO_DC_Gbaya: Ɛ́nɛ́ tɛ̀ɛ́ yɔ kɔya-tɛ‘nɛ́; ɛ́nɛ́ nɛ̀ tɛ‘nɛ́ toma'm sitɛ GASA WAN, Sɔ̧ k’ɛnɛ tɔ̧ nɛnɛ ha̧‘m'e, a̧‘m nɛ́ɛ̀ ai nú wen'nɛ́ ha̧ GASA WAN Sɔ̧ k’ɛnɛ, a̧‘m tɔ̧́ mgbak mɔ nɛ̀ GASA WAN Sɔ̧ k’ɛnɛ tɔ̧a, ɓɛɛ ɛnɛ tɛ de.
Kapsiki_DC: Ma kwa ghwenakɛ ɗa yɛ kafa ghena va Shala Mahwətə ta ŋayɛ ba'a kwa 'yɛwete yɛ kasəkwə ŋkɛ 'ya kezha gheyɛ ne, ma pe yɛ: ‹Ncɛte n'yɛ wəshi nyi ɗe Shala Mahwətə ta ɓəmə tserame yitea mene slene ghen'yɛ le hɛ.› Vəa ŋkwa shɛ ne, nahe yɛ kezamte ghə yitea mpia ŋayɛ.
Tupurri: Nday jaçë see äay de see äay werga nday hay äo' ndi wo see Manwuri, Baa äayn ga ndi mo tos Manwuri, Baa äayn ti äay day ni nday joñ fen maga Manwuri, Baa äayn waçaçn ge mo äuy yañ. Nday ga naa mbe nen äe go ne nday ni nday joñn yañ.

Francais: Je vous l'ai déclaré aujourd'hui; mais vous n'avez point écouté la voix de Yahweh, votre Dieu, ni rien de ce qu'il m'a envoyé vous communiquer.
Anglais: And now I have this day declared it to you; but ye have not obeyed the voice of the  Lord  your God, nor any thing for the which he hath sent me unto you.
BIBALDA_TA_PELDETTA: Nan digiyawa goy vaydi; may nigi min hum del Ma-Vatɗina Lawna vigiɗi, slen kaf ma nam di tanu kay nan dum tigiya kaw nigi min vumɗi.
Bulu: Me kateya mia de môse wu; ve mi nji wôʼô tyiñe Nti, e Zambe wônan, nge vôʼôlô jam ese a nga ve ma na me kate mia.
Guiziga: I ɓukum di le wureˀ ani ngbaŋ, amma ko ki cinaka mi ngi Bumbulvuŋ Buymisemuŋ kumo ta na si. Ɓi naŋ miɓiy taŋ ɓa i ɓukum di na, ko ki cinam loŋ le ta!›
Fulfulde_Adamaoua: Mi anndini on ɗum jonta, ammaa on ɗowtanaaki umrooje Jawmiraawo ɗe o neli yam wi'ugo on.
Fulfulde_DC: Mi anndini on ɗum jonta, ammaa on ɗowtanaaki umrooje Jawmiraawo ɗe o neli yam wi'ugo on.
KALATA_KO_SC_Gbaya: Mi tɔ̧ɔ̧ mɔ‘i h’ɛnɛ kinii, ɓɛɛ ɛ́nɛ́ mbo zu ha̧ GASA WAN Sɔ̧ k’ɛnɛ na; ɛ́nɛ́ zii gba̧a̧ mɔ n'aa ee nú‘m mɛ tɔ̧ h’ɛnɛ na.
KALATA_KO_DC_Gbaya: Mi tɔ̧ɔ̧ mɔ‘i h’ɛnɛ kinii, ɓɛɛ ɛ́nɛ́ mbo zu ha̧ GASA WAN Sɔ̧ k’ɛnɛ na; ɛ́nɛ́ zii gba̧a̧ mɔ n'aa ee nú‘m mɛ tɔ̧ h’ɛnɛ na.
Kapsiki_DC: Kwa nza ŋkɛ ɓeshi nya ne, ghena nya fate 'ya va Shala Mahwətə ta ɓəmə yageze ŋayɛ 'ya, ama hɛreɗɛ yɛ ɗema fa ghena nyi gezave ɗa ŋkɛ kezha gheyɛ.
Tupurri: Ndi naa nen äe we go ne nday ama nday laa laa jag Manwuri, Baa äayn gaa lay, laa fen maga aà hay haçn le me jag ga ndi mo waçaçn ne nday mo gaa lay.

Francais: Sachez donc bien maintenant que vous mourrez par l'épée, par la famine et par la peste, au lieu où il vous a plu d'aller pour y habiter."
Anglais: Now therefore know certainly that ye shall die by the sword, by the famine, and by the pestilence, in the place whither ye desire to go and to sojourn.
BIBALDA_TA_PELDETTA: Wulini nigi ma wi ala kew-gaferaŋa, mayta hiɗi moyna ma vatgi goyo hay liyn ma nigi min tuɗ lak hayamna ɗawni.
Bulu: Tukaʼa yemane de éyoñe ji: mia ye wu nkpwaté mekôn, mfumbale zaé nge bim e vôme mia ke na, mi tabe.
Guiziga: Wurenna, a bigi le njah muduba, kisa micam ti kiɗ ti maslalam, ti may waɗ ti jiji mozorbono ar li kum mawuɗam ki ra ɗumom ara vuna.»
Fulfulde_Adamaoua: Jonta kam, annde booɗɗum: On maayran bee kaafahi malla weelo malla nyawu kalluŋgu ndaaɓoowu haa lesdi ndi ngiɗɗon yahgo jooɗo ton.”
Fulfulde_DC: Jonta kam, annde booɗɗum: On maayran bee kaafahi malla weelo malla nyawu kalluŋgu ndaaɓoowu haa lesdi ndi ngiɗɗon yahgo jooɗo ton.”
KALATA_KO_SC_Gbaya: Kinii, ɛ́nɛ́ nyɛma mɛ iŋ nɛ̀ mbetɛ‘e, ɛ́nɛ́ tɛ fe fio gba-paa, kaɓa in ŋga zɛɛ-geŋa sɛn fara n’ɛnɛ kɔ̧ɔ̧ mɛ nɛ̀ɛ́ husi sɛnɛ‘i.»
KALATA_KO_DC_Gbaya: Kinii, ɛ́nɛ́ nyɛma mɛ iŋ nɛ̀ mbetɛ‘e, ɛ́nɛ́ tɛ fe fio gba-paa, kaɓa in ŋga zɛɛ-geŋa sɛn fara n’ɛnɛ kɔ̧ɔ̧ mɛ nɛ̀ɛ́ husi sɛnɛ‘i.»
Kapsiki_DC: Tsetsenya tse gɛ, ɗepete mə fate fate katempə yɛ va mpa, va ma keɗema va ba te hɛɗi nya telə nya yɛ kawəfərə.»
Tupurri: Kon wee go de el patala so, moslam, koñne wo de bulfuñ taw ge wo nday wo go ti ngeel maga nday da ga nday raw wo go lagge ni mono.

Francais: Et lorsque Jérémie eut achevé de dire à tout le peuple toutes les paroles de Yahweh, leur Dieu, toutes ces paroles que Yahweh, leur Dieu, l’avait envoyé leur communiquer,
Anglais: And it came to pass, that when Jeremiah had made an end of speaking unto all the people all the words of the  Lord  their God, for which the  Lord  their God had sent him to them, even all these words,
BIBALDA_TA_PELDETTA: Hay li ma Yeremiyas vunam vat kay di yoboyna vi Ma-Vatɗina Lawna visiya dum kaf vatna, yoboyn kaf ma Ma-Vatɗina Lawna visiya vulum talamu kay nam dum tisiya,
Bulu: Eyoñe Yérémi a maneya kate bôte bese mejô mese Nti, e Zambe wob, a nga lôme nye na a kate be,
Guiziga: Ti Zeremi mikiɗa mi ngi ɓa ɓi da mizli gar, ɓi ngi Bumbulvuŋ, Buymisemuŋ taŋ, ɓi ngi Bumbulvuŋ Buymisemuŋ taŋ miɓa da Zeremi ɓa a ɓa taŋ di gar na,
Fulfulde_Adamaoua: Nde Yeremiya timmini yeccugo yimɓe ummaatoore ko Jawmiraawo Allah maɓɓe neli mo anndingo ɓe fuu,
Fulfulde_DC: Nde Yeremiya timmini yeccugo yimɓe ummaatoore ko Jawmiraawo Allah maɓɓe neli mo anndingo ɓe fuu,
KALATA_KO_SC_Gbaya: Ŋgimbi nɛ̀ Jeremii kaɗa tɔ̧ɔ̧ wen nɛ̀ GASA WAN Sɔ̧ kɔ-wa ee nú-a ha̧ a̧ mɛ tɔ̧ ti dukbíí kaɗi,
KALATA_KO_DC_Gbaya: Ŋgimbi nɛ̀ Jeremii kaɗa tɔ̧ɔ̧ wen nɛ̀ GASA WAN Sɔ̧ kɔ-wa ee nú-a ha̧ a̧ mɛ tɔ̧ ti dukbíí kaɗi,
Kapsiki_DC: Ma kwa kiɗimte geze nda ghena nyi gezeke Shala Mahwətə ta nci Zhɛrɛmi ke mbeli pɛtɛ, pɛtɛa ghena nyi gezave nda ŋkɛ kezha geze nda ke hɛ ne,
Tupurri: De maga Jermi äo' jag fer waçaçre Manwuri, Baa äaaran go ne jarn wo äuy, diñ waçaçre se maga Manwuri, Baa äaaran hay haçn ne hen jag ga aà mo a waçaçge äe ne hara go mono,

Francais: Azarias, fils d’Osaïas, Johanan, fils de Carée, et tous les hommes orgueilleux dirent à Jérémie: "Tu dis un mensonge; Yahweh, notre Dieu, ne t’a pas envoyé pour nous dire: N’entrez point en Egypte pour y habiter.
Anglais: Then spake Azariah the son of Hoshaiah, and Johanan the son of Kareah, and all the proud men, saying unto Jeremiah, Thou speakest falsely: the  Lord  our God hath not sent thee to say, Go not into Egypt to sojourn there:
BIBALDA_TA_PELDETTA: bugolda Azariya, goora vi Henok, Yohanan goora vi Kareyak, hiɗi sum sa suburta hay diksin kaf di tam Yeremiyas ala: Naŋ da' kayn ti sinda; Ma-Vatɗina Lawna vuma'a may vul va taŋu kay naŋ dum tuma ala numa tuɗ lak goy Egipteɗi noŋɗi.
Bulu: Eyoñe te Azaria, e mone Hôkaya, Yôhanañ, e mone Karéa a bôte mebune bete bese be nga jô Yérémi na: Jame wo jô e ne minsos; Nti, e Zambe wongan a nji lôme wo ô jô na: Te kean Ejipte a tabe wé.
Guiziga: Azariya mangal ngi Hosaya, Yohanaŋ mangal ngi Kareya, waɗ mizli mukuwahay gar, a zlaka a ɓaka Zeremi na: «Ɓi ka maɓa gar na, i slir. Ko Bumbulvuŋ Buymisemuŋ ndra a slino ka ɓa ki ɓa ndra: ‹Ki ram nga ɗum a Ezipte ta› na, a slino ka ta.
Fulfulde_Adamaoua: Azariya ɓii Hosa'ya e Yohanan ɓii Kareha e worɓe elewɓe fuu mbi'i mo: “A ɗon fewa! Jawmiraawo Allah amin nelaay ma wi'ugo min, taa min njaha Misra ngam faɓɓoygo ton.
Fulfulde_DC: Azariya ɓii Hosa'ya e Yohanan ɓii Kareha e worɓe elewɓe fuu mbi'i mo: “A ɗon fewa! Jawmiraawo Allah amin nelaay ma wi'ugo min, taa min njaha Misra ngam faɓɓoygo ton.
KALATA_KO_SC_Gbaya: Azaria, bem ko Hosaya, Yohanaŋ bem ko Karea, in o wan-ŋgazu nɔ‘i lɛŋ tɔ̧ɔ̧ ha̧ Jeremii: «Nɛ́ wen-ndela a̧ mɛ tɔ̧. GASA WAN Sɔ̧ k’ɛɛ tom kɔ‘i mɛ́ mɛ́ tɛ̀ɛ́ dor yɛ tɛ nɛa-a mɛ hu̧si sɛn nú Egiptɛ mɛ na.
KALATA_KO_DC_Gbaya: Azaria, bem ko Hosaya, Yohanaŋ bem ko Karea, in o wan-ŋgazu nɔ‘i lɛŋ tɔ̧ɔ̧ ha̧ Jeremii: «Nɛ́ wen-ndela a̧ mɛ tɔ̧. GASA WAN Sɔ̧ k’ɛɛ tom kɔ‘i mɛ́ mɛ́ tɛ̀ɛ́ dor yɛ tɛ nɛa-a mɛ hu̧si sɛn nú Egiptɛ mɛ na.
Kapsiki_DC: ma ke yɛ Azariya, wəzege ta Hoshaya, Yohanan, wəzege ta Karɛya ba'a kweci ka fegea kɛfi sha Zhɛrɛmi: «Tseŋwəa ŋa, Shala Mahwətə ta ɓəmə nde ghwenakɛ ŋa kageze: ‹Dzawama yɛ kawəfərə kwa Ɛzhipte ma›, ke we!
Tupurri: Asariya je ni Hosaya no, Yohanan je ni Kareyan wo de jar ma far ti see äaara ciñ wo äuy kal wo riñ Jermi gana: Fen maga ndo waçaçn diñ gete'e. Manwuri, Baa wuurn bay le de äo' ndo riñ wuur ga wuur mo wo Ejipte ma lagge wo ni wa wa.

Francais: Mais c’est Baruch, fils de Nérias, qui t’excite contre nous, afin de nous livrer aux mains des Chaldéens, pour nous faire mourir et pour nous faire transporter à Babylone.
Anglais: But Baruch the son of Neriah setteth thee on against us, for to deliver us into the hand of the Chaldeans, that they might put us to death, and carry us away captives into Babylon.
BIBALDA_TA_PELDETTA: May zutaŋ diraŋ kulo katma kayni mi Baruk, goora vi Neriya, kay numa ma vulis goy hay ɓam sa Kaldeena, kay nisi cuma goyo lebo narma goy gorvo'o hay Babilon.
Bulu: Ve Baruk, e mone Nériya, nye a tindi wo na ô wosane bia a ve bia e mo Bekaldééñ na, be wôé bia, nge kee bia minkôme Babilôn.
Guiziga: I Baruk mangal ngi Neriya mapuw mi ngi slikiɗa ɓi ati ndra, a wuɗ vul ndra asi haŋ ngi Babiloŋhoy ɓa a kiɗam ndra vagay vagay malla ɓa a jam ndra nga Babiloŋ.»
Fulfulde_Adamaoua: Ammaa Baruku ɓii Neriya ummini ma dow amin, ngam hokkugo min haa juuɗe Kaldiya'en, haa ɓe mbara min malla ɓe ndaha min haa Baabila.”
Fulfulde_DC: Ammaa Baruku ɓii Neriya ummini ma dow amin, ngam hokkugo min haa juuɗe Kaldiya'en, haa ɓe mbara min malla ɓe ndaha min haa Baabila.”
KALATA_KO_SC_Gbaya: Nɛ́ Baruk bem ko Nɛriya a̧ ir mɛ mɛ dor yɛ. A̧ kɔ̧ɔ̧ mɛ e yɛ kɔ̧̀ er o be Kaldee, ha̧ wa mɛ gbɛ yɛ, mɛ kai yɛ nɛ̀ bara-biro si Babilɔŋ.»
KALATA_KO_DC_Gbaya: Nɛ́ Baruk bem ko Nɛriya a̧ ir mɛ mɛ dor yɛ. A̧ kɔ̧ɔ̧ mɛ e yɛ kɔ̧̀ er o be Kaldee, ha̧ wa mɛ gbɛ yɛ, mɛ kai yɛ nɛ̀ bara-biro si Babilɔŋ.»
Kapsiki_DC: Barək, wəzege ta Nɛriya, nde heɗeyite ŋa yitea ghen'yɛ, kwa ɗe ŋkɛ kave nda ɓəmə ke ka Babilone kezha mpəmte ɓəmə hɛ keɗema kezha fəghe ɓəmə kajive Babilone.»
Tupurri: Ane jaçë nen äo ne wuur ti na diñ Barug je ni Neriya no, nen maga wuur mo laa go ne jar Kalde wo do, day aà mo id wo wuur go noga mo hoo wuur ma rawge wo go de wuur Babilone.

Francais: Ainsi Johanan, fils de Carée, tous les chefs de troupes et tout le peuple n'écoutèrent pas la voix de Yahweh qui leur ordonnait de demeurer au pays de Juda.
Anglais: So Johanan the son of Kareah, and all the captains of the forces, and all the people, obeyed not the voice of the  Lord , to dwell in the land of Judah.
BIBALDA_TA_PELDETTA: Yohanan goora vi Kareyak, sa ŋulona vi vokŋa kaf, hiɗi sumun kaf min hum kuɗ della vi Ma-Vatɗin noŋɗi, namu ma vulsi hagata kay nisi ma lak hay nagata vi Yuda.
Bulu: Yôhanañ, e mone Karéa, bivete bise ya nkane bita a bôte bese yʼayoñ be nji wôʼô tyiñe Nti Nye a nga bendé be na be tabe si Yuda.
Guiziga: Bumbulvuŋ mawuɗ ɓa i cifam angi hirwuy Zuda na, ko Yohanaŋ mangal ngi Kareya, ko madiɗa ngi sojehey mitaˀ taˀ ti ngay taŋhay na, na zle ko mbur loŋ macina mi naŋ anta si.
Fulfulde_Adamaoua: Bana non Yohanan e mawɓe konu fuu e ummaatoore fuu ɗowtanaaki Jawmiraawo umruɗo ɓe jooɗaago nder lesdi Yahuuda.
Fulfulde_DC: Bana non Yohanan e mawɓe konu fuu e ummaatoore fuu ɗowtanaaki Jawmiraawo umruɗo ɓe jooɗaago nder lesdi Yahuuda.
KALATA_KO_SC_Gbaya: Kóó nɛ́ Yohanaŋ bem ko Karea, kóó nɛ́ o gasawi ko o wi-biro, kóó nɛ́ ŋma bíí nɛtɛ, zii tiger GASA WAN nɛ̀ sa wa mɛ ɓɔn tɛ nù Juda'i na.
KALATA_KO_DC_Gbaya: Kóó nɛ́ Yohanaŋ bem ko Karea, kóó nɛ́ o gasawi ko o wi-biro, kóó nɛ́ ŋma bíí nɛtɛ, zii tiger GASA WAN nɛ̀ sa wa mɛ ɓɔn tɛ nù Juda'i na.
Kapsiki_DC: Tsagha yɛ Yohanan, wəzege ta Karɛya, mbelia jama nyi te ghəa wəvəsə ka sewajɛ le kweci mbeli yitea hɛ, hɛreɗɛ hɛ ɗema fa ghena ta Mahwətə nya kegeze nda ke hɛ kezha nza te hɛɗia Zhəwda.
Tupurri: Yohanan je ni Kareya no, jar kluuri soden wo de jar ma äuyn laa wo laa jag Manwur maga riñ ra ga aà mo lag wo ti sir Juda mo gaè.

Francais: Mais Johanan, fils de Carée, et tous les chefs des troupes prirent tout le reste de Juda, ceux qui étaient revenus de toutes les nations où ils avaient été dispersés, pour habiter le pays de Juda,
Anglais: But Johanan the son of Kareah, and all the captains of the forces, took all the remnant of Judah, that were returned from all nations, whither they had been driven, to dwell in the land of Judah;
BIBALDA_TA_PELDETTA: Nala Yohanan goora vi Kareyak, hiɗi sa ŋulona vi vokŋa vi sojen kaf, nisi yaw dir sumuna vi jafna vi Yuda kaf, sum sa hotay hay nagata vi Yuda bugol mer ma nisi mer goy jar jaf-sumuna,
Bulu: A Yôhanañ, e mone Karéa, a bivete bise ya nkane bita be nga nyoñe mebukaʼa mese ya Yuda me nga bulane zu tabe si Yuda, mvuse nkeane be nga mane ke minkôm, e meyoñ mese été:
Guiziga: Yohanaŋ mangal ngi Kareya ati madiɗa ngi sojehey mitaˀ taˀ ti ngay taŋhay tuwa, a jaka mizli mindiram ti siifa asi ruwuy zuda gar, mizli mizliɗam hirnga zleˀe nga wuzla sukwi ngi mizli midigwi taŋhay, mumoko ti mi nga cifi a Zuda:
Fulfulde_Adamaoua: Yohanan e mawɓe konu fuu koo'i luttuɓe Yahuuda fuu, njahri ɓe haa Misra. Ɓe koo'i yimɓe wartuɓe Yahuuda diga lesɗe haa ɓe caŋkitino fuu,
Fulfulde_DC: Yohanan e mawɓe konu fuu koo'i luttuɓe Yahuuda fuu, njahri ɓe haa Misra. Ɓe koo'i yimɓe wartuɓe Yahuuda diga lesɗe haa ɓe caŋkitino fuu,
KALATA_KO_SC_Gbaya: Yohanaŋ bem ko Karea in o wi-duk-zu o wi-biro kaia o oi be Juda lɛŋ, o wan nɛ̀ pia so ɗoŋ pii Juda ŋgimbi nɛ̀ wa pɛsa so nɛnɛ dam tɛ o nù katɛ wa.
KALATA_KO_DC_Gbaya: Yohanaŋ bem ko Karea in o wi-duk-zu o wi-biro kaia o oi be Juda lɛŋ, o wan nɛ̀ pia so ɗoŋ pii Juda ŋgimbi nɛ̀ wa pɛsa so nɛnɛ dam tɛ o nù katɛ wa.
Kapsiki_DC: Pa yɛ Yohanan, wəzege ta Karɛya le kweci mbelia jama nyi te ghəa wəvəsə ka sewajɛ fəghe ka Zhəwda nyi ketene te ghweme, kweci mbeli nyi kezhɛneke geva kadzembe Zhəwda, kwa sebe ta nya tazeyi hɛ mbe kweci hɛɗi nyi dzeyi yite:
Tupurri: Yohanan je ni Kareyan wo de jar kluuri soden wo äuy raw wo hoo jar Juda maga gwa' wo, ga hay dus wo wo go yoo wer jar dehaçy wo äuy day fer wo le ma lagge ti sir Juda mono.

Francais: hommes, femmes et enfants, les filles du roi et toutes les personnes que Nabuzardan, chef des gardes, avait laissées avec Godolias, fils d'Ahicam, fils de Saphan, ainsi que Jérémie, le prophète, et Baruch, fils de Nérias.
Anglais: Even men, and women, and children, and the king's daughters, and every person that Nebuzar–adan the captain of the guard had left with Gedaliah the son of Ahikam the son of Shaphan, and Jeremiah the prophet, and Baruch the son of Neriah.
BIBALDA_TA_PELDETTA: jufayna, boyna, gurosgurayna, guro-boyna vi mulla, hiɗi sumun kaf sa Nebuzaradan ma ŋolla vi sa ŋomda hinsi ays tam Gedaliya goora vi Ahikam, goora vi Safan, hiɗi Yeremiyas ma jobta, hiɗi Baruk goora vi Neriya kaw.
Bulu: befam, binga, bongô, bengon be njô bôt a bôte bese Nébuzaradañ, évete bezimbi, a nga liʼi ba be Gedalia, e mone Ahikam, ndaé Safan, nkulu mejô Yérémi a Baruk e mone Nériya.
Guiziga: Ziley, ngwasay, ziri, ziri mongoso ngi buyoy, mizli gar, Nebuzaradaŋ madiɗa ngi mijigina hayay mupula taŋ zleˀe da Gedaliya, mangal ngi Ahikam, dideˀ ngi Safaŋ waɗ mijiviɗ Zeremi ati Baruk mangal ngi Neriya ma.
Fulfulde_Adamaoua: worɓe, rewɓe, ɓikkoy e ɓiɓɓe laamiiɗo rewɓe, koo ɓeye ɓe Nebuzaradan, hooreejo aynooɓe laamiiɗo Baabila accino haa Gedaliya ɓii Ahikam ɓii Safan. Ɓe koo'i boo annabi Yeremiya e Baruku ɓii Neriya.
Fulfulde_DC: worɓe, rewɓe, ɓikkoy e ɓiɓɓe laamiiɗo rewɓe, koo ɓeye ɓe Nebuzaradan, hooreejo aynooɓe laamiiɗo Baabila accino haa Gedaliya ɓii Ahikam ɓii Safan. Ɓe koo'i boo annabi Yeremiya e Baruku ɓii Neriya.
KALATA_KO_SC_Gbaya: Wa kaia o wiwii, o okoo, ká bá nɛ̀ o obem in o boko-be-wan gú nɛ̀ o bíí lɛŋ nɛ́ Nɛbuzaradaŋ, gasawi zu o wi-pɛm-wannu ee so mɛ ya in Gedalias bem ko Ahikam, bem ko Safaŋ, ká bá nɛ̀ Jeremii  wi-tɔ̧-wen  oi nú Sɔ̧, in Baruk bem ko Nɛriya mbɛt.
