Tupurri: Diñ wersen so, ko wee ga wur yañ wo le a ge day ndi joñ ge fodo äe ma de yorgen wo yañ go de guuri, day jar maga hay wo go de sealge da' ge wo see äaara yañ.

Francais: Quand Babel s'élèverait jusqu'aux cieux, quand elle rendrait inaccessible sa haute forteresse; par mon ordre lui viendraient des dévastateurs, - oracle de Yahweh.
Anglais: Though Babylon should mount up to heaven, and though she should fortify the height of her strength, yet from me shall spoilers come unto her, saith the  Lord .
BIBALDA_TA_PELDETTA: Lali Babilon wul ma' ta-ta kulo dukalawn kaw, gulmunna va' ma fiyokŋa, la na' lum a sa jik kalamɗi kaw, nan ma cuk sum sa ɓulak liyna ay ta'a, Din mi Ma-Vatɗina.
Bulu: Toʼo na Babilôn a bet a kui yôp, toʼo a bo aleme na e bo te kʼanyiine, betyam ba ye wosane nye ngame jam, nalé Nti a jô.
Guiziga: Da ko Babiloŋ a jiɗ le sesẽŋ a muŋ, a ɗiyi li naŋ le ngi ndil ng'ara ti tuwaˀ tekeɗe kwana, i sa ɓa mihirya gwataya ɗaˀ si na, a ndilam si. I ya Bumbulvuŋ maɓi.»
Fulfulde_Adamaoua: Koo to Baabila eeŋgi haa yotto asama, ngol nyiɓi cuuɗi cemmbiɗɗi towɗi, min kam mi nelan yimɓe ngam nattingo ngol.” Non Jawmiraawo wi'i.
Fulfulde_DC: Koo to Baabila eeŋgi haa yotto asama, ngol nyiɓi cuuɗi cemmbiɗɗi towɗi, min kam mi nelan yimɓe ngam nattingo ngol.” Non Jawmiraawo wi'i.
KALATA_KO_SC_Gbaya: GASA WAN tɔ̧a: «Kóó Babilɔŋ daŋa so nɛ́ yiwese mɛ, nɛ́ɛ̀ de ŋga tua kɔ‘i sɛnɛ, mi tɛ tom o bíí mɛ nɛ̀ɛ́ ɗaŋ a̧.»
KALATA_KO_DC_Gbaya: GASA WAN tɔ̧a: «Kóó Babilɔŋ daŋa so nɛ́ yiwese mɛ, nɛ́ɛ̀ de ŋga tua kɔ‘i sɛnɛ, mi tɛ tom o bíí mɛ nɛ̀ɛ́ ɗaŋ a̧.»
Kapsiki_DC: Ya Babilone nza wərə kadzemenyɛ pelɛ ghweme, ya gheŋkɛ nzanyɛ kwetere wəmbəa zli nya biya ne, katentsehe mbeli nyi keteŋzla shɛ kegezete 'ya.»
Tupurri: De maga Babilon mo mbeë ba see äe wo go ciñ da' swaare wo, noga mo geçeç ba kor äe ma de eegre kiñkiñn wo go ciñ bay maga jobo ëii ra wa yaw, jar älagge äen go a ge wo yañ durgi äe ti jag äi. Kay diñ jag Manwuri.

Francais: Une clameur retentit du côté de Babel: grand désastre au pays des Chaldéens!
Anglais: A sound of a cry cometh from Babylon, and great destruction from the land of the Chaldeans:
BIBALDA_TA_PELDETTA: ciriyna ka may goy hay Babilon pa, ɓulak-goyta ka ŋolo hay nagata vi sa Kaldeena.
Bulu: Nyôn wo wôʼé ô soʼo Babilôn, nalé fe beta éduñe si Bekaldééñ.
Guiziga: Zila vu ‹gawla kilawa› ara cino baɗ a Babiloŋ: gwat ngi mendere madiɗa a gi le asi ruwuyo!
Fulfulde_Adamaoua: “Nane gookaali diga Baabila e hoolo yibbere mawnde nder lesdi Kaldiya'en.
Fulfulde_DC: “Nane gookaali diga Baabila e hoolo yibbere mawnde nder lesdi Kaldiya'en.
KALATA_KO_SC_Gbaya: GASA WAN tɔ̧a: «Wi zii nɛ́ saa-sara wen gbakamɔ nɛ̀ Babilɔŋ mɛ tɛnɛ! Gasa ŋgamɔ tika nù ko o be Kaldee!
KALATA_KO_DC_Gbaya: GASA WAN tɔ̧a: «Wi zii nɛ́ saa-sara wen gbakamɔ nɛ̀ Babilɔŋ mɛ tɛnɛ! Gasa ŋgamɔ tika nù ko o be Kaldee!
Kapsiki_DC: Ma ke nde mɛ ŋkwa: «Fa mə: lewela yafa mbeli shave mbe Babilone, lewela va ndiremi nya kentsehe te hɛɗia ŋkɛ.
Tupurri: AÈ le de ngar jag le Babilone, diñ ngarge jag ma kluu ti sir mani jar Kalden wo.

Francais: Car Yahweh dévaste Babel, et il fait cesser son grand bruit; leurs flots mugissent comme les grandes eaux; et font entendre leur fracas.
Anglais: Because the  Lord  hath spoiled Babylon, and destroyed out of her the great voice; when her waves do roar like great waters, a noise of their voice is uttered:
BIBALDA_TA_PELDETTA: Kay Ma-Vatɗina ka jet Babilon goyo, suwana ma haya'na nam min zanamu, billa vi sa ɓulak liyna ka suwa'a ki niy ma ŋulona ma san as hum suwana valamu nala.
Bulu: Amu Nti a sa Babilôn, a bo na beta tyiñe wé a tabʼévô; mendime mé ma sôk ane beta bʼasôé, ba ve tyiñe ngu.
Guiziga: I Bumbulvuŋ mangizla Babiloŋ, widi taŋ mihaɗa haɗa na, a taˀa taŋ di siriw. Da ko widi taŋ na a cin zleˀe ka hurum ngi yam madiɗa ar mubuliy kwana, a sa taˀa taŋ di siriw na si.
Fulfulde_Adamaoua: Jawmiraawo ɗon wila Baabila, ɗon je'ina hoolo maŋngo nder maagol. Honooɓe ngol ɗon koola bana ndiyamji mawɗi, hoolo man ummi.
Fulfulde_DC: Jawmiraawo ɗon wila Baabila, ɗon je'ina hoolo maŋngo nder maagol. Honooɓe ngol ɗon koola bana ndiyamji mawɗi, hoolo man ummi.
KALATA_KO_SC_Gbaya: Nɛ́ GASA WAN a̧ ɗaŋ Babilɔŋ, kpe nɛ̀ zu o gasa  hiɗimɔ  kɔ̧-a̧‘i. Kóó giti gayamɔ ko o wisɛn nɔi̧a so hee gasa som-yì  ga, a̧ tɛ de ha̧ gitimɔ‘i mɛ kaɗi sélélé.
KALATA_KO_DC_Gbaya: Nɛ́ GASA WAN a̧ ɗaŋ Babilɔŋ, kpe nɛ̀ zu o gasa  hiɗimɔ  kɔ̧-a̧‘i. Kóó giti gayamɔ ko o wisɛn nɔi̧a so hee gasa som-yì  ga, a̧ tɛ de ha̧ gitimɔ‘i mɛ kaɗi sélélé.
Kapsiki_DC: Mahwətə nde ŋzla melemea shɛ, katefɛa lewela ta ŋkɛ nya wəba shɛ ŋkɛ. Kala gaŋkeɓe ta ndərə gaka ka jaga. Kala berazlɛ ta va gaka hɛ.
Tupurri: Gahaçyla Manwur go de älag Babilone, a go de ham jag geçeçge ma kloñ go gesiñ. Kañngaw äen sam wo do bii ma kluuri maga sam wo le gig gig nono.

Francais: Car il est venu contre elle, le dévastateur, - contre Babel; ses guerriers sont pris, leurs arcs sont brisés; car Yahweh est le Dieu des rétributions, il paiera sûrement!
Anglais: Because the spoiler is come upon her, even upon Babylon, and her mighty men are taken, every one of their bows is broken: for the  Lord  God of recompences shall surely requite.
BIBALDA_TA_PELDETTA: Awa, nam ma ɓulak liyna ka co ka'a, kay Babilon; sum sa duura vi Babilon yawiya, ɓarawta visi kusi goyo, kay Ma-Vatɗina mi Lawna ma vul mi gigekaw kuɗ lopna valamu valamu, mi ma vul mi gigekaw wurakŋa valamu valamu.
Bulu: Yaa, ntyam a zu wosane nye, a zu wosane Babilôn; mimbene mié mi biliya, bilaé biap bi buʼubaneya. Amu Nti a ne Zambe a yeme ve maʼan, a bulane môt ase jôm é nʼénjé.
Guiziga: Haˀaw, mingizla gwat ara so ng'ar naŋ, ng'ar Babiloŋ: bugawla ngi raˀahay i mijahay le, lek taŋ i mingila le. Asi Bumbulvuŋ, i Buymisemuŋ mapul bol, a si na wurka mburo le, weˀe avu gir naŋ.
Fulfulde_Adamaoua: Ɓe ngari nattingo Baabila. Semmbiɗɓe maagol kaɓɓaama, lagaaje maagol ngewi. Ngam Jawmiraawo woni Allah mo waatoto. O warjoto fakat.
Fulfulde_DC: Ɓe ngari nattingo Baabila. Semmbiɗɓe maagol kaɓɓaama, lagaaje maagol ngewi. Ngam Jawmiraawo woni Allah mo waatoto. O warjoto fakat.
KALATA_KO_SC_Gbaya: Nɛ̀ mbetɛ, wi-ɗaŋ-mɔ a̧ tɛ pii zu Babilɔŋ‘i; a̧ tɛ kai o yaa-ŋgo-biro kɔ-wa nɛ̀ bara, ɓɛɛ a̧ gbina o kusaa-góò kɔ̧-wa a nù. GASA WAN nɛ́ Sɔ̧-kifi-er; a̧ iŋa gusa bíí oi ɗaŋ deemɔ kɔ-wa.»
KALATA_KO_DC_Gbaya: Nɛ̀ mbetɛ, wi-ɗaŋ-mɔ a̧ tɛ pii zu Babilɔŋ‘i; a̧ tɛ kai o yaa-ŋgo-biro kɔ-wa nɛ̀ bara, ɓɛɛ a̧ gbina o kusaa-góò kɔ̧-wa a nù. GASA WAN nɛ́ Sɔ̧-kifi-er; a̧ iŋa gusa bíí oi ɗaŋ deemɔ kɔ-wa.»
Kapsiki_DC: Wəndə nya keteŋzla kahende nda geva, kateɗa Babilone ŋkɛ. Katefəhwe ka katsala nyi keɗepe mpa za ma ba'a katehwəshi yɛ rəgia nci ŋkɛ. Kwa nza ŋkɛ Mahwətə ya kaShala nya keɗepe wa dewa ba'a ve nda wəsə nya kehi ke yayata wəndə.
Tupurri: Kidolgi je älag jarn le de age durgi äe, le de age dur Babilone. AÈ hoo blumri äen wo we go, aè hrag toñwaa äaaran wo go werga Manwur diñ Baa maga de ko poë jare, aà fer nen mo ma wosela äuy ne hene.

Francais: J'enivrerai ses princes et ses sages, ses gouverneurs, ses magistrats et ses guerriers, et ils s'endormiront d'un sommeil éternel, et ne se réveilleront plus, - oracle du Roi, dont le nom est Yahweh des armées.
Anglais: And I will make drunk her princes, and her wise men, her captains, and her rulers, and her mighty men: and they shall sleep a perpetual sleep, and not wake, saith the King, whose name is the  Lord  of hosts.
BIBALDA_TA_PELDETTA: Sa yerimana visiya hiɗi sa wi-yalla visiya, nan ma ɦoysi goyo, sa guvernera, sa ŋulona hiɗi sa wi duura visiya kaw; nisi ma cuk sena hay senda vatɗita, nisi as zliy kulo loɗi, din mi mulla ma semda valam ala Ma-Vatɗina vi vok-ma-duura.
Bulu: Ma ye bo bivete bié, a beyeme mame bé be bili bilam, nalé fe bengovina bé, bôte metiñe bé a mimbene mié: ba ye ke ôyo melom, a ba ye bo te fe beta vee, nalé njô bôt, nyô jôé dé e ne na, Nti ya minsamba mewosan a jô.
Guiziga: Mizli madiɗa ngi slra naŋhay ati misi sinmijileŋ jileŋ naŋhaya, mijingaˀ ngi buy miwi li naŋhay ati buy miwi li naŋhay, waɗ bugawla naŋhaya, i sa wa taŋ duwlak duwlak ti mbaazla. A sa hinjam hinje muɗokɗok wãˀ, t'anta sa puɗukam puɗuk le mata a zilikiy: I ya Buy madiɗa mazilikiy. Bumbulvuŋ misi gidaŋ wãˀ.
Fulfulde_Adamaoua: O wuykinan ardiiɓe maagol e hikma'en maagol, ngomna'en e kaliifa'en e honooɓe fuu. Ɓe ɗaanoto ɗoyŋgol tedduŋgol, ɓe meetataa finugo.” Bana nii Laamiiɗo mo innde mum Jawmiraawo honooɓe asama wi'i.
Fulfulde_DC: O wuykinan ardiiɓe maagol e hikma'en maagol, ngomna'en e kaliifa'en e honooɓe fuu. Ɓe ɗaanoto ɗoyŋgol tedduŋgol, ɓe meetataa finugo.” Bana nii Laamiiɗo mo innde mum Jawmiraawo honooɓe asama wi'i.
KALATA_KO_SC_Gbaya: Wen ko wannu nɛ̀ nin-a nɛ́ GASA WAN, nɛ̀ a̧a̧ nɛ̀ ŋgayamɔ lɛŋ nɛ́ mɔ'ɔ: «Mi tɛ e dɔ̧ɔ̧ nú o gasawi ko wannu, o wi-iŋ-mgbara-mɔ, o wi-duk-zu zika-nù in o gasawi kɔ‘i, ká bá nɛ̀ o yaa-ŋgo-biro kɔ-wa lɛŋ. Wa tɛ tir yá nɛ̀ wa beka tun na.»
KALATA_KO_DC_Gbaya: Wen ko wannu nɛ̀ nin-a nɛ́ GASA WAN, nɛ̀ a̧a̧ nɛ̀ ŋgayamɔ lɛŋ nɛ́ mɔ'ɔ: «Mi tɛ e dɔ̧ɔ̧ nú o gasawi ko wannu, o wi-iŋ-mgbara-mɔ, o wi-duk-zu zika-nù in o gasawi kɔ‘i, ká bá nɛ̀ o yaa-ŋgo-biro kɔ-wa lɛŋ. Wa tɛ tir yá nɛ̀ wa beka tun na.»
Kapsiki_DC: 'Ya kateghwəyi mbeli nyi te ghəa ŋkɛ, ka ntsehwele ntsehwelea ŋkɛ, ka ŋgwamna ta ŋkɛ, ka meha ghwə ta ŋkɛ ba'a ka katsala kɛfia ŋkɛ. Katedzeyitea hɛnji hɛ kaghala ghala, mba hɛ katefeɗeghe we.» Nya ya kaghena nya geze Meghe nya nza sləa ŋkɛ KaMahwətə nde berete.
Tupurri: Ndi taa ge minisdir äen wo yañ go de jar ko ree äen wo, Ndi taa ge jar waçaç ree progren wo de jar car kiida äen wo de blumri äen wo yañ go. A laa ge wo naa yañ go ma tum day saara puçy gi go gaa so hase. Kay diñ jag wañ maga aè ëen gaa Manwur Pantway mono.

Francais: Ainsi parle Yahweh des armées : Les murailles de Babel, si larges, seront complètement rasées, et ses hautes portes seront brûlées. Ainsi les peuples travaillent pour le néant; et les nations au profit du feu, et ils s'y épuisent.
Anglais: Thus saith the  Lord  of hosts; The broad walls of Babylon shall be utterly broken, and her high gates shall be burned with fire; and the people shall labour in vain, and the folk in the fire, and they shall be weary.
BIBALDA_TA_PELDETTA: Ma-Vatɗina vi vok-ma-duura ka di ala: gulmun ma buɗukŋa vi Babilon ma to gaa'a, vun-galana valam ma fiyokŋa kut ma yum goyo, sum sa li lopna valamna makam kayn mi tuwsi ɦawa'a, jaf-sumuna mak tuwsi kayn mi kuta.
Bulu: Avale di Nti ya minsamba mewosan a jô na: ndame mimfine ya Babilôn ja ye bôéban ne meñ, mimbé mié mi nʼôyabe yôp mia ye diʼiban a nduan; éyoñe te ésaé bôt be nga bo ja ye bo zezé. Meyoñe bikuu me nga wu njuk asu nduan.
Guiziga: Bumbulvuŋ misi gidaŋ wãˀ a ɓi ma: «Mohol miɓiɓir ɓiɓir ngi Babiloŋ, a wahaka le leɗeɗ, yo mizlingre naŋhay migila subur suburoyo, vu a zuma taŋ le leɗeɗ. Mizli ara giram vu ngataraŋ, sukwi ngi mizli ara giram vu taŋ ngatara vur vu!
Fulfulde_Adamaoua: Ndaa ko Jawmiraawo honooɓe asama wi'i: “Konne'en ngibbinan mahi Baabila tekkuɗi fuu, ngulan dammuɗe maagol towɗe bee yiite. Jama'aaje ɗon torro meere, yiite nyaaman kuuɗe ummaatooje.”
Fulfulde_DC: Ndaa ko Jawmiraawo honooɓe asama wi'i: “Konne'en ngibbinan mahi Baabila tekkuɗi fuu, ngulan dammuɗe maagol towɗe bee yiite. Jama'aaje ɗon torro meere, yiite nyaaman kuuɗe ummaatooje.”
KALATA_KO_SC_Gbaya: Wen nɛ̀ GASA WAN nɛ̀ a̧a̧ nɛ̀ ŋgayamɔ lɛŋ tɔ̧ nɛ́ mɔ'ɔ: «Zɔm ndota garo Babilɔŋ tɛ gbin a nù lɛŋ; o gba kusa nú garo tɛ bìì wee lɛŋ. Tom ko dukbíí tɛ duk nɛ́ tom takaɗi; tom ko o tugun bíí tɛ bìì wee sɔɔ géè!»
KALATA_KO_DC_Gbaya: Wen nɛ̀ GASA WAN nɛ̀ a̧a̧ nɛ̀ ŋgayamɔ lɛŋ tɔ̧ nɛ́ mɔ'ɔ: «Zɔm ndota garo Babilɔŋ tɛ gbin a nù lɛŋ; o gba kusa nú garo tɛ bìì wee lɛŋ. Tom ko dukbíí tɛ duk nɛ́ tom takaɗi; tom ko o tugun bíí tɛ bìì wee sɔɔ géè!»
Kapsiki_DC: Wa nya ghena nya geze ŋkɛ nya zhɛkwa: «Ghwəpə zli nya bezle yitea Babilone keŋzla, hɛmɗɛke gelembe nyi bebiya bebiya mɛ keterenji. Gəmə leɓe ghəa nci mbeli, kaŋa ghwə yaka ta mbeli!»
Tupurri: Manwur Pantway waçaç gano: AÈ mbug gi kor ma de diy ma ti Babilon wo yañ go äuy, fuëgi äaara gwa' gaè. AÈ roë ge jag tiñ äe ma de geçeçren wo yañ go de wuu. Do kay nono joñre maga wer jar joñn ge wo kol ge yañ diñ ngeel de koëe, wer jar gay ge wo see äaara de koë koë ne wuu jage.

Francais: L'ordre que donna Jérémie, le prophète, à Saraïas, fils de Nérias, fils de Maasias, lorsqu'il se rendit à Babylone avec Sédécias, roi de Juda, la quatrième année de son règne. Saraïas était grand chambellan.
Anglais: The word which Jeremiah the prophet commanded Seraiah the son of Neriah, the son of Maaseiah, when he went with Zedekiah the king of Judah into Babylon in the fourth year of his reign. And this Seraiah was a quiet prince.
BIBALDA_TA_PELDETTA: Hagata ta Yeremiyas vula' tam sa ma jobta Seraya goora vi Neriya, goora vi Makseya, hay li ma nam kal hay Babilon hiɗi Sedekiyas, mulla vi Yuda, hay busata fiɗita, hay mulda vi Sedekiyas. Seraya ay mi ma ŋomda ma jewna.
Bulu: Abendé nkulu mejô Yérémi a nga ve Séraya e mone Nériya, ndaé Maséya, éyoñe ba Sédékias, njô bôte ya Yuda be nga ke Babilôn mbu nyini Sédékias a nga jôô. E too na Séraya a mbe évete bebaʼale akum.
Guiziga: Mingiɓi misi ani na, i Zeremi miɓa ɗaˀ le da Seraya, mangal ngi Neriya, dideˀ ngi Maˀaseya, ti di Seraya vuna ma ram nga Babiloŋ ati Sedekiyas buy Zuda, vi mumufaɗ naŋ angi zuma buyo, Seraya i madiɗa mudumbuŋ ngi hay buyo.
Fulfulde_Adamaoua: Seraya ɓii Neriya ɓii Mahaseya wonno saraakiijo ɓadiiɗo laamiiɗo Sedekiya. Nder nduuɓu Sedekiya, laamiiɗo Yahuuda, nayaɓu, o ɗofti mo haa Baabila. Yeremiya umri Seraya o yahra habaru muuɗum ton.
Fulfulde_DC: Seraya ɓii Neriya ɓii Mahaseya wonno saraakiijo ɓadiiɗo laamiiɗo Sedekiya. Nder nduuɓu Sedekiya, laamiiɗo Yahuuda, nayaɓu, o ɗofti mo haa Baabila. Yeremiya umri Seraya o yahra habaru muuɗum ton.
KALATA_KO_SC_Gbaya: Ha̧a̧nú nɛ Jeremii,  wi-tɔ̧-wen  oi nú Sɔ̧ ha̧a̧ so ha̧ Sɛraya, bem ko Nɛriya, bem ko Masɛya ŋgimbi nɛ̀ Masɛya'i nɛ̀ɛ̀ so nɛnɛ si Babilɔŋ in Sedesias wannu Juda sɛn tɛ naar pɛ ɔɔ-wan kɔ̧-a̧ nɛ́ mɔ'ɔ. Sɛraya duka so nɛ́ wan zu zika-nù.
KALATA_KO_DC_Gbaya: Ha̧a̧nú nɛ Jeremii,  wi-tɔ̧-wen  oi nú Sɔ̧ ha̧a̧ so ha̧ Sɛraya, bem ko Nɛriya, bem ko Masɛya ŋgimbi nɛ̀ Masɛya'i nɛ̀ɛ̀ so nɛnɛ si Babilɔŋ in Sedesias wannu Juda sɛn tɛ naar pɛ ɔɔ-wan kɔ̧-a̧ nɛ́ mɔ'ɔ. Sɛraya duka so nɛ́ wan zu zika-nù.
Kapsiki_DC: Ghena nya gezave nda nde mɛ ŋkwa Zhɛrɛmi ke Seraya, wəzege ta Nɛriya, shia Masɛya kwa dzawa Babilone hɛ le Sɛdɛsiyas, meghea ka Zhəwda, te kwa wəfaɗe ta va ta ŋkɛ mbe meghe. Kawəndə nya te ghəa wəshi se Seraya.
Tupurri: La diñ jag maga Jermi je ndar nen waçaçre Baa fern ne Seraya je ni Neriya, je ni Mahseya de maga aà de rawge Babilon wer Sedesiyas wañ Juda, nen kiñgi ma de naa maga Sedesiyas de ma joñwañ mono. Seraya hay na diñ wañ jar ko ngar wañn wo.

Francais: Jérémie écrivit dans un livre tous les malheurs qui devaient arriver à Babylone, toutes ces paroles écrites sur Babylone.
Anglais: So Jeremiah wrote in a book all the evil that should come upon Babylon, even all these words that are written against Babylon.
BIBALDA_TA_PELDETTA: Joota kaf ta min co kay Babilon Yeremiyas ɗo' gaa hay ɗerwelda, yoboyn kaf ma ka ɗoy kay Babilon.
Bulu: Yérémi a nga tili bidim bise bi nga yiane kui Babilôn, mejô mese me ne ntilan ajô Babilôn e kalatʼéziñ été.
Guiziga: Bonoy masa gi a Babiloŋ gar na, Zeremi a toho taŋ gar jom ng'ar ɗerewol purla: i mingiɓi mubo taŋ dumbuŋ a hirnga Babiloŋ na.
Fulfulde_Adamaoua: Yeremiya winndino haala sarru ngu tammi ukkanaago Baabila fuu, o winndi ka haa deftere.
Fulfulde_DC: Yeremiya winndino haala sarru ngu tammi ukkanaago Baabila fuu, o winndi ka haa deftere.
KALATA_KO_SC_Gbaya: Jeremii tɔ̧ɔ̧ ha̧ Sɛraya:
KALATA_KO_DC_Gbaya: Jeremii tɔ̧ɔ̧ ha̧ Sɛraya:
Kapsiki_DC: Mbe palepa nya kwetɛŋe rafeyi ndiremi nyi ketese pɛtɛ kadzete Babilone ŋkɛ: pɛtɛa ghena shɛhɛ kerafete geva te ghəa Babilone.
Tupurri: Jermi raw yer ree maga hay nen caa Babilon go äil kefder äuy, diñ waçaçre se maga wo de yerge ti Babilon mo äuy no.

Francais: Et Jérémie dit à Saraïas: "Quand tu seras arrivé à Babylone, tu auras soin de lire toutes ces paroles, et tu diras:
Anglais: And Jeremiah said to Seraiah, When thou comest to Babylon, and shalt see, and shalt read all these words;
BIBALDA_TA_PELDETTA: Yeremiyas di tam Seraya: hay li ma naŋ coowa hay Babilon, naŋ ma tun ŋalda vaŋu kay jaŋ yoboyn kayni kafe,
Bulu: Yérémi a nga jô Séraya na: Éyoñe wo ye kui Babilôn, wo ye bômbô évévé ya lañe mejô mese ma,
Guiziga: Zeremi a ɓa Seraya na: «Ti ka misa ndil le a Babiloŋ, ka misa slufa mingiɓi hana le ti jiviɗ naŋ ɗalla na,
Fulfulde_Adamaoua: Nden o wi'i Seraya: “To a yottake Baabila, sey a jaŋnga bolle ɗe'e fuu bee tiinaare.
Fulfulde_DC: Nden o wi'i Seraya: “To a yottake Baabila, sey a jaŋnga bolle ɗe'e fuu bee tiinaare.
KALATA_KO_SC_Gbaya: «Ŋgimbi nɛ̀ mɛ bé tɛ̀ɛ́ hɔ Babilɔŋ, ɓɛɛ nɛ̀ mɛ bé tɛ̀ɛ́ zɔk kalata’ɛ wen tɔra o wen nɛ̀ a̧a̧ zaŋ-aa lɛŋ ha̧ o bíí,
KALATA_KO_DC_Gbaya: «Ŋgimbi nɛ̀ mɛ bé tɛ̀ɛ́ hɔ Babilɔŋ, ɓɛɛ nɛ̀ mɛ bé tɛ̀ɛ́ zɔk kalata’ɛ wen tɔra o wen nɛ̀ a̧a̧ zaŋ-aa lɛŋ ha̧ o bíí,
Kapsiki_DC: Ma ke Zhɛrɛmi sha Seraya: «Ma vəa ŋkwa nya tentsehe na mbe Babilone ne, pɛtɛ na jaŋgate ghena nyi le berete,
Tupurri: Jermi riñ Seraya gano: De maga ndo wo ge we go Babilon no, ni ndo joñ ge nen kee waçaçre sen wo mo äuy go.

Francais: "Yahweh, toi-même tu as dit au sujet de ce lieu qu'on le détruirait, de telle sorte qu'il n'y aurait plus d'habitant, ni homme, ni bête, mais qu'il serait une solitude pour toujours."
Anglais: Then shalt thou say, O  Lord , thou hast spoken against this place, to cut it off, that none shall remain in it, neither man nor beast, but that it shall be desolate for ever.
BIBALDA_TA_PELDETTA: naŋ ma di ala: Ma-Vatɗina naŋu mi ma di ala liyn tani ma ɦo gaa'a, bugolda sa as mus hayam loɗi, muur as mus hayam loɗi kaw, may nam ma muɗ goy mi fulu kay dok-doko.
Bulu: wo ye jô na: A Nti, womien ô nga kobô ajô ya vôme nyô na a ye vaaban, a na, toʼo bôt toʼo betit, teke jôm ja ye beta tabʼété, ve na a ye bo bilik nnôm éto.
Guiziga: kisa ɓi: ‹Bumbulvuŋ ɗu, i ka vuna ɓi micica ɓi hana vur li misenna, ki ɓi na: ‹kisa ngizla kup, ko ki pul gwat loŋ le ti siifa ta, ko mbur titira, ko gwat misãmi, li hana a sa ndir daŋ daŋ ngi sete!›
Fulfulde_Adamaoua: Nden waɗ do'a ni'i: Yaa Jawmiraawo, an wolwi dow nokkuure nde'e, a halkan nde, taa goɗɗo tokko jooɗaago ɗo, koo yimɓe, koo dabbaaji. A wi'i nde laatoto ladde meere haa foroy.
Fulfulde_DC: Nden waɗ do'a ni'i: Yaa Jawmiraawo, an wolwi dow nokkuure nde'e, a halkan nde, taa goɗɗo tokko jooɗaago ɗo, koo yimɓe, koo dabbaaji. A wi'i nde laatoto ladde meere haa foroy.
KALATA_KO_SC_Gbaya: mɛ́ tɛ tɔ̧: ‹GASA WAN, nɛ́ ɛ́nɛ́ a̧ baa keta zu fara’ɛ ndé, ɛ́nɛ́ tɛ gbin fara’ɛ a nù, nɛ̀ ŋma mɔ kóó kpɔk beka duk na, kóó nɛ́ o bíí, kóó nɛ́ o saɗi. Fara’ɛ tɛ kifi nɛ́ ŋga-gbárà kotoro kpoo nɛ kpoo.›
KALATA_KO_DC_Gbaya: mɛ́ tɛ tɔ̧: ‹GASA WAN, nɛ́ ɛ́nɛ́ a̧ baa keta zu fara’ɛ ndé, ɛ́nɛ́ tɛ gbin fara’ɛ a nù, nɛ̀ ŋma mɔ kóó kpɔk beka duk na, kóó nɛ́ o bíí, kóó nɛ́ o saɗi. Fara’ɛ tɛ kifi nɛ́ ŋga-gbárà kotoro kpoo nɛ kpoo.›
Kapsiki_DC: ma pa na sha tegeze: ‹Mahwətə, gha le ghəa ŋa nde zlapete ŋzla ta Babilone, mba wəshi nyi nza mpi hwe katenza mbe, ya wəndə ŋelɛ, ya wəshi keseɗa we. Kaɓerama nya dɛrɛŋe rɛŋe tezhɛre ŋkɛ kaghala ghala.›
Tupurri: Ndo waçaç ge gano: Manwuri, ndo de see äo tu ndo hay waçaç go ti ngeel se ta'n la ga daga aè mo yee nen äe go day je tabay noga naèy mo hay äil äe wa, aà mo kol go diñ ngeel ma nen coocoo wo sagsage.

Francais: Et quand tu auras achevé de lire ce livre, tu y attacheras une pierre et tu le jetteras au milieu de l'Euphrate,
Anglais: And it shall be, when thou hast made an end of reading this book, that thou shalt bind a stone to it, and cast it into the midst of Euphrates:
BIBALDA_TA_PELDETTA: Hay li ma naŋ vat jaŋga vi ɗerwel kaynawa, naŋ ma jun degelem kuɗumu, naŋ ma gum hay niy-lumna Eufrata,
Bulu: A éyoñe wo ye mane lañe kalate nyô, wo ye tiñeti akoʼo été, a wua de ézezañ ôsôé Efrat.
Guiziga: Daka misa kiɗa mi ngi slufa ɗerewol hana le na, kisa juw ɗugur tiriɗ tiriɗ ava, ki hiziga ng'ar yam ngi mizaw Efrat,
Fulfulde_Adamaoua: An Seraya, ɓaawo a timmini jaŋngugo deftere nde'e, haɓɓu hayre haa maare, sakkin nde nder maayo Efratis,
Fulfulde_DC: An Seraya, ɓaawo a timmini jaŋngugo deftere nde'e, haɓɓu hayre haa maare, sakkin nde nder maayo Efratis,
KALATA_KO_SC_Gbaya: Ŋgimbi nɛ̀ mɛ á̧ tɔra kalata’ɛ kaɗi, mɛ̀ kún ta sɛnɛ, ɓɛɛ mɛ̀ pí̧ a̧ ɗɔɔ Efrat,
KALATA_KO_DC_Gbaya: Ŋgimbi nɛ̀ mɛ á̧ tɔra kalata’ɛ kaɗi, mɛ̀ kún ta sɛnɛ, ɓɛɛ mɛ̀ pí̧ a̧ ɗɔɔ Efrat,
Kapsiki_DC: Ma nahe kekiɗi jaŋga ta palepa kwa peɗe peɗe shɛ na ne, pa na hwepate pelɛ te kezha negha kadzawa hələa Efrate.
Tupurri: Day de maga ndo äo' jag kee kefder sen la we go no, ni ndo sa' huuli wer äe day ni ndo äo'n go nen maarog Efrade.

Francais: et tu diras: Ainsi s'abîmera Babylone, et elle ne se relèvera pas du malheur que j'amènerai sur elle, et ils tomberont épuisés." Jusqu'ici les paroles de Jérémie.
Anglais: And thou shalt say, Thus shall Babylon sink, and shall not rise from the evil that I will bring upon her: and they shall be weary. Thus far are the words of Jeremiah.
BIBALDA_TA_PELDETTA: bugolda naŋ ma di'e: Babilon ma sir gaa'a ki kayn nala kaw, joota ta nan min mara' ka'ta na' ma fok kulo ka' noŋɗi; nisi ma cuk gaa hiɗi sutaysi toya. Vun yoboyna vi Yeremiyas vat tani.
Bulu: Wôna wo ye jô na: Avale di nde Babilôn a ye nyoñ, a ye bo te beta tebe tetele amu bidime ma ye soo bie be nye; ba ye ku be teʼeya. Amané ya mejô me Yérémi nde le.
Guiziga: kisa ɓi na: ‹Babiloŋ a sa kiɗ kahana, ko naŋ anta sa slikiɗ mata, asi bonoy ya mupulo di nga hirnga naŋ na.›» «Sukwi ngi mizli ara giram vu ngataraŋ.» Mingiɓi ngi Zeremi a kiɗ mi aka.
Fulfulde_Adamaoua: nden wi': Bana nii Baabila yollorto, meetataa ummaago, ngam daliila halkere nde Jawmiraawo ukkanta ngol.” Bolle Yeremiya kaaɗi haa ɗo .
Fulfulde_DC: nden wi': Bana nii Baabila yollorto, meetataa ummaago, ngam daliila halkere nde Jawmiraawo ukkanta ngol.” Bolle Yeremiya kaaɗi haa ɗo .
KALATA_KO_SC_Gbaya: tɔ̧ nɛnɛ‘e: ‹Nɛ́ hegɔ a̧ Babilɔŋ tɛ tik nɛnɛ, n'aa beka kur ɓɔna, wen zu o ŋgamɔ n'am ba tɛnɛ mɛ pi̧ zu a̧'ɛ.› » «Tom ko o tugun bíí baa tɛ-wa.» Sɔŋkur wen ko Jeremii nɛ́ mɔ‘i.
KALATA_KO_DC_Gbaya: tɔ̧ nɛnɛ‘e: ‹Nɛ́ hegɔ a̧ Babilɔŋ tɛ tik nɛnɛ, n'aa beka kur ɓɔna, wen zu o ŋgamɔ n'am ba tɛnɛ mɛ pi̧ zu a̧'ɛ.› » «Tom ko o tugun bíí baa tɛ-wa.» Sɔŋkur wen ko Jeremii nɛ́ mɔ‘i.
Kapsiki_DC: Ma pa na sha tegeze: ‹Tsetse teza sebe te Babilone. Mba ŋkɛ katesate ŋkɛ te ŋkwa kwa sebe ta ndiremi nyi vaghe nyi Mahwətə kənə we.›» «Gəmə leɓe ghəa nci kweci hwelefefi.» Teke kiɗi ta ghena ta Zhɛrɛmi.
Tupurri: Blam äe ni ndo waçaç ge gano: Bii mañ ge yañ go ne Babilon ti do kay no so no, aà yaçaç ge go jag ree maga ndi a ge de äe ne hen ti gaa, aà gay ge ra go. Mona diñ tawge ti waçaçre mani Jermin wo so.

Francais: Sédécias était âgé de vingt et un ans lorsqu'il devint roi, et il régna onze ans à Jérusalem. Sa mère s'appelait Amital, fille de Jérémie, de Lobna.
Anglais: Zedekiah was one and twenty years old when he began to reign, and he reigned eleven years in Jerusalem. And his mother's name was Hamutal the daughter of Jeremiah of Libnah.
BIBALDA_TA_PELDETTA: Sedekiyas ka hiɗi busat dok-ma' yam kep hay li ma nam muɗ mulu. Nam ti mulda ir busat doogo yam kep hay Yerusalem. Sulum ya' Hamutal, goota vi Yeremiyas ma hay Libna.
Bulu: Sédékias a mbe mimbu mewôm mebaé a wua éyoñ a nga tebe njôô, a nga jôô mimbu awôm a wua Yérusalém. Nyia a mbe jôé na Hamutal, ngone Yérémi ya Libna.
Guiziga: Sedekiyas micifi buy madiɗa ngi Zuda na, naɓa naŋ tivi kukur cuw ngaŋ kaˀa. A gi vi kuruˀ ngaŋ kaˀ ar zumabuy a Zeruzaleme. A zilaka mumuŋ Hamutal, zuŋ ngi Irmeya, mbur ngi ruwuy Lipna.
Fulfulde_Adamaoua: Sedekiya woodi duuɓi noogas e go'o, saa'i o laamo. O laami haa Urusaliima duuɓi sappo e go'o. Innde daada maako Hamutal ɓii Yeremiya mo Libna.
Fulfulde_DC: Sedekiya woodi duuɓi noogas e go'o, saa'i o laamo. O laami haa Urusaliima duuɓi sappo e go'o. Innde daada maako Hamutal ɓii Yeremiya mo Libna.
KALATA_KO_SC_Gbaya: Sedesias a̧a̧ so nɛ̀ pɛ ɓu-yiitoo-zua-kpɔk ŋgimbi n'aa ɔɔ nɛ̀ wan kɔ̧-a̧, ɓɛɛ a̧ ɔ wan pɛ ɓu-zua-kpɔk sɛn Jerusalɛm; nin nàà kɔ̧-a̧ nɛ Hamutal, boko-bem ko Yirmɛya, be Libna.
KALATA_KO_DC_Gbaya: Sedesias a̧a̧ so nɛ̀ pɛ ɓu-yiitoo-zua-kpɔk ŋgimbi n'aa ɔɔ nɛ̀ wan kɔ̧-a̧, ɓɛɛ a̧ ɔ wan pɛ ɓu-zua-kpɔk sɛn Jerusalɛm; nin nàà kɔ̧-a̧ nɛ Hamutal, boko-bem ko Yirmɛya, be Libna.
Kapsiki_DC: Ma nda dzembe meghe Sɛdɛsiyas ne, bakemsə kwetɛŋeghəmbe va ta ŋkɛ. Va meŋe kwetɛŋeghəmbe menete ŋkɛ te meghe mbe Zhɛrəzalɛm. Haməwtal, wəzha ta Irmɛya nya kande Libna sləa meghekɛ.
Tupurri: Kiñgi Sedesiyas hay do äog ti boñ de maga aà kol ti wañ mono, se raw joñ wañ kiñgi hwal ti boñ äi leege Jerusalem. AÀ aà hay ëe man äe ga Hamutal may mani Jermi ma Libna no.

Francais: Il fit ce qui est mal aux yeux de Yahweh, imitant tout ce qu'avait fait Joakim.
Anglais: And he did that which was evil in the eyes of the  Lord , according to all that Jehoiakim had done.
BIBALDA_TA_PELDETTA: Nam li slen ma joo'o vok ir Ma-Vatɗina, ŋray ca ki Yoyakim li nala.
Bulu: A nga bo mam me nʼabé e mise me Nti, e mezene mese, avale Yôyakim a nga bo.
Guiziga: Sedekiyas a gi gwat ngi cira hiri ta da Bumbulvuŋ, rak rak ati Zoˀakim na ya.
Fulfulde_Adamaoua: O waɗi kalluɗum yeeso Jawmiraawo, kal-kal bana Yooyakim waɗno.
Fulfulde_DC: O waɗi kalluɗum yeeso Jawmiraawo, kal-kal bana Yooyakim waɗno.
KALATA_KO_SC_Gbaya: A̧ de mɔ nɛ̀ de tɛ GASA WAN na, hee mɔ'ɔ nɛ̀ Joakim dee so ga.
KALATA_KO_DC_Gbaya: A̧ de mɔ nɛ̀ de tɛ GASA WAN na, hee mɔ'ɔ nɛ̀ Joakim dee so ga.
Kapsiki_DC: Wəsə nya kehitema geva kwa kema ta Mahwətə yamenete Sɛdɛsiyas, kala nya menete Zhowakim.
Tupurri: Sedesiyas kal joñge diñ fen ma de älagge nen Manwuri, go ti feçeçren äuy doga Yehoyakim hay joñ no lay.

Francais: Cela arriva à Jérusalem et en Juda, à cause de la colère de Yahweh, jusqu'à ce qu'il les rejette de devant sa face. Et Sédécias se révolta contre le roi de Babylone.
Anglais: For through the anger of the  Lord  it came to pass in Jerusalem and Judah, till he had cast them out from his presence, that Zedekiah rebelled against the king of Babylon.
BIBALDA_TA_PELDETTA: Van kayni co'o kuɗ ɦiyda vi Ma-Vatɗina kat Yerusalem hiɗi Yuda, sa nam min noysi goyo vok iramu. Sedekiyas fok kulo'o kat mulla vi Babilon.
Bulu: Mame mana me nga kui amu ayaa Nti e nga yené Yérusalém a Yuda ngame yat, a kui a nga wua bʼôyab a asu dé. Ve Sédékias a nga ben éjôé njô bôte ya Babilôn.
Guiziga: Gwat migi a Zeruzalem waɗ a Zuda na, a slikiɗa mevel le da Bumbulvuŋ, mbak hã a pula mizli naŋhaya kileŋ ava. Sedekiyas a slikiɗ ɓi avu buy madiɗa ngi Babiloŋ.
Fulfulde_Adamaoua: Ɗum waɗi non ngam Jawmiraawo tikkani Urusaliima e Yahuuda haa o riiwi ɓe daayiiɗum bee maako. Sedekiya boo tuurtani laamiiɗo Baabila.
Fulfulde_DC: Ɗum waɗi non ngam Jawmiraawo tikkani Urusaliima e Yahuuda haa o riiwi ɓe daayiiɗum bee maako. Sedekiya boo tuurtani laamiiɗo Baabila.
KALATA_KO_SC_Gbaya: Mɔ nɛ̀ dee so sɛn Jerusalɛm in sɛn Juda a̧ŋa gasa nyimsea ko GASA WAN pi̧ ŋgɔn, ɓɛɛ a̧ a wa taŋ nɛ̀ nyɛi̧a-a. Duka, ɓɛɛ Sedesias kur zu wannu Babilɔŋ.
KALATA_KO_DC_Gbaya: Mɔ nɛ̀ dee so sɛn Jerusalɛm in sɛn Juda a̧ŋa gasa nyimsea ko GASA WAN pi̧ ŋgɔn, ɓɛɛ a̧ a wa taŋ nɛ̀ nyɛi̧a-a. Duka, ɓɛɛ Sedesias kur zu wannu Babilɔŋ.
Kapsiki_DC: Pa wəsə nya kemenete geva mbe yɛ Zhɛrəzalɛm le Zhəwda hwepete nda wənəa Mahwətə. Vatse neghamte mbelia ŋkɛ ŋkɛ cakeɗake le. Pa Sɛdɛsiyas ɗema ghena ta Nabəkodonozor, meghea ka Babilone.
Tupurri: Feçeçre sen joñ wo mo äuy na werga Manwur hay de soçoç äil ne Jerusalem wo de sir Juda ti haçaç kol go maga se tob ra wo go haçaç see äe. Sedesiyas raw joñ ti grañ go se wañ Babilone.

Francais: La neuvième année du règne de Sédécias, le dixième mois, le dixième jour du mois, Nabuchodonosor, roi de Babylone, vint avec toute son armée contre Jérusalem; ils campèrent devant elle et construisirent tout autour des murs d'approche.
Anglais: And it came to pass in the ninth year of his reign, in the tenth month, in the tenth day of the month, that Nebuchadrezzar king of Babylon came, he and all his army, against Jerusalem, and pitched against it, and built forts against it round about.
BIBALDA_TA_PELDETTA: Co hay buurta doogota vi til ma doogona vi busata zleeŋeta vi mulda vi Sedekiyas kayni, Nebukadnesar mul ma Babilon co hiɗi sojena valam kafe kay dur Yerusalem, nisi vi kaŋŋa visi goy voro, nisi ŋuy zlaɓn tam Yerusalem.
Bulu: Mbu ébulu ya njôane wé, ngon awômô é too melu awôm, Nébukatnétzar, njô bôte ya Babilôn, a nga zu a nkane mewosane wé a wosane nye; be nga vule minkan ôsu vié, be nga lôñ alem e bômaʼane nye.
Guiziga: Hin kuruˀ ngi kiya mukuruˀ naŋ ngi vi mungoltir naŋ, Sedekiyas mazum buyo, Nabukodonozor, buy madiɗa ngi Babiloŋ a ndiloko ati soje naŋhay gar, a pam sar akẽh ti guɗuk taŋhay a mbuŋ walahay Zeruzaleme, waɗ a slikiɗaka muyuŋ purtaˀ purtaˀ ɗingir gun hirnga Zeruzaleme.
Fulfulde_Adamaoua: Nder nduuɓu laamu Sedekiya njoweenayaɓu, nder lewru sappooru, nyalaade sappo maaru, Nabukodonosor wardi bee jama'aare konu muuɗum fuu, ɓe mbaɗi saŋngeere maɓɓe yeeso berniwol, ɓe mbaagi lesdi, ɓe taari berniwol Urusaliima ngam hippaago ngol .
Fulfulde_DC: Nder nduuɓu laamu Sedekiya njoweenayaɓu, nder lewru sappooru, nyalaade sappo maaru, Nabukodonosor wardi bee jama'aare konu muuɗum fuu, ɓe mbaɗi saŋngeere maɓɓe yeeso berniwol, ɓe mbaagi lesdi, ɓe taari berniwol Urusaliima ngam hippaago ngol .
KALATA_KO_SC_Gbaya: Tɛ mɔɔrɔ-ɗoŋ-naar pɛ-wan ko Sedesias, tɛ ɓu fio-zɛ, tɛ ɓu ɔɔ-zɛ, Nabukɔdɔnɔsɔr wannu Babilɔŋ hɔɔ nú Jerusalɛm, a̧ in o gíí wi-biro kɔ̧-a̧ lɛŋ. Wa baa fara nú ye Jerusalɛm, ɓɛɛ wa mbo mɔ zik nɛnɛ.
KALATA_KO_DC_Gbaya: Tɛ mɔɔrɔ-ɗoŋ-naar pɛ-wan ko Sedesias, tɛ ɓu fio-zɛ, tɛ ɓu ɔɔ-zɛ, Nabukɔdɔnɔsɔr wannu Babilɔŋ hɔɔ nú Jerusalɛm, a̧ in o gíí wi-biro kɔ̧-a̧ lɛŋ. Wa baa fara nú ye Jerusalɛm, ɓɛɛ wa mbo mɔ zik nɛnɛ.
Kapsiki_DC: Tagha gɛ, mpəɗə Nabəkodonozor senyɛ le ka sewajɛa ŋkɛ pɛtɛ kaɗa Zhɛrəzalɛm. Pa ka sewajɛa ŋkɛ menete ghedəkwəa nci kwa kema ta meleme ba'a late ki dzeyi yite. Te kwa mesli ta va ta Sɛdɛsiyas te meghe, te kwa meŋe ta tere, te kwa meŋe ta hɛ menete geva ŋkɛ.
Tupurri: Nen kiñgi ma de hwal maga se ti wañ mono, nen naw ma de hwal nen few ma de hwaln mono, Nebukanetsar wañ Babilon raw age de sode äen äuy dur Jerusalem. Saara raw kañge ne hen jage day raw wo teer tu go ti äe äuy ma hulgi durgi äe.

Francais: La ville fut assiégée jusqu'à la onzième année du roi Sédécias.
Anglais: So the city was besieged unto the eleventh year of king Zedekiah.
BIBALDA_TA_PELDETTA: Nisi ŋuy hoyok-ziyna ta-ta hay busata doogo yam kepta vi mulla Sedekiyas.
Bulu: Tison é mbe ndilane bita a kui mbu awôm a wua njô bôte Sédékias a nga jôô.
Guiziga: A ndahaka walahaya hã vi kuruˀ ngaŋ kaˀ ngi Sedekiyas mazum buyo.
Fulfulde_Adamaoua: Berniwol ngo'ol hippaama haa yotti nduuɓu laamiiɗo Sedekiya sappo e go'oowu.
Fulfulde_DC: Berniwol ngo'ol hippaama haa yotti nduuɓu laamiiɗo Sedekiya sappo e go'oowu.
KALATA_KO_SC_Gbaya: Wa kpee ye'i e nù tɛ pɛ ɓu-zua-kpɔk tɛ ŋgimbi-wan ko wannu Sedesias.
KALATA_KO_DC_Gbaya: Wa kpee ye'i e nù tɛ pɛ ɓu-zua-kpɔk tɛ ŋgimbi-wan ko wannu Sedesias.
Kapsiki_DC: Nahe mpa shɛ ketemə pa te kwa meŋe kwetɛŋeghəmbe ta va ta Sɛdɛsiyas mbe meghe.
Tupurri: Saara kañ ne äi leege jag go de cir ti äe haçaç wo go nen kiñgi ma de hwal ti boñ mani wañ Sedesiyas no.

Francais: Au quatrième mois, le neuvième jour du mois, comme la famine était grande dans la ville, et qu'il n'y avait plus de pain pour le peuple du pays,
Anglais: And in the fourth month, in the ninth day of the month, the famine was sore in the city, so that there was no bread for the people of the land.
BIBALDA_TA_PELDETTA: Co hay buurta zleeŋeta vi til ma fiɗin kayni, mayt li dono'o hay hoyok-ziyna, fun ma sum sa hay nagat tumna muɗ may loɗi.
Bulu: Ngone nyini é too melu ébu, mfumbale zaé a too ngu e tison été, bidi bi jembaʼane fe asu bôte ya ngume si,
Guiziga: Angi hin ngoltir ngi kiya mumufaɗ naŋ na, may a bul vu le culok ar walahaya, ko misi zlili ngisi ruwuyoy kwana, gwat ngi zum anta avu taŋ mata.
Fulfulde_Adamaoua: Nyannde joweenayaɓre nder lewru nayaɓru, weelo saatuŋgo waɗi nder berniwol. Ummaatoore walaa ko nyaame.
Fulfulde_DC: Nyannde joweenayaɓre nder lewru nayaɓru, weelo saatuŋgo waɗi nder berniwol. Ummaatoore walaa ko nyaame.
KALATA_KO_SC_Gbaya: Tɛ mɔɔrɔ-ɗoŋ-naar ɔɔ-zɛ, tɛ naar fio-zɛ, ŋgimbi'i gasa kaɓa a̧a̧ so saaye'i, nɛ̀ o wanmbɔi mbɛt bo so nɛ̀ nyɔŋmɔ ɓɔna; tɛ mɔɔrɔ-ɗoŋ-naar ɔɔ-zɛ, tɛ naar fio-zɛ tɛ pɛ‘i,
KALATA_KO_DC_Gbaya: Tɛ mɔɔrɔ-ɗoŋ-naar ɔɔ-zɛ, tɛ naar fio-zɛ, ŋgimbi'i gasa kaɓa a̧a̧ so saaye'i, nɛ̀ o wanmbɔi mbɛt bo so nɛ̀ nyɔŋmɔ ɓɔna; tɛ mɔɔrɔ-ɗoŋ-naar ɔɔ-zɛ, tɛ naar fio-zɛ tɛ pɛ‘i,
Kapsiki_DC: Pa ma menete geva dzawe mbe Zhɛrəzalɛm, wəsə shɛ mba kazeme mbeli we. Te kwa mesli ta hɛ mbe tere kwa wəfaɗe ne,
Tupurri: Nen naw ma de kaawa' nen few ma de naan de maga koñne de haç puçuçri ne äi leege no day jar ma äil sirn bay wo da' reege wa lay mono,

Francais: une brèche fut faite à la ville, et tous les gens de guerre s'enfuirent et sortirent de la ville pendant la nuit, par la porte entre les deux murs, près du jardin du roi, pendant que les Chaldéens environnaient la ville, et ils prirent le chemin de la plaine.
Anglais: Then the city was broken up, and all the men of war fled, and went forth out of the city by night by the way of the gate between the two walls, which was by the king's garden; (now the Chaldeans were by the city round about:) and they went by the way of the plain.
BIBALDA_TA_PELDETTA: Ki kayn nala nisi co ir gulmunna vi hoyok-ziyna, sum sa wi duur kaf pir jaŋi, nisi cuk goy hay hoyok-ziyn henjeta, jik hay hagata vi vun-galana jar gulmun ma ma'na goboy hiɗi jardeŋŋa vi mulla, kayni hay li ma hoyok-ziyn ka ŋuyi kay sa Kaldeena. Nisi sli hagata ta hay beɗna.
Bulu: zen é nga yombô tison; nde bôte mewosan bese be nga tup a kôlô tison alu, be lôtôk e zen é ne mbé , zañe mimfin mibaé, bebé afube njô bôt, Bekaldééñ ki be bômaʼane tison. Be nga ke zene yʼAraba.
Guiziga: Akẽh na, mizli Babiloŋhoy a slinaka moholo ngi walahaya njoŋ. Ko walahay i mindaha hirnga naŋ le ndah tekeɗe kwana, ngi duvuɗo, migi vurum ngi Zudahay a kilam pay tir walahaya, a bam tir mizlingre misi ar wala ngi moholoy cuw, migweˀ avu jarne ngi buy na, a zuɓam jiviɗ maru ng'ar sozo Zurdeŋ.
Fulfulde_Adamaoua: Kaldiya'en cumpiti mahol berniwol. Nde jemma waɗi, jama'aare konu Yahuuda fuu doggi. Koo nde Kaldiya'en ɗon taari Urusaliima, ɓe caali gal dammugal gonŋgal hakkunde mahi ɗiɗi, ɗakki jarne laamiiɗo. Nden laamiiɗo Sedekiya tokki laawol gal waadiwol Urdun .
Fulfulde_DC: Kaldiya'en cumpiti mahol berniwol. Nde jemma waɗi, jama'aare konu Yahuuda fuu doggi. Koo nde Kaldiya'en ɗon taari Urusaliima, ɓe caali gal dammugal gonŋgal hakkunde mahi ɗiɗi, ɗakki jarne laamiiɗo. Nden laamiiɗo Sedekiya tokki laawol gal waadiwol Urdun .
KALATA_KO_SC_Gbaya: garo mbaŋa, ɓɛɛ o wi-biro lɛŋ yu mɔ yak saaye mɛ zɛ nɛ̀ nú garo mgbara ŋgeŋ yiitoo, mgbák ka̧ be fɔ ko wannu, ká o be Kaldee a̧ pɛm so kànà mɔ zik ye'i, ɓɛɛ wa ba yuwar si nú Jurdɛn.
KALATA_KO_DC_Gbaya: garo mbaŋa, ɓɛɛ o wi-biro lɛŋ yu mɔ yak saaye mɛ zɛ nɛ̀ nú garo mgbara ŋgeŋ yiitoo, mgbák ka̧ be fɔ ko wannu, ká o be Kaldee a̧ pɛm so kànà mɔ zik ye'i, ɓɛɛ wa ba yuwar si nú Jurdɛn.
Kapsiki_DC: mpahwe ka Babilone ntsate wəfela te zli nya yitea meleme. Ma heviɗi ne, pɛtɛ ka sewajɛa ka Zhəwda hwɛnji. Mba ka Babilone dzasle yitea Zhɛrəzalɛm. Ya tsagha shɛnyɛ ŋkɛ ne, kweracɛ ka sewajɛ hwɛnji shave mbe meleme laka mɛ degha nya te zli, nya takwa yitea ntsa ta meghe. Cape hɛ kwa hweŋkwa nya kedzawa laka zlərəa Zhəwrdɛŋe.
Tupurri: aè raw nduu kor ma ti äi leegen go. Soden wo äuy raw wo dañge, men wo äi leegen go, laa wo go de suñ ti faage ma ti holañ kor ma äog ma ti jeñ pay sugnee mani wañ no. De sen ni jar Kalde hay wo go de cir ti äi leegen lay. Jar maga laa wo go raw wo mañ faage maga le' wo äil Araban mono.

Francais: Mais l'armée des chaldéens poursuivit le roi; ils atteignirent Sédécias dans les plaines de Jéricho, et toute son armée se dispersa loin de lui.
Anglais: But the army of the Chaldeans pursued after the king, and overtook Zedekiah in the plains of Jericho; and all his army was scattered from him.
BIBALDA_TA_PELDETTA: May sojena vi sa Kaldeena jaŋ kuɗ mulla Sedekiyas, nisi fum hay liy ma beɗna vi Yeriko; sojena valam sa kuɗumna mun goy talam jaŋi.
Bulu: Ve nkane bita Bekaldééñ ô nga tôñe njô bôt a koone Sédékias minjeʼese ya Yérikô, a nkane bita wé ôse ô nga mialan a ke nye ôyap.
Guiziga: Amma soje Babiloŋhoy a gidiɗaka taŋ, ara jaka is da buy Sedekiyas ar li micay a Zeriko. Soje naŋhay a zliɗam hirnga mber mber, a pulakaŋ ɗoɗok.
Fulfulde_Adamaoua: Ammaa jama'aaje konu Kaldiya'en taasni mo, njokki mo haa yayre kommbi Yeriko. Jama'aare konu maako fuu saŋkiti, acci mo.
Fulfulde_DC: Ammaa jama'aaje konu Kaldiya'en taasni mo, njokki mo haa yayre kommbi Yeriko. Jama'aare konu maako fuu saŋkiti, acci mo.
KALATA_KO_SC_Gbaya: O wi-biro Kaldee ndaka pata wannu Sedesias, ɓɛɛ nɛ́ɛ̀ kpa a̧ sɛn bɔkɔ-nù Jeriko mɛ. O wi-biro kɔ̧-a̧ lɛŋ yuu mɔ yak e a̧ duk.
KALATA_KO_DC_Gbaya: O wi-biro Kaldee ndaka pata wannu Sedesias, ɓɛɛ nɛ́ɛ̀ kpa a̧ sɛn bɔkɔ-nù Jeriko mɛ. O wi-biro kɔ̧-a̧ lɛŋ yuu mɔ yak e a̧ duk.
Kapsiki_DC: Ama pa ka sewajɛa ka Babilone kekate meghe Sɛdɛsiyas ba'a keseve ŋkɛ te ŋwela ta Zhɛriko. Pɛtɛa ka sewajɛa ŋkɛ kehwɛnji yite.
Tupurri: Ama sode mani jar Kalden raw wo mañ blam wañ niigi, wo wo ba Sedesiyas äil fuul ma Jeriko no. Jar durgi ma Jerusalem raw wo dus äil go.

Francais: Ayant saisi roi, ils le firent monter vers le roi de Babylone, à Rébla, dans le pays de d'Emath, et il prononça sur lui des sentences.
Anglais: Then they took the king, and carried him up unto the king of Babylon to Riblah in the land of Hamath; where he gave judgment upon him.
BIBALDA_TA_PELDETTA: Nisi vi Sedekiyas, tuɗum kulo kat mulla vi Babilon hay Ribla, hay nagata vi Hamat, ɗawni nisi ka kitat kalamu.
Bulu: Be nga bi njô bôt a kee nye be njô bôte ya Babilôn e Ribla e si ya Hamat; a a nga tyiʼi nye ajô.
Guiziga: Mizli Babiloŋhoy a jaka Sedekiyasa, a ram di da buy madiɗa ngi Babiloŋ a Ribla, hirwuy Hamat, dar buy a ɓaŋ ɓi ngi gwat naŋ mujuwa a mevele ngi gaŋ di gar.
Fulfulde_Adamaoua: Ɓe naŋngi laamiiɗo, ɓe njahri mo yeeso laamiiɗo Baabila, haa Ribla nder lesdi Hamat. Ton ɓe kiiti mo.
Fulfulde_DC: Ɓe naŋngi laamiiɗo, ɓe njahri mo yeeso laamiiɗo Baabila, haa Ribla nder lesdi Hamat. Ton ɓe kiiti mo.
KALATA_KO_SC_Gbaya: O be Kaldee baa a̧, ɓɛɛ fo a̧ daŋnɛ si Ribla nú Hamat, ha̧ wannu Babilɔŋ mɛ́ tɔ̧ sɔŋkur wen zu a̧.
KALATA_KO_DC_Gbaya: O be Kaldee baa a̧, ɓɛɛ fo a̧ daŋnɛ si Ribla nú Hamat, ha̧ wannu Babilɔŋ mɛ́ tɔ̧ sɔŋkur wen zu a̧.
Kapsiki_DC: Hecape ka Babilone keseve meghe Sɛdɛsiyas kamava ba'a keleghe nda ke meghea ka Babilone mbe Ribla, te hɛɗia Hamat. Tagha mehate ghwə ta meghe Sɛdɛsiyas ŋkɛ.
Tupurri: Saara raw ba wañ, kal wo woge de äe see wañ Babilon wo äi leege Ribla ti sir Hamade. Se raw cag ree äe go ni.

Francais: Le roi de Babylone égorgea les fils de Sédécias sous les yeux de leur père; il égorgea aussi tous les chefs de Juda à Rébla.
Anglais: And the king of Babylon slew the sons of Zedekiah before his eyes: he slew also all the princes of Judah in Riblah.
BIBALDA_TA_PELDETTA: Mulla vi Babilon ŋat gurona vi Sedekiyas goyo hay li ma nam ka wisi hiɗi iramu; sa ŋulona vi Yuda kaf kaw nam ŋatsi goyo hay Ribla.
Bulu: Njô bôte ya Babilôn a nga bo na be wôé bone be Sédékias émien a lôô; avale te fe a nga bo bivete ya Yuda e Ribla.
Guiziga: Buy Babiloŋ a slaˀay ngi ziri mizile ngi Sedekiyasay a mihiri cine taŋ vuna si. Yo a sla ˀay ngi migi slra ngi Zudahaya cek a Ribla vuna ma.
Fulfulde_Adamaoua: Laamiiɗo Baabila umri hirsugo ɓiɓɓe Sedekiya yeeso maako. O umri hirsugo mawɓe Yahuuda boo.
Fulfulde_DC: Laamiiɗo Baabila umri hirsugo ɓiɓɓe Sedekiya yeeso maako. O umri hirsugo mawɓe Yahuuda boo.
KALATA_KO_SC_Gbaya: Wannu Babilɔŋ gɔna ger o bem ko Sedesias nɛ̀ gbaayí-a, ɓɛɛ a̧ gɔn ger o mɔ-geŋa Juda lɛŋ sɛn Ribla mbɛt.
KALATA_KO_DC_Gbaya: Wannu Babilɔŋ gɔna ger o bem ko Sedesias nɛ̀ gbaayí-a, ɓɛɛ a̧ gɔn ger o mɔ-geŋa Juda lɛŋ sɛn Ribla mbɛt.
Kapsiki_DC: Mbe Ribla shɛ mpəmte ŋwalea Sɛdɛsiyas ŋkɛ kwa ntsə ta yiteyɛa nci, tsagha mbeli nyi te ghə mbe Zhəwda pɛtɛ.
Tupurri: Wañ Babilon raw ngaë jar ni Sedesiyas wo go nen äe ni, ngaë minisdir ma Judan wo go Ribla ni lay.

Francais: Puis il creva les yeux à Sédécias et le lia avec deux chaînes d'airain; et le roi de Babylone le mena à Babylone, et le tint en prison jusqu'au jour de sa mort.
Anglais: Then he put out the eyes of Zedekiah; and the king of Babylon bound him in chains, and carried him to Babylon, and put him in prison till the day of his death.
BIBALDA_TA_PELDETTA: Bugolda nam vul hagata, nisi co ir Ezekiyas goyo, nisi junum hiɗi jaɓ ma kawayna, mulla vi Babilon kalam hay babilon, gum daŋgaya ta-ta hay buur ma mitta valamu.
Bulu: Wôna a nga bo na be tube Sédékias mis a bo na be kaʼa nye a bengôkob be mvot. Njô bôte ya Babilôn a nga kee nye Babilôn a futi nye mimbôk a kui môs a nga wu.
Guiziga: A dirba nah, buy a ɓi a nduzoko hiri ngi Sedekiyasaya cuw taŋ, waɗ a juwakaŋ ti celelu ngi ɓiri gaza ngiriɗ ngiriɗ hiri cuw. Buy a ɓa mizli, a ram di nga Babiloŋ, aka kaŋ ar dangay, hã a muc wãˀ araŋ.
Fulfulde_Adamaoua: Nden o umri ɓe ɗoofa gite Sedekiya, ɓe kaɓɓa mo bee callalluuji njamndi mboɗeeri. Ton Sedekiya jooɗi haa suudu daŋngay haa nyalaade nde o maayi .
Fulfulde_DC: Nden o umri ɓe ɗoofa gite Sedekiya, ɓe kaɓɓa mo bee callalluuji njamndi mboɗeeri. Ton Sedekiya jooɗi haa suudu daŋngay haa nyalaade nde o maayi .
KALATA_KO_SC_Gbaya: Hɔ-ɗoŋ-aa, a̧ oo yí Sedesias, ɓɛɛ a̧ hɛr a̧ nɛ̀ nyak-ndɛrɛ gbam ŋmaa yiitoo. Wannu Babilɔŋ baa a̧ si Babilɔŋ, ɓɛɛ a̧ pi̧ a̧ kɔ̧́ zɔɓɔ hɔ ŋgimbi fio kɔ̧-a̧.
KALATA_KO_DC_Gbaya: Hɔ-ɗoŋ-aa, a̧ oo yí Sedesias, ɓɛɛ a̧ hɛr a̧ nɛ̀ nyak-ndɛrɛ gbam ŋmaa yiitoo. Wannu Babilɔŋ baa a̧ si Babilɔŋ, ɓɛɛ a̧ pi̧ a̧ kɔ̧́ zɔɓɔ hɔ ŋgimbi fio kɔ̧-a̧.
Kapsiki_DC: Kwa sebe ta ŋkɛ, mpahwe mpahwe ŋkɛ ntsamte ntsə kwa ghə va Sɛdɛsiyas ba'a hwepete le zewe lɛ mze kwa ghwə ghwə. Tagha gɛ, laŋe ŋkɛ te kadzeme Babilone, fɛke ŋkɛ shɛ kwa daŋgayɛ pa te mte ta ŋkɛ.
Tupurri: Blam äe se raw äeer nen Sedesiyas wo go, kal bañge äe de rece' boo dob ma nen äoge. Wañ Babilon raw rawge de äe Babilone, äo'n ti dañgay haçaç se hu wo go ni.

Francais: Le cinquième mois, le dixième jour du mois, - c'était la dix-neuvième année du règne de Nabuchodonosor, roi de Babylone, - Nabuzardan, capitaine des gardes, qui était ministre du roi de Babylone, vint à Jérusalem.
Anglais: Now in the fifth month, in the tenth day of the month, which was the nineteenth year of Nebuchadrezzar king of Babylon, came Nebuzar–adan, captain of the guard, which served the king of Babylon, into Jerusalem,
BIBALDA_TA_PELDETTA: Hay buurta doogota vi til ma vaslna, kayni hay busata doogo yam zleeŋeta vi mulda vi Nebukadnesar mulla vi Babilon, Nebuzaradan ma ŋolla vi sa ŋomda, ma ka sun mulla hay Babilon, nam co kulo hay Yerusalem.
Bulu: Ngone tane é too melu awôm, mame ya mbu awôm a ébulu Nébukatnétzar, njô bôte ya Babilôn a nga jôô, ñwô Nébuzaradañ, évete bezimbi ja saane njô bôte ya Babilôn, a nga zu Yérusalém.
Guiziga: Hin kuruˀ ngi kiya muzlum naŋ ngi vi mukuruˀ nga ngoltir naŋ ngi Nabukodonozor mazum buy a Babiloŋ na, Nebuzaradaŋ madiɗa ngi mijigina buyoyo, i mbur migweˀ ng'avu buy madiɗa ngi Babiloŋ, a ndilo a Zeruzaleme.
Fulfulde_Adamaoua: Nder nduuɓu laamu Nabukodonosor, laamiiɗo Baabila, sappo e njoweenayaɓu, nyannde sappoore maaru nder lewru jowaɓru, Nebuzaradan, hooreejo aynooɓe laamiiɗo Baabila nasti Urusaliima.
Fulfulde_DC: Nder nduuɓu laamu Nabukodonosor, laamiiɗo Baabila, sappo e njoweenayaɓu, nyannde sappoore maaru nder lewru jowaɓru, Nebuzaradan, hooreejo aynooɓe laamiiɗo Baabila nasti Urusaliima.
KALATA_KO_SC_Gbaya: Tɛ ɓu ɔɔ-zɛ, tɛ mɔɔrɔ fio-zɛ, tɛ ɓu-zua-mɔɔrɔ-ɗoŋ-naar pɛ-wan ko Nabukɔdɔnɔsɔr, wannu Babilɔŋ, Nɛbuzaradaŋ gasawi zu o wi-pɛm-wannu nɛ̀ yá ɓɔn mgbák katɛ wannu hɔɔ sɛn Jerusalɛm.
KALATA_KO_DC_Gbaya: Tɛ ɓu ɔɔ-zɛ, tɛ mɔɔrɔ fio-zɛ, tɛ ɓu-zua-mɔɔrɔ-ɗoŋ-naar pɛ-wan ko Nabukɔdɔnɔsɔr, wannu Babilɔŋ, Nɛbuzaradaŋ gasawi zu o wi-pɛm-wannu nɛ̀ yá ɓɔn mgbák katɛ wannu hɔɔ sɛn Jerusalɛm.
Kapsiki_DC: Te kwa meŋe meslighəmbe ta va ta Nabəkodonozor mbe meghe, le hɛ meŋe mbe tere kwa mcɛfe ne, shilimə Nebəwzaradan mbe Zhɛrəzalɛm. Gheŋkɛ ya te ghəa ka sewajɛ nyi keya meghea ka Babilone, kwete ŋkɛ hwa mbelia jama nyi yite.
Tupurri: Nen naw ma de hwal nen few ma de dween ga hay diñ kiñgi ma de hwal ti kaawa' ga Nebukanetsar wañ Babilon ti wañ mono, Nebusaradan wañ sode maga hay joñ peele ne wañ Babilon raw age Jerusalem.

Francais: Il brûla la maison de Yahweh, la maison du roi, et toutes les maisons de Jérusalem; il livra au feu toutes les grandes maisons.
Anglais: And burned the house of the  Lord , and the king's house; and all the houses of Jerusalem, and all the houses of the great men, burned he with fire:
BIBALDA_TA_PELDETTA: Nam ŋal ziyda vi Ma-Vatɗin goyo, nam ŋal ziyda vi mulla goyo, nam ŋal ziy ma hay Yerusalem kaf goyo, ziy ma ir ŋaan kaf nam ŋalam goy hiɗi kuta.
Bulu: A nga diʼi Nda Nti, nda njô bôt a menda mese ya Yérusalém; jaʼane beta nda ase, a nga diʼi je nduan.
Guiziga: A ɗuva vu da hay ngi Bumbulvuŋ, da hay ngi buyo waɗ da hay ngir walahay Zeruzalemeye gar, wãˀ naŋ na hay ngi mizli madiɗa madiɗa ngir walahaya.
Fulfulde_Adamaoua: O wuli haykaliiru Jawmiraawo e saare laamu e cuuɗi Urusaliima e cuuɗi mawɓe fuu .
Fulfulde_DC: O wuli haykaliiru Jawmiraawo e saare laamu e cuuɗi Urusaliima e cuuɗi mawɓe fuu .
KALATA_KO_SC_Gbaya: A̧ pi̧i̧ wee tɛ Tua ko Sɔ̧, in tɛ tua ko wannu gú nɛ̀ o tua sɛn saaye lɛŋ, gana gan o tua ko o gasawi Jerusalɛm.
KALATA_KO_DC_Gbaya: A̧ pi̧i̧ wee tɛ Tua ko Sɔ̧, in tɛ tua ko wannu gú nɛ̀ o tua sɛn saaye lɛŋ, gana gan o tua ko o gasawi Jerusalɛm.
Kapsiki_DC: Dəvə ŋkɛ sha ghwə yitea ghɛa Mahwətə, ŋa meghea ka Zhəwda, tsagha ghɛ nyi mbe Zhɛrəzalɛm pɛtɛ, halama ŋa mbelia jama nyi kemene slene.
Tupurri: Se raw roë tiñ mani Manwurn go, roë tiñ mani wañn wo go de tiñ ma Jerusalemn wo äuy. Se hee wuu go ne tiñ ma honla äuy maga se da' we de el ka' mo äuy no.

Francais: Toute l'armée des chaldéens qui était avec le capitaine des gardes démolit les murailles formant l'enceinte de Jérusalem.
Anglais: And all the army of the Chaldeans, that were with the captain of the guard, brake down all the walls of Jerusalem round about.
BIBALDA_TA_PELDETTA: Sojena vi sa Kaldeen kaf sa ay hiɗi ma ŋolla vi sa ŋomda, nisi ɦo gulmun ma ŋuyi tam Yerusalemna gaa kafe.
Bulu: Nkane bita Bekaldééñ ôse ô mbe a évete bezimbi, ô nga mane tyame mimfine mise mi nga bômane Yérusalém.
Guiziga: Soje ngi Babiloŋhoy miki saka madiɗa ngi mijigina buyoy tuwa na, a wahaka mohol ngi Zeruzaleme rip rip, gun gun gar.
Fulfulde_Adamaoua: Jama'aare konu Kaldiya'en fuu e hooreejo aynooɓe ngibbini mahi taariiɗi Urusaliima.
Fulfulde_DC: Jama'aare konu Kaldiya'en fuu e hooreejo aynooɓe ngibbini mahi taariiɗi Urusaliima.
KALATA_KO_SC_Gbaya: War ko o garo Jerusalɛm, o wi-biro ko o be Kaldee gbina a nù lɛŋ sɛn ɗɔɔ  ha̧a̧nú  ko gasawi ko o wi-pɛm-wannu.
KALATA_KO_DC_Gbaya: War ko o garo Jerusalɛm, o wi-biro ko o be Kaldee gbina a nù lɛŋ sɛn ɗɔɔ  ha̧a̧nú  ko gasawi ko o wi-pɛm-wannu.
Kapsiki_DC: Pa ka sewajɛa ka Babilone mpəate zli nya yitea Zhɛrəzalɛm te hɛɗi.
Tupurri: Sode mani jar Kalde maga hay wo wer wañ soden ni äuy raw wo plaw kor ma ti Jerusalem go äuy.

Francais: Nabuzardan, capitaine des gardes, emmena captifs une partie des plus pauvres du peuple, avec le reste du peuple qui était demeuré dans la ville, les transfuges qui s'étaient rendus au roi de Babylone, et le reste des artisans.
Anglais: Then Nebuzar–adan the captain of the guard carried away captive certain of the poor of the people, and the residue of the people that remained in the city, and those that fell away, that fell to the king of Babylon, and the rest of the multitude.
BIBALDA_TA_PELDETTA: Nebuzaradan, ma ŋolla vi sa ŋomda, kal galla vi sum sa hawna goy gorvo'o, caw sum sa hin kulo hay hoyok-ziyna, sum sa vul tuwsi mi mulla vi Babilon, hiɗi dir sumuna sa hin dak-dakŋa kaw.
Bulu: Nébuzaradañ, évete bezimbi, a nga kee awutuk a mebukaʼa me bôt me nga liʼi Yérusalém, ba be nga ke ngame njô bôte ya Babilôn, a mebukaʼa me bôt ba tiñe biôm.
Guiziga: Mizli mizlew ngir walahaya, mbiɗeˀvra mizli mindiram zleˀe ar walahay aruŋ, mira lumaka buy madiɗa ngi Babiloŋ waɗ is ngi mizli misina gi gwatay, Nebuzaradaŋ madiɗa ngi mijigina buyoyo, a ja taŋ nga Babiloŋ ma.
Fulfulde_Adamaoua: Yimɓe luttuɓe, waato laafuɓe e luttuɓe nder berniwol, hawtanɓe laamiiɗo Baabila e waɗooɓe sanaa'a luttuɓe, Nebuzaradan, hooreejo aynooɓe dahi ɓe.
Fulfulde_DC: Yimɓe luttuɓe, waato laafuɓe e luttuɓe nder berniwol, hawtanɓe laamiiɗo Baabila e waɗooɓe sanaa'a luttuɓe, Nebuzaradan, hooreejo aynooɓe dahi ɓe.
KALATA_KO_SC_Gbaya: Nɛbuzaradaŋ gasawi zu o wi-pɛm-wannu kaia o wanmbɔi nɛ̀ ɓɔna so saaye'i, o wi nɛ̀ yuu so mɔ si ɗoŋ wannu Babilɔŋ in o oi wi-iŋ tom-de-nɛ-er nɛtɛ nɛtɛ yaknɛ nɛ̀ bara-biro.
KALATA_KO_DC_Gbaya: Nɛbuzaradaŋ gasawi zu o wi-pɛm-wannu kaia o wanmbɔi nɛ̀ ɓɔna so saaye'i, o wi nɛ̀ yuu so mɔ si ɗoŋ wannu Babilɔŋ in o oi wi-iŋ tom-de-nɛ-er nɛtɛ nɛtɛ yaknɛ nɛ̀ bara-biro.
Kapsiki_DC: Kwa sebe ta ŋkɛ, pa Nebəwzaradan fəhwe mbeli nyi ketene mbe meleme: kweci ka titikwəa kɛfi, mbeli nyi kendeke nde ghəa nci ke meghea ka Babilone ba'a ka ɗepe mene wəshi nyi ketene.
Tupurri: Nebusaradan wañ soden raw hooge see jar coo ma yoo jarn wo, hoo jar maga hay gwa' wo äi leege ni, hoo jar maga hay kol wo go wer wañ Babilon de jar joñre maga hay gwa' wo mono, raw de äaara.

Francais: Mais Nabuzardan, capitaine des gardes, laissa comme vignerons et comme laboureurs quelques-uns des pauvres du pays.
Anglais: But Nebuzar–adan the captain of the guard left certain of the poor of the land for vinedressers and for husbandmen.
BIBALDA_TA_PELDETTA: Hiɗi kayni kaf nam hin sum sa haw co'-co'na hay nagata, Nebuzaradan hin sa hawna kulo hay hoyok-ziyna kay nisi ma pi gulda-guldana, zumumu kaw.
Bulu: Ve da, Nébuzaradañ, évete bezimbi, a nga liʼi bevoʼo ya Yuda be mbe nsamba bedañ azoé, be liʼi be too bekôme mindiʼi mi woon a bebo mefup.
Guiziga: Amma a pul misi murga ngi raˀahaya le cah, ɓa ngi huva si virzi ngi widis ngi zumoy waɗ guvahay.
Fulfulde_Adamaoua: Ammaa o acci laafuɓe woɗɓe nder lesdi haa ɓe laato remooɓe inabooje e gese.
Fulfulde_DC: Ammaa o acci laafuɓe woɗɓe nder lesdi haa ɓe laato remooɓe inabooje e gese.
KALATA_KO_SC_Gbaya: Ɓɛɛ a̧ e oi o ŋma géé bíí ɓɔn hi̧i̧ mɛ wa o fɔ-nyak-dɔ̧ɔ̧ in o ŋma fɔ mbɛt.
KALATA_KO_DC_Gbaya: Ɓɛɛ a̧ e oi o ŋma géé bíí ɓɔn hi̧i̧ mɛ wa o fɔ-nyak-dɔ̧ɔ̧ in o ŋma fɔ mbɛt.
Kapsiki_DC: Ama pa sərəakɛ kweci ka titikwəa kɛfi kezha wəza wəvea rɛzɛŋe ba'a kweci wəve.
Tupurri: Ane Nebusaradan wañ soden raw haç faage ne blamkaçaçra ma äil sir ni ga aà mo gwa' wo diñ jar peë tlalum wo de jar jeeëge wo.

Francais: Les Chaldéens brisèrent les colonnes d'airain qui appartenaient à la maison de Yahweh, ainsi que les bases et la mer d'airain qui étaient dans la maison de Yahweh, et ils en emportèrent l'airain à Babylone.
Anglais: Also the pillars of brass that were in the house of the  Lord , and the bases, and the brasen sea that was in the house of the  Lord , the Chaldeans brake, and carried all the brass of them to Babylon.
BIBALDA_TA_PELDETTA: Dolla ma kawayna ma ka hay ziyda vi Ma-Vatɗina sum sa Kaldeena kusum gaa'a, diram ma yori gaan nisi tom goyo, ŋarak ma kawayna ma ka hay ziyda vi Ma-Vatɗina nisi tom goyo, wayna kaf nisi kalam kulo hay Babilon.
Bulu: Bekaldééñ be nga buʼu beta mekône me mvot me mbe Nda Nti, metin, mañ me mvot me mbe Nda Nti be nga kee mvot ése e Babilôn.
Guiziga: Ɓamtal ngi ɓiri gazahay misi ar hay Bumbulvuŋ, saretey waɗ kisa madiɗa ngi ɓiri gaza misi ar hay ngi Bumbulvuŋ na, mizli Babiloŋhoy a wahaka taŋ meɗ meɗ, a jijiraka ɓiri gaza naŋ nga Babiloŋ.
Fulfulde_Adamaoua: Kaldiya'en pusi daŋraŋge njamndi mboɗeeri haa haykaliiru Jawmiraawo e jo'inirɗe e loonde njamndi mboɗeeri wonnde haa daldal haykaliiru Jawmiraawo, ɓe njahri kuuje ɗe njamndi mboɗeeri ɗe'e fuu haa Baabila .
Fulfulde_DC: Kaldiya'en pusi daŋraŋge njamndi mboɗeeri haa haykaliiru Jawmiraawo e jo'inirɗe e loonde njamndi mboɗeeri wonnde haa daldal haykaliiru Jawmiraawo, ɓe njahri kuuje ɗe njamndi mboɗeeri ɗe'e fuu haa Baabila .
KALATA_KO_SC_Gbaya: Ɓɛɛ nɛ̀ war ko o mbiŋ Tua ko Sɔ̧ nɛ̀ wa dee nɛ̀ ndɛrɛ, in o mɔɔ-tui-kpánà, bá nɛ̀ gba-kpáná-ndɛrɛ nɛ duk kɔ̧́ Tua ko GASA WAN'i, o be Kaldee gbina wa a nù lɛŋ ndúkú-ndúkú, ɓɛɛ kai o ndɛrɛ-a lɛŋ si Babilɔŋ mɛ.
KALATA_KO_DC_Gbaya: Ɓɛɛ nɛ̀ war ko o mbiŋ Tua ko Sɔ̧ nɛ̀ wa dee nɛ̀ ndɛrɛ, in o mɔɔ-tui-kpánà, bá nɛ̀ gba-kpáná-ndɛrɛ nɛ duk kɔ̧́ Tua ko GASA WAN'i, o be Kaldee gbina wa a nù lɛŋ ndúkú-ndúkú, ɓɛɛ kai o ndɛrɛ-a lɛŋ si Babilɔŋ mɛ.
Kapsiki_DC: Pa ka Babilone mpempəmte selə nyi kamze kwa ghwə ghwə mɛa ghɛa Shala, tsagha yɛ wəmata gədəwə nyi ɓɛhwɛ ɓɛhwɛ ba'a kwenə nya wəba   kakwa mze kwa ghwə ghwə nyi beteyi mbeli mbe ghɛa Mahwətə. Pɛtɛ hɛ fəghe mze nyighɛ kadzeme Babilone.
Tupurri: Jar Kalde raw wo hrag dog boo dob maga hay wo äil tiñ mani Manwurn go, mbug wo krayn wo, gesaçaçge boo dob maga hay wo äil tiñ mani Manwurn ni go, raw wo rawge de boo dobn äuy Babilone.

Francais: Ils prirent les pots, les pelles, les couteaux, les tasses, les coupes et tous les ustensiles d'airain avec lesquels on faisait le service.
Anglais: The caldrons also, and the shovels, and the snuffers, and the bowls, and the spoons, and all the vessels of brass wherewith they ministered, took they away.
BIBALDA_TA_PELDETTA: Nisi yaw ŋarakŋa, pella, kewna, ŋalina, tasana, jak ma kawayna ma li lop hiɗi namna kaf.
Bulu: Be nga nyoñe meviek, bisobelé, atyeñ, bilaé, mekob a biôme bi mvote bise be mbe be belaʼane bie.
Guiziga: A hilaka misirgaɗay, peley, sliwiɗey, sikiɗ ngi kuca lihey, taasa ngi yamay waɗ gazlanga ngi ɓiri gazahay magam taŋ slra ngi huruk huruk taŋ a mbuŋ Buymisemuŋ.
Fulfulde_Adamaoua: Ɓe kooci boo kuuje ɗe njamndi mboɗeeri kuuwtinirteeɗe ngam dewal, payanɗe ngam ndoondi, jarduɗe, ɓoftirɗe, laɓe e taasahoy.
Fulfulde_DC: Ɓe kooci boo kuuje ɗe njamndi mboɗeeri kuuwtinirteeɗe ngam dewal, payanɗe ngam ndoondi, jarduɗe, ɓoftirɗe, laɓe e taasahoy.
KALATA_KO_SC_Gbaya: Wa kaia o nyɛk-a-bùk, o mɔɔ-kai-bùk in o paa, o be nyɛk-a-zɛzɛ, o be yee-nɔ-mɔ in o nyɛk-ndɛrɛ lɛŋ nɛ̀ ya wen dee tom kɔ̧́ Tua ko Sɔ̧.
KALATA_KO_DC_Gbaya: Wa kaia o nyɛk-a-bùk, o mɔɔ-kai-bùk in o paa, o be nyɛk-a-zɛzɛ, o be yee-nɔ-mɔ in o nyɛk-ndɛrɛ lɛŋ nɛ̀ ya wen dee tom kɔ̧́ Tua ko Sɔ̧.
Kapsiki_DC: Pa hɛ fəte kweci wəshi mze kwa ghwə ghwə, nyi mene slene mbeli le hɛ mbe ghɛa Shala: wəshi kefə pəsəɗə, yɛ pelɛ, wəshi kepesle ghwə kwa paterela, yɛ kwenə kepisə ŋkwa ba'a yɛ zlerekwe.
Tupurri: Saara kal hoo temneen wo, peln wo, mbegren wo, kobn wo, tasan wo de feçeçre ma de joñge de boodon maga aè hay ti joñre de äaara mo äuy no.

Francais: Le capitaine des gardes prit encore les bassins, les encensoirs, les tasses, les pots, les chandeliers, les cuillers et les urnes, ce qui était d'or et ce qui était d'argent.
Anglais: And the basins, and the firepans, and the bowls, and the caldrons, and the candlesticks, and the spoons, and the cups; that which was of gold in gold, and that which was of silver in silver, took the captain of the guard away.
BIBALDA_TA_PELDETTA: Ma ŋolla vi sa ŋomda hot yaw tasa ŋulona, ganuna, sle ma tun fitilla, tasana hiɗi ŋalina, sle ma koti hiɗi ora hiɗi ma doorona.
Bulu: Evete bezimbi é nga nyoñe fe befandé, bikanda bi nduan, bisua, meviek, bibi bifufup, metôk a bidoʼo bisua, jôm ése é mbe or a jôm ése é mbe argent.
Guiziga: Yo kisahay, gandaf ngi urdihey, sikiɗ ngi kuca lihey, misirgaɗay, li ɗuva lampehey, kop ngi yamay waɗ ziri taasa ngi gi mezegweley, miga taŋ cek ti ɓiri tapasl tapasl ati ɓiri bara na, madiɗa ngi mijigina buyoy a hila taŋ le ma.
Fulfulde_Adamaoua: Hooreejo aynooɓe go hooci boo daarooje, pehe urnirɗe, taasaaje, payanɗe, jo'inirɗe pittirlaaji, jarduɗe, taasahon, kuuje kaŋŋeeri e cardi fuu.
Fulfulde_DC: Hooreejo aynooɓe go hooci boo daarooje, pehe urnirɗe, taasaaje, payanɗe, jo'inirɗe pittirlaaji, jarduɗe, taasahon, kuuje kaŋŋeeri e cardi fuu.
KALATA_KO_SC_Gbaya: Gasawi zu o wi-pɛm-wannu kaia o gasa kpánà, o ɓii, o yee-a-zɛzɛ, o nyɛk-a-bùk, o  dek-e-wee , o yee-nɔ-mɔ in o nyɛk nɛ̀‘i dee nɛ̀ lɔr in bu-mbɔi mbɛt.
KALATA_KO_DC_Gbaya: Gasawi zu o wi-pɛm-wannu kaia o gasa kpánà, o ɓii, o yee-a-zɛzɛ, o nyɛk-a-bùk, o  dek-e-wee , o yee-nɔ-mɔ in o nyɛk nɛ̀‘i dee nɛ̀ lɔr in bu-mbɔi mbɛt.
Kapsiki_DC: Pa wəndə nya te ghəa ka ya ŋkwa fəte kweci wəshi mze kwa tere tere ba'a kwa ghwə: yɛ kwenə, wəshi nyi tere 'wərdə mbeli kwa, kwenə kepisə ŋkwa, wəshi kefə pəsəɗə, wəshi kepesle ghwə kwa paterela, wəshi kesa yɛmə ba'a kweci kemene slene.
Tupurri: Wañ soden raw hoo gesaçaçgen wo, sween wo, feçeçre ma lag saçaçgen wo, temnee wo, feçeçre ma hag lampan wo, kobn wo, tasan wo de feçeçre ma de joñge de boo biñnin wo de boo solayn wo äuy.

Francais: Quant aux deux colonnes, à la mer et aux douze bœufs d'airain qui étaient dessous, et aux bases que le roi Salomon avait faites dans la maison de Yahweh, il n'y avait pas à peser l'airain de tous ces ustensiles.
Anglais: The two pillars, one sea, and twelve brasen bulls that were under the bases, which king Solomon had made in the house of the  Lord : the brass of all these vessels was without weight.
BIBALDA_TA_PELDETTA: Dolla ma ma'na, ŋarak ma muzna, luway-kawayna doogo yam ma' ma yoray gaa kuɗumna, ma mulla Salomon kotomis kay ziyda vi Ma-Vatɗina. Jak namna ma koti hiɗi kawayn kaf kayni nekka valamu sa as kay ŋaɓa'ɗi.
Bulu: Beta mekône mebaé, mañ a benyaʼa be mvot awôm a bebaé be mbe tin, mbe njô bôte Solômon a nga bo asu Nda Nti, biôm bi mvot bite bise adite dap te kʼayemé.
Guiziga: Yo ma na, ɓiri gaza Salomoŋ miɗiyi taŋ gwat ngi slrahay misi ar hay ngi Bumbulvuŋ na, kilo naŋ a sluf ta: ɓamtalay cuw, kisa madiɗa, naŋ purla si, taˀ a hirnga gusoŋhoy kuruˀ nga cuw magidigilaka saret vuna, cek i miga taŋ ti ɓiri gaza.
Fulfulde_Adamaoua: Daŋraŋge ɗiɗi e loonde go bee ga'i sappo e ɗiɗi ɗi njamndi mboɗeeri les maaru e jo'inirɗe ɗe laamiiɗo Suleymaanu waɗno ngam haykaliiru Jawmiraawo, njamndi mboɗeeri kuuje ɗe'e fuu, goɗɗo waawataa awnugo ɗum.
Fulfulde_DC: Daŋraŋge ɗiɗi e loonde go bee ga'i sappo e ɗiɗi ɗi njamndi mboɗeeri les maaru e jo'inirɗe ɗe laamiiɗo Suleymaanu waɗno ngam haykaliiru Jawmiraawo, njamndi mboɗeeri kuuje ɗe'e fuu, goɗɗo waawataa awnugo ɗum.
KALATA_KO_SC_Gbaya: O mbiŋ yiitoo, gba-kpánà kpɔk nɛ̀ a̧a̧ so hi̧i̧, o ndai ɓu-zua-yiitoo nɛ̀‘i dee nɛ̀ ndɛrɛ nɛ̀ ya ɗɔɔ gba-kpánà‘i, in o mɔɔ-tui-kpánà nɛ̀ wannu Salomɔŋ dee so wen Tua ko Sɔ̧, wi nyɛm mɛ we dita ndɛrɛ-a in ndɛrɛ o nyɛk nɔ‘i lɛŋ na.
KALATA_KO_DC_Gbaya: O mbiŋ yiitoo, gba-kpánà kpɔk nɛ̀ a̧a̧ so hi̧i̧, o ndai ɓu-zua-yiitoo nɛ̀‘i dee nɛ̀ ndɛrɛ nɛ̀ ya ɗɔɔ gba-kpánà‘i, in o mɔɔ-tui-kpánà nɛ̀ wannu Salomɔŋ dee so wen Tua ko Sɔ̧, wi nyɛm mɛ we dita ndɛrɛ-a in ndɛrɛ o nyɛk nɔ‘i lɛŋ na.
Kapsiki_DC: Nahe meghe Salomon kemenete wəshi kwele kwele le mze kwa ghwə ghwə kezha ghɛa Mahwətə: selə bake, kwenə nya wəba nya ntare te pa ta mcɛmcɛli meŋe bakeghəmbe ba'a yɛ wəmata gədəwə. Kadzeghete ɗaŋeɗa ta mzea shɛ mbeli we.
Tupurri: Dog tiñ ma äogn wo, mangesaçaçgen wo de blore dere ma hwal ti äog maga wañ Salomoñ hay joñ ra de boo dob do äaale tiñ mani Manwurn mo äuy no, feçeçre se ma de joñge de boo dobn wo mo äuy klew äaara bay ma ngaäge wa.

Francais: Quant aux colonnes, la hauteur d'une colonne était de dix-huit coudées, et un cordon de douze coudées en mesurait le tour; son épaisseur était de quatre doigts, et elle était creuse.
Anglais: And concerning the pillars, the height of one pillar was eighteen cubits; and a fillet of twelve cubits did compass it; and the thickness thereof was four fingers: it was hollow.
BIBALDA_TA_PELDETTA: Dol kep kayni, fiyokka valam ta kulota ir goldoŋ doogo yam glafandi, zigew ma ir goldoŋ doogo yam ma'na ŋuyi talamu, hayam gaa beɗe, be'da valamu ir cita-ɓamta fiɗi;
Bulu: Ve mfaʼa beta mekôn, ô too menyiʼi me mo awôm a mebaé ô nga bômane de; afibe dé e mbe anyu anyiin: e mbe nlom été.
Guiziga: Ɓamtal mudumbuŋ, gil naŋ metir ngoltir, gun hirnga naŋ zeweɗ metir merkeɗ, ɓiɓir naŋ saŋtimetir dangafaɗ, waɗ vulor a wuzla.
Fulfulde_Adamaoua: __Error__
Fulfulde_DC: __Error__
KALATA_KO_SC_Gbaya: Kusa kuti mbiŋ duka nɛ́ mɛtrɛ mɔɔrɔ-ɗoŋ-taar; yoo-ɔm-a duka nɛ́ mɛtrɛ mɔɔrɔ-ɗoŋ-kpɔk, ndota ndɛrɛ-a duka nɛ́ hee pɛsa kɔ̧ er-wi ga, kɔ̧́ a̧ duka so hoŋkoyoŋ géè.
KALATA_KO_DC_Gbaya: Kusa kuti mbiŋ duka nɛ́ mɛtrɛ mɔɔrɔ-ɗoŋ-taar; yoo-ɔm-a duka nɛ́ mɛtrɛ mɔɔrɔ-ɗoŋ-kpɔk, ndota ndɛrɛ-a duka nɛ́ hee pɛsa kɔ̧ er-wi ga, kɔ̧́ a̧ duka so hoŋkoyoŋ géè.
Kapsiki_DC: Geze ta ŋkɛ, yayata selə ne, mɛtre mesli biya ta ŋkɛ kadzeme ghweme ba'a mɛtre ŋkwaŋe dekea ŋkɛ. Ghwəarara ŋkwa nya mbe hwəa nci, deghese kwa gwəmsə ta bela ta mɛtre deɓedea mze kwa ghwə ghwə.
Tupurri: Ane ti dogn wo mono, geçeçre mapo boñ hay meder kaawa', day kray nen meder hiira' hay de kaage ne hen yoo. AÀ hay de rum äili day diälig äe hay ngaä weere do naa.

Francais: Il y avait au-dessus un chapiteau d'airain, et la hauteur d'un chapiteau était de cinq coudées; et il y avait tout autour du chapiteaux un treillis et des grenades, le tout d'airain. Il en était de même de la seconde colonne; avec les grenades.
Anglais: And a chapiter of brass was upon it; and the height of one chapiter was five cubits, with network and pomegranates upon the chapiters round about, all of brass. The second pillar also and the pomegranates were like unto these.
BIBALDA_TA_PELDETTA: yalam ma dilari kulona mi wayna, yalam ma dilari kulo kepna fiyokka valamu ir goldoŋ vasl; kat yalam ma dilarina silik ma ciliyna ka talamu, hiɗi sle ma kolo-kolona, kaf koti hiɗi wayna; dol ma ma'na koti hiɗi sle ma kolo-kolon ki kayn nala kaw.
Bulu: Mendoʼo me mvot me mbe de yôp; andoʼo da e mbe ôyabe yôp menyiʼi me mo metan; ntiñane bibuma bi grenade ô nga bômane mendok, bise bi too mvot; akône baa e mbe fe avale te a begrenade bé.
Guiziga: Mecepek tiɗeˀ a hirnga ɓamtal vuna, gil ngi mecepeke metir cuw ti reta, gwat kilak kilak njororo waɗ yi ngi hunduruk law law ava, miga taŋ cek ti ɓiri gaza. Ɓamtal mucuw naŋ, taŋ rak rak ati mudumbuŋ, gil naŋ ati yi ngi hunduruk misi ava gar i mupurla.
Fulfulde_Adamaoua: __Error__
Fulfulde_DC: __Error__
KALATA_KO_SC_Gbaya: Wa dee so gan-ndui-ndɛrɛ kpe nɛ̀ zu a̧, nɛ̀ kusa-a duka nɛ́ mɛtrɛ yiitoo nɛ̀ reeta, ɓɛɛ wa a o waya-kóɓó-ndɛrɛ zu gan-ndui'i kar nɛ̀ zu-a nɛ̀ ndɛrɛ mbɛt. O mbiŋ nɔ‘i yiitoo'i kànà hee ŋmaa ga, gú nɛ̀ o dap sɛn tɛ-wa lɛŋ.
KALATA_KO_DC_Gbaya: Wa dee so gan-ndui-ndɛrɛ kpe nɛ̀ zu a̧, nɛ̀ kusa-a duka nɛ́ mɛtrɛ yiitoo nɛ̀ reeta, ɓɛɛ wa a o waya-kóɓó-ndɛrɛ zu gan-ndui'i kar nɛ̀ zu-a nɛ̀ ndɛrɛ mbɛt. O mbiŋ nɔ‘i yiitoo'i kànà hee ŋmaa ga, gú nɛ̀ o dap sɛn tɛ-wa lɛŋ.
Kapsiki_DC: Ma pelɛ ghəa yayata selə ne, wəsə ya shɛ kala derə meghe kamze kwa ghwə ghwə, mɛtre bake ba'a gasle yite biya ta ŋkɛ kadzeme ghweme. Kerafe rafe ŋkɛ le wəshi nyi tsate mbeli le mze kwa ghwə ghwə kala getse dzeyi yite ba'a kamenete kweci kala yɛ ya ta kwakweme. Yipə yipə selə nyi bake nyighɛ, tsagha rafe ta nci:
Tupurri: Gujugli boo dob hay de kañge ti äe day geçeçre gujugli boñ meder äog de nusi. Boo ma nen yeraçaçraçaç wo de ma horloñ horloñ hay wo go de cir ti dog no, saara de joñge de boo dob lay. Dog ma de äogn wo de boore äe ma horloñ horloñn wo na dosen no lay.

Francais: Il y avait quatre-vingt-seize grenades sur les faces, et toutes les grenades étaient au nombre de cent sur le treillis, tout autour.
Anglais: And there were ninety and six pomegranates on a side; and all the pomegranates upon the network were an hundred round about.
BIBALDA_TA_PELDETTA: Sle ma kolo-kolon ka dok-zleeŋe yam karkiya hay galam pete, sle ma kolo-kolona ma ŋuyi tam kaway-ciliyna co noŋ pet kis.
Bulu: Bibuma bi grenade bi mbe mewôm ébu a bisaman mimfaʼa mise a bibuma bi grenade bise bi mbe mbômaʼan bi mbe ntet.
Guiziga: Tir vay purla, yi ngi hunduruk kukur ngoltir nga merkeɗ, gunno gwat munjororo tuwa na, yi ngi hunduruk skata.
Fulfulde_Adamaoua: Haa bamaaɗum dow daŋraŋgal koo ngale, woodi rummaanooje cappanɗe joweenayi e joweego haa bakeeje fuu. Limgal rummaanooje taariiɗe ɗum fuu waɗi teemerre .
Fulfulde_DC: Haa bamaaɗum dow daŋraŋgal koo ngale, woodi rummaanooje cappanɗe joweenayi e joweego haa bakeeje fuu. Limgal rummaanooje taariiɗe ɗum fuu waɗi teemerre .
KALATA_KO_SC_Gbaya: Wa ɓoo so ndɛrɛ hee o be waya kóɓò ga a zu o gan-ndui nɔ‘i; o wan mɛ ká̧ a̧ duka nɛ́ ɓu-mɔɔrɔ-ɗoŋ-naar-zua-mɔɔrɔ-ɗoŋ-kpɔk, ɓɛɛ wa lɛŋ de gɔmŋmaa zu gan-ndui kpɔk kpɔk.
KALATA_KO_DC_Gbaya: Wa ɓoo so ndɛrɛ hee o be waya kóɓò ga a zu o gan-ndui nɔ‘i; o wan mɛ ká̧ a̧ duka nɛ́ ɓu-mɔɔrɔ-ɗoŋ-naar-zua-mɔɔrɔ-ɗoŋ-kpɔk, ɓɛɛ wa lɛŋ de gɔmŋmaa zu gan-ndui kpɔk kpɔk.
Kapsiki_DC: Ma ya ta kwakwemea shɛhɛ ne, meslimsə ŋkwaŋeghəmbe hɛ te yɛ bela ta ŋkɛ, geze ta ŋkɛ ya gwəmsə ya dzasle yitea wəsə mze kwa ghwə ghwə nya tsate mbeli kala getse.
Tupurri: Boore ma horloñ horloñ hay wo do kaawa' ti hiira' jag rum äe no day boore ma horloñ horloñ ma de cirgi ti boo ma nen yeraçaçraçaçn wo kis lay.

Francais: Le capitaine des gardes prit Saraïas, le grand-prêtre, Sophonie, prêtre de second ordre, et les trois gardiens de la porte.
Anglais: And the captain of the guard took Seraiah the chief priest, and Zephaniah the second priest, and the three keepers of the door:
BIBALDA_TA_PELDETTA: Ma ŋolla vi sa ŋomda vi Seraya, mul ŋol ma-ɗifinna, Sofoniya mul-ma-ɗifinna ma mul ma'na, hiɗi sum sa ŋom vun-ziyna sa ɦidina.
Bulu: Evete bezimbi é nga nyoñe Séraya Ntuni-nnen, Sôfôni baa ntuni a bebaʼale mimbé belaa.
Guiziga: Madiɗa ngi mijigina buyoy tuwa, a zuɓa Seraya, masay madiɗa, yo Sefaniya, ngi mijingaˀ masay waɗ mizli makir mijigina mizlingre ngi hay ngi Bumbulvuŋ ma.
Fulfulde_Adamaoua: Nden hooreejo aynooɓe hoo'i Seraya, limanjo mawɗo e Sefaniya limanjo ɗiɗaɓo e aynooɓe dammuɗe tato.
Fulfulde_DC: Nden hooreejo aynooɓe hoo'i Seraya, limanjo mawɗo e Sefaniya limanjo ɗiɗaɓo e aynooɓe dammuɗe tato.
KALATA_KO_SC_Gbaya: Gasawi zu o wi-pɛm-wannu baa Sɛraya wan-ɗafi-sɔ̧ in Sefania wi-hɔ-ɗoŋ-aa, ká bà nɛ̀ o wi-pɛm-nú Tua ko Sɔ̧ taar mbɛt.
KALATA_KO_DC_Gbaya: Gasawi zu o wi-pɛm-wannu baa Sɛraya wan-ɗafi-sɔ̧ in Sefania wi-hɔ-ɗoŋ-aa, ká bà nɛ̀ o wi-pɛm-nú Tua ko Sɔ̧ taar mbɛt.
Kapsiki_DC: Pa wəndə nya te ghəa ka ya ŋkwa kesehwe yɛ Seraya, sləwəfəa ŋkɛ Sefaniya ba'a ka dzeghe Shala mahekene nyi keya ŋkwa kedzembe ghɛa Mahwətə.
Tupurri: Wañ soden raw hoo Seraya je mooben wo de Sofoni je sië jag ma kluu ma de äogn wo de jar gor jag tiñ ma swa'n wo.

Francais: De la ville il prit un officier qui commandait aux gens de guerre, sept hommes faisant partie du conseil privé du roi et qui furent trouvés dans la ville, le secrétaire du chef de l'armée chargé d'enrôler le peuple du pays, et soixante hommes du peuple du pays qui se trouvaient dans la ville.
Anglais: He took also out of the city an eunuch, which had the charge of the men of war; and seven men of them that were near the king's person, which were found in the city; and the principal scribe of the host, who mustered the people of the land; and threescore men of the people of the land, that were found in the midst of the city.
BIBALDA_TA_PELDETTA: Kulo hay hoyok-ziyna nam vi sa ma patayn kepe ma sum sa duura ka gaa kuɗ gaŋeraŋa valamu, sum sara siɗiya jar sum sa vul gatta mi mulla sa nisi fisi kulo hay hoyok-ziyna, sa ma ɗo slena vi ma ŋolla vi sojena ma lopna vuli hay ɓalamu kay yaw sumun vun duura, hiɗi sum sa hay nagat dok-karkiya sa nisi fisi kulo hay hoyok-ziyna.
Bulu: E tison, a nga nyoñ évete bôte mewosan, nalé fe bôt awôme ya nseñe njô bôt a ntilimam évete nsamba mewosan é mbe é bili ésaé ya nyoñe bôte bisaé, a bôte ya Yuda mewôm mesaman; bôte bete bese be mbe Yérusalém.
Guiziga: Ar walahaya, a zuɓ mbur migi slra, i buyɓi ngi sojehey, yo a hil mizli tarnaˀ, mizli ngi mbuŋ buyoy, taŋ ar walahay vuna si, waɗ mbur mutoho gwat ngi buy ngi sojeheye, mbur mupulaka slra ngi hila sojehey asi haŋ naŋ. Yo a wuzla taŋ ma na, mizli ngi hurˀ walahayay ada kukur tarnaˀa ma.
Fulfulde_Adamaoua: Nder berniwol o hoo'i gooto nder saraaki'en maako kaliifaajo honooɓe e worɓe njoweeɗiɗo caka ɓurɓe ɓadaago bee laamiiɗo, tawaaɓe nder berniwol e binndoowo mawɗo konu, mo hoo'i yimɓe lesdi ngam jama'aare konu e worɓe cappanɗe njoweego nder yimɓe lesdi tawaaɓe nder berniwol.
Fulfulde_DC: Nder berniwol o hoo'i gooto nder saraaki'en maako kaliifaajo honooɓe e worɓe njoweeɗiɗo caka ɓurɓe ɓadaago bee laamiiɗo, tawaaɓe nder berniwol e binndoowo mawɗo konu, mo hoo'i yimɓe lesdi ngam jama'aare konu e worɓe cappanɗe njoweego nder yimɓe lesdi tawaaɓe nder berniwol.
KALATA_KO_SC_Gbaya: A̧ baa ŋma mɔ-geŋa nɛ̀ duk zu o wi-biro, in bíí mɔɔrɔ-ɗoŋ-yiitoo nɛ̀ yaa katɛ wannu sɛn saaye'i. A̧ baa wi-yɔr-kalata ko gasawi ko o wi-biro nɛ̀ wa ee so mɛ hok o wi-biro, in o ŋma bíí ɓu-mɔɔrɔ-ɗoŋ-kpɔk nɛ̀ a̧a̧ saaye'i mbɛt.
KALATA_KO_DC_Gbaya: A̧ baa ŋma mɔ-geŋa nɛ̀ duk zu o wi-biro, in bíí mɔɔrɔ-ɗoŋ-yiitoo nɛ̀ yaa katɛ wannu sɛn saaye'i. A̧ baa wi-yɔr-kalata ko gasawi ko o wi-biro nɛ̀ wa ee so mɛ hok o wi-biro, in o ŋma bíí ɓu-mɔɔrɔ-ɗoŋ-kpɔk nɛ̀ a̧a̧ saaye'i mbɛt.
Kapsiki_DC: Pa kesehwe kwete wəndə kwelea ka sewajɛ ba'a mbeli nyi yitea meghe mberefaŋe, tsagha nde rafe nda wəshi ke wəndə nya te ghəa ka sewajɛ, nya keve ŋkwa mbe sewajɛ ba'a ka Zhəwda ŋkwaŋemsə. Pɛtɛa mbeli nyighɛ ne, mbe Zhɛrəzalɛm hɛ.
Tupurri: Äi leegen ni mono, se raw hoo jar ma de ndar äay maga hay wo waçaç ree soden wo de jar ni renam yoo jar maga hay wo ti jeñ wañ mbañ ga se da' ra äi leege ni mono, hoo je yerge mani minisdir ma waçaç waçaçre soden wo ga hay hoor soden wo de jar ni do hiira' yoo jar maga hay wo äil sir de gwa'ge äi leege ni mono.

Francais: Les ayant pris, Nabuzardan, capitaine des gardes, les conduisit vers le roi de Babylone à Rébla.
Anglais: So Nebuzar–adan the captain of the guard took them, and brought them to the king of Babylon to Riblah.
BIBALDA_TA_PELDETTA: Nebuzaradan, ma ŋolla vi sa ŋomda yawsiya, nam tuɗsi kat mulla vi Babilon hay Ribla.
Bulu: Nébuzaradañ a nga kee be be njô bôte ya Babilôn e Ribla.
Guiziga: Nebuzaradaŋ, madiɗa ngi mijigina buyoyo, a hila taŋ cek, aru taŋ da buy madiɗa ngi Babiloŋ a Ribla.
Fulfulde_Adamaoua: Nebuzaradan, hooreejo aynooɓe hoo'i ɓe, yahri ɓe yeeso laamiiɗo Baabila haa Ribla.
Fulfulde_DC: Nebuzaradan, hooreejo aynooɓe hoo'i ɓe, yahri ɓe yeeso laamiiɗo Baabila haa Ribla.
KALATA_KO_SC_Gbaya: Nɛbuzaradaŋ, gasawi zu o wi-pɛm-wannu kaia wa nɛnɛ ha̧ wannu Babilɔŋ sɛn Ribla.
KALATA_KO_DC_Gbaya: Nɛbuzaradaŋ, gasawi zu o wi-pɛm-wannu kaia wa nɛnɛ ha̧ wannu Babilɔŋ sɛn Ribla.
Kapsiki_DC: Pa Nebəwzaradan fəghe hɛ kalə sha meghea ka Babilone mbe Ribla.
Tupurri: Nebusaradan wañ soden raw hoo rage, wo de äaara Ribla see wañ Babilone.

Francais: Et le roi de Babylone les frappa et les fit mourir à Rébla, dans le pays de d'Emath. Ainsi Juda fut emmené captif loin de sa patrie.
Anglais: And the king of Babylon smote them, and put them to death in Riblah in the land of Hamath. Thus Judah was carried away captive out of his own land.
BIBALDA_TA_PELDETTA: Mulla vi Babilon calsiya, nam cisi goyo hay Ribla, hay nagata vi Hamat. Ki kayn nala jafna vi Yuda kali goy gorvo gine hiɗi nagata visiya.
Bulu: Nye ki ve bo na be wôé be awolo te ébien e si ya Hamat.
Guiziga: Buy Babiloŋ a ga taŋ kiita ngi mucu, a kiɗaka taŋ vagay vagay a Ribla hirwuy Hamata. Naŋ kahana, mijaka mizli Zudahay, a ram taŋ kileŋ avu hirwuy taŋ.
Fulfulde_Adamaoua: Laamiiɗo Baabila umri ɓoccugo ɓe e mbarugo ɓe haa Ribla nder lesdi Hamat. Ton ɓe maayi. Bana nii yimɓe Yahuuda ndahira diga lesdi muuɗum'en.
Fulfulde_DC: Laamiiɗo Baabila umri ɓoccugo ɓe e mbarugo ɓe haa Ribla nder lesdi Hamat. Ton ɓe maayi. Bana nii yimɓe Yahuuda ndahira diga lesdi muuɗum'en.
KALATA_KO_SC_Gbaya: Wannu Babilɔŋ gɔna kita fio zu wa, ɓɛɛ wa gbɛ wa sɛn Ribla nú Hamat. Nɛ́ hegɔ a̧ wa baa nɛ̀ Juda nɛ̀ bara-biro yaknɛ nyɛi nɛ̀ nù kɔ‘i.
KALATA_KO_DC_Gbaya: Wannu Babilɔŋ gɔna kita fio zu wa, ɓɛɛ wa gbɛ wa sɛn Ribla nú Hamat. Nɛ́ hegɔ a̧ wa baa nɛ̀ Juda nɛ̀ bara-biro yaknɛ nyɛi nɛ̀ nù kɔ‘i.
Kapsiki_DC: Mɛke ŋkɛ mpəmte hɛ te ŋkwa shɛnyɛ te hɛɗia Hamat. Kala nya fəmte ka Zhəwda mbeli cakeɗake le hɛɗia nci.
Tupurri: Wañ Babilon raw car rage go de moslam, id ra go Ribla äil sir Hamade.

Francais: Voici le nombre des hommes que Nabuchodonosor emmena captifs: la septième année, trois mille vingt-trois hommes de Juda;
Anglais: This is the people whom Nebuchadrezzar carried away captive: in the seventh year three thousand Jews and three and twenty:
BIBALDA_TA_PELDETTA: Kayni si sum sa Nebukadnesar yawsi gorvona; hay busata siɗiyata nam yaw sumun sa Yudiyana birim ɦidi hiɗi diram dok-ma' yam ɦidi;
Bulu: Avale di nde bôte ya Yuda be nga ke minkôm ôyap a si jap. E bôte Nébukatnétzar a nga kee be minkôm mbe ba: mbu zamgbwale Beyude 3.023;
Guiziga: Mizli Zudahay Nabukodonozor mija taŋ nga hirwuy naŋ na, taˀ t'ani: angi vi mitarnaˀ naŋ ngi zuma buyo, a ji mizli durmuk makir ti mizli kukur cuw nga makir.
Fulfulde_Adamaoua: Ndaa limgal yimɓe ɓe Nabukodonosor dahi: Nder nduuɓu laamu maako njoweeɗiɗaɓu, Yahuudu'en ujine tato e noogas e tato (3.023).
Fulfulde_DC: Ndaa limgal yimɓe ɓe Nabukodonosor dahi: Nder nduuɓu laamu maako njoweeɗiɗaɓu, Yahuudu'en ujine tato e noogas e tato (3.023).
KALATA_KO_SC_Gbaya: O dɔka be Juda nɛ̀ Nabukɔdɔnɔsɔr kaia nɛ̀ bara-biro yaknɛ tɛ mɔɔrɔ-ɗoŋ-yiitoo pɛ-wan kɔ‘i nɛ́ bíí booro-taar-nɛ-ɓu-zua-taar.
KALATA_KO_DC_Gbaya: O dɔka be Juda nɛ̀ Nabukɔdɔnɔsɔr kaia nɛ̀ bara-biro yaknɛ tɛ mɔɔrɔ-ɗoŋ-yiitoo pɛ-wan kɔ‘i nɛ́ bíí booro-taar-nɛ-ɓu-zua-taar.
Kapsiki_DC: Wa nya ɓela ta mbeli nyi fəhwe Nabəkodonozor mbe va kwa mberefaŋe ta ŋkɛ te meghe: ka Zhəwda 3.023.
Tupurri: Do kay no so no, aè hoo jar Juda wo wo go haçaç see sir äaara no. Mokay diñ keege jar maga Nebukanetsar hoor ra wo go mono: Nen kiñgi ma de renam no, jar Jwif wo ndar swa' de jar do äog ti swa'a.

Francais: la dix-huitième année de Nabuchodonosor, huit cent trente-deux personnes de la population de Jérusalem;
Anglais: In the eighteenth year of Nebuchadrezzar he carried away captive from Jerusalem eight hundred thirty and two persons:
BIBALDA_TA_PELDETTA: hay busata doogo yam glafandita vi Nebukadnesar, nam yaw sumun kis-glafandi kalam dok-ɦidi yam ma' hay Yerusalem.
Bulu: mbu awôm a muam Nébukatnétzar a nga jôô a nga kee bôt 832 be soʼo Yérusalém;
Guiziga: Angi vi mukuruˀ nga dangafaɗ naŋ ngi zuma buyo, a hil a Zeruzaleme, mizli skat skat dangafaɗ ti kukur makir nga cuw.
Fulfulde_Adamaoua: Nder nduuɓu maako sappo e njoweetataɓu, teemeɗɗe njoweetato e cappanɗe tato e ɗiɗo (832) diga Urusaliima.
Fulfulde_DC: Nder nduuɓu maako sappo e njoweetataɓu, teemeɗɗe njoweetato e cappanɗe tato e ɗiɗo (832) diga Urusaliima.
KALATA_KO_SC_Gbaya: Ɓɛɛ tɛ ɓu-zua-mɔɔrɔ-ɗoŋ-taar pɛ-wan kɔ̧-a̧, wa kaia o be Jerusalɛm gɔmŋmaa-mɔɔrɔ-ɗoŋ-taar-nɛ-ɓu-taar-zua-yiitoo yaknɛ.
KALATA_KO_DC_Gbaya: Ɓɛɛ tɛ ɓu-zua-mɔɔrɔ-ɗoŋ-taar pɛ-wan kɔ̧-a̧, wa kaia o be Jerusalɛm gɔmŋmaa-mɔɔrɔ-ɗoŋ-taar-nɛ-ɓu-taar-zua-yiitoo yaknɛ.
Kapsiki_DC: Ma te kwa meŋe degheseghəmbe ta va ŋkɛ te meghe: ka Zhɛrəzalɛm gwəmsə deghese ba'a mahekenemsə bakeghəmbe.
Tupurri: Nen kiñgi ma de hwal ti nenma' ga Nebukanetsar de ma joñwañ mono, se raw hoo jar Jerusalem wo kiskis nenma' ti äe do swa' ti äoge.

Francais: la vingt-troisième année de Nabuchodonosor, Nabuzardan, capitaine des gardes, emmena encore captifs sept cent quarante-cinq hommes de Juda; en tout quatre mille six cents personnes.
Anglais: In the three and twentieth year of Nebuchadrezzar Nebuzar–adan the captain of the guard carried away captive of the Jews seven hundred forty and five persons: all the persons were four thousand and six hundred.
BIBALDA_TA_PELDETTA: Hay busata dok-ma' yam ɦidita vi Nebukadnesar, Nebuzaradan ma ŋolla vi sa ŋomda, yaw sa Yudiyan kis-siɗiya kalam dok-fiɗi yam vasl; nisi tapay noŋ pet sumun birim fiɗi kalam kis-karkiya.
Bulu: mbu mewôm mebaé a lale Nébukatnétzar a nga jôô, ñwô Nébuzaradañ évete bezimbi é nga kee Beyude 745 minkôm, bese bôte 4.600.
Guiziga: Ngi kiɗa mi naŋ, angi vi mizli ngir cuw nga makir naŋ ngi zuma buyo ma na, Nebuzaradaŋ madiɗa ngi mijigina buyoyo, a ji Yudeheye skat skat tarnaˀ ti mizli kukur mufaɗ nga zlum nga ruwuy mulaka. A jum jom gar na, mizli durmuk mufaɗ ti skat skat merkeɗe.
Fulfulde_Adamaoua: Nder nduuɓu maako noogas e tataɓu boo, Nebuzaradan hooreejo aynooɓe Nabukodonosor dahi teemeɗɗe njoweeɗiɗo e cappanɗe nayo e njowo (745). Limgal dahaaɓe fuu waɗi ujine nayo e teemeɗɗe njoweego (4.600).
Fulfulde_DC: Nder nduuɓu maako noogas e tataɓu boo, Nebuzaradan hooreejo aynooɓe Nabukodonosor dahi teemeɗɗe njoweeɗiɗo e cappanɗe nayo e njowo (745). Limgal dahaaɓe fuu waɗi ujine nayo e teemeɗɗe njoweego (4.600).
KALATA_KO_SC_Gbaya: Sɔŋkur-aa, tɛ ɓu-yiitoo-zua-taar pɛ-wan kɔ̧-a̧ woyo, Nɛbuzaradaŋ, gasawi zu o wi-pɛm-wannu kaia o be Juda gɔmŋmaa-mɔɔrɔ-ɗoŋ-taar-nɛ-ɓu-taar-zua-mɔɔrɔ yaknɛ nɛ̀ bara-biro. O bíí nɛ̀ wa kaia lɛŋ dee nɛ́ booro-naar-nɛ-gɔmŋmaa-mɔɔrɔ-ɗoŋ-kpɔk.
KALATA_KO_DC_Gbaya: Sɔŋkur-aa, tɛ ɓu-yiitoo-zua-taar pɛ-wan kɔ̧-a̧ woyo, Nɛbuzaradaŋ, gasawi zu o wi-pɛm-wannu kaia o be Juda gɔmŋmaa-mɔɔrɔ-ɗoŋ-taar-nɛ-ɓu-taar-zua-mɔɔrɔ yaknɛ nɛ̀ bara-biro. O bíí nɛ̀ wa kaia lɛŋ dee nɛ́ booro-naar-nɛ-gɔmŋmaa-mɔɔrɔ-ɗoŋ-kpɔk.
Kapsiki_DC: Te va kwa bakemsə mahekeneghəmbe ta va ta Nabəkodonozor te meghe ne, pa Nebəwzaradan, wəndə nya te ghəa ka ya ŋkwa, fəghe ka Zhəwda gwəmsə mberefaŋe ba'a wəfaɗemsə mcɛfeghəmbe zhɛkwa. Mbeli 4.600 mbelia shɛhɛ pɛtɛ.
Tupurri: Nen kiñgi ma de do äog ti swa' maga Nebukanetsar de ma joñwañ mono, Nebusaradan wañ soden raw hoo jar Jwif wo wo go kiskis renam ti äe do naa ti dwee, tay äuy jar ndar naa de jar kiskis hiira'a.

Francais: La trente-septième année de la captivité de Joachin, roi de Juda, le douzième mois, le vingt-cinquième jour du mois, Evil-Mérodach, roi de Babylone, en l'année de son avènement, releva la tête de Joachin, roi de Juda, et le fit sortir de prison.
Anglais: And it came to pass in the seven and thirtieth year of the captivity of Jehoiachin king of Judah, in the twelfth month, in the five and twentieth day of the month, that Evil–merodach king of Babylon in the first year of his reign lifted up the head of Jehoiachin king of Judah, and brought him forth out of prison,
BIBALDA_TA_PELDETTA: Hay busata dok-ɦidi yam siɗiyata vi vita-gorvota vi Yoyakim mula vi Yuda, hay buurta doogo yam vaslta vi til ma doogo yam ma'na, Evil-Merodak mulla vi Babilon, hay busata jewta vi mulda valamu, nam kot sli yam Yoyakim mulla vi Yuda kulo'o, nam kalamay goy hay daŋgayn pa.
Bulu: Mbu mewôm mela a zamgbwale Yôyakin, njô bôte ya Yuda a nga ke minkôm, ngone awôm a baa é too melu mewôm mebaé a metan, ñwô Evil-Mérôdak, njô bôte ya Babilôn, mbu ôsu a nga jôô, a nga telé Yôyakin, njô bôte ya Yuda, e duma dé été, a a nga vaa nye mimbôk.
Guiziga: Amma vi kukur makir nga tarnaˀ, a dirba taŋ mijaka Zoˀakim buy zuda nga ruwuy mulaka, a ram di le, hin mizli ngir cuw nga zlum ngi kiya mukuruˀ nga cuw naŋ na, Evil-Merodak, ar vi naŋ micifi buy a Babiloŋ vuna si na, a ga mezle da Zoˀakim buy Zuda, a bi di tir dangay avra.
Fulfulde_Adamaoua: Nder nduuɓu cappanɗe tati e njoweeɗiɗaɓu ɓaawo daheeki Yooyakin, laamiiɗo Yahuuda, nder lewru sappo e ɗiɗawru, nyannde maaru noogas e jowaɓre, Ewil-Merodak, laamiiɗo Baabila darjiɗini Yooyakin, o wurtini mo diga fursina. Ɗum nduuɓu ngu o heɓi laamu.
Fulfulde_DC: Nder nduuɓu cappanɗe tati e njoweeɗiɗaɓu ɓaawo daheeki Yooyakin, laamiiɗo Yahuuda, nder lewru sappo e ɗiɗawru, nyannde maaru noogas e jowaɓre, Ewil-Merodak, laamiiɗo Baabila darjiɗini Yooyakin, o wurtini mo diga fursina. Ɗum nduuɓu ngu o heɓi laamu.
KALATA_KO_SC_Gbaya: Tɛ ɓu-taar-zua-mɔɔrɔ-ɗoŋ-yiitoo pɛ baa Joakim wannu Juda yaknɛ nɛ̀ bara-biro, tɛ ɓu-yiitoo-zua-mɔɔrɔ ɔɔ-zɛ, tɛ ɓu-zua-yiitoo fio-zɛ, Ewil-Mɛrodak wannu Babilɔŋ dee ko ha̧ Joakim wannu Juda, ká a̧ yee wan nɛ̀ mbe-a, ɓɛɛ a̧ gbo a̧ yinɛ kɔ̧́ zɔɓɔ.
KALATA_KO_DC_Gbaya: Tɛ ɓu-taar-zua-mɔɔrɔ-ɗoŋ-yiitoo pɛ baa Joakim wannu Juda yaknɛ nɛ̀ bara-biro, tɛ ɓu-yiitoo-zua-mɔɔrɔ ɔɔ-zɛ, tɛ ɓu-zua-yiitoo fio-zɛ, Ewil-Mɛrodak wannu Babilɔŋ dee ko ha̧ Joakim wannu Juda, ká a̧ yee wan nɛ̀ mbe-a, ɓɛɛ a̧ gbo a̧ yinɛ kɔ̧́ zɔɓɔ.
